detailedDescription:
Located on Fulham Park Road, The Turret is one of the most unique houses on the street due to its distinguishing spiral tower and beautiful period architecture. The property is gated with access from a private entrance and sliding driveway gate that allows for off-street parking.

Opening on the ground floor into an entrance hall that leads through to two reception rooms, an expansive kitchen/dining room, utility room, WC, and cloakroom. The smaller reception room boasts a grand bay window, fireplace, bookshelves and could be used as a large home office. The larger reception room spans 23'1 ft with natural light flooding through from the identical bay window and is a wonderful family room.

This opens through to the kitchen and dining room, which has additional reception space and spans an impressive 31'7ft. The elegant kitchen has been designed to an exceptional standard with a large central kitchen island, fully integrated appliances, a gas stove, an abundance of storage, and leads through to the useful utility room. The reception and dining area has been fitted with a feature shelving wall, large skylights and wide bi-folding doors. The impressive gardens has been landscaped with patio in the forefront, decking and grass area, whilst surrounded with a wide variety of planting to create a delightful outdoor area to enjoy throughout the year.

The lower ground floor has direct access into the house and can be access via a private entrance. There is a large reception room that benefits from wall-length storage, a mirrored feature wall and LED coving lighting. This room could also be used for a home gym. The double bedroom has been newly decorated and includes a private ensuite with a bathtub and shower. There is a second kitchen/utility room, WC and plant room on this floor. There is good ceiling height throughout and as it can be self-contained, it is ideal for an au pair or live in nanny.

On the first floor lays the principal bedroom which features a beautiful balcony, a large walk-in wardrobe and an impressive ensuite bathroom. Within the ensuite, the turret is located above the free-standing bathtub that elegantly holds a chandelier. There is a glass walk-in shower, wide vanity unit with a small LED beauty mirror, and further storage. There are two further double bedrooms and an ensuite shower room on this floor. On the second floor there are two double bedroom fitted with built-in wardrobes, a family bathroom and a storage room.

The entire house boasts natural light throughout and has been designed to a sophisticated style, perfect for a large family.

Fulham Park Road is a quiet residential street that is primely located for many amenities of the New Kings Road and the Fulham Road. These include Parsons Green, The Hurlingham Club, Bishops Park, restaurants, shops, bars, coffee houses.

The property is situated within close walking distance of Parsons Green and Putney Bridge underground stations (District line), as well as many useful bus links into Central London close by.

detailedDescription:
This beautiful four-bedroom apartment unfolds over three floors and lies on St. Elmo Road, on the edge of the leafy Wendall Park area in Shepherd’s Bush. The subject of a recent renovation by its current owners, the home has been sensitively updated to retain its period character while simultaneously enjoying an injection of bold, contemporary colour and bespoke design. The terrace at the top of the house provides a secluded sun trap, while tall sash windows at the front and rear of the plan fill the interior with natural light.

The Tour

The whitewashed Victorian townhouse presents a handsome façade at street level. A stoop leads to the private raised ground floor entrance, where the front door opens into a hallway with dark cladding and wallpaper by Ferm Living.

A large open-plan living and dining room lie on the raised ground floor, illuminated by light that floods in through the west-facing front bay window and a large sash window at the rear. Oak flooring in a chevron pattern runs underfoot, grounding walls and ceilings painted in ‘Mid Clay’ by Little Greene. There is ample storage space in the form of bespoke built-in cabinetry and original details, such as the cornicing and ceiling roses, have been carefully restored. The living room retains its original fireplace, which has been updated with graphic black and white tiles by Bert & May, and is flanked by Floss wall lights. A bespoke built-in media unit, sideboard and display shelving optimise the storage space.

Steps lead down from the dining room to a contemporary galley kitchen with marble quartz worktops and minimalist units handpainted in Little Greene’s ‘Antique Gold’. A splashback and ledge run along one side of the room, with carefully concealed built-in appliances and storage space for further items. There is a smart upholstered banquette; oak chevron flooring with underfloor heating runs throughout the space.

A staircase leads to a small landing and the main bathroom. There is a large rolltop cast-iron bath, a generous shower and a striking electric blue vanity topped with Carrara marble. The floor has been finished in deep blue rubber vinyl, while blue pigmented cement and marble tiles complement the matte black hardware. Two cleverly designed cupboards open to provide a utility area for laundry. Lighting is by Tom Dixon and Floss.

Two double bedrooms lie on the first floor, both with high ceilings, large sash windows and bespoke built-in wardrobes; the second bedroom has an integrated bookcase. There is also a single bedroom on this floor, currently used as a home office, with built-in storage space and a wall-to-wall floating desk that provides ample space for two workstations.

The top floor is home to the main suite; this is a recent addition by the current owners who enacted a full mansard extension, along with the installation of the roof terrace. The large bedroom has wall-to-wall built-in wardrobes and two large Velux windows with solar-powered blinds, which open to reveal rooftop views. A large en suite lies off the bedroom, with walls and floors in a fine-flecked terrazzo. There is a large walk-in shower, a double stone resin vanity and two mirrored cabinets for storage. Underfloor heating runs throughout.

Outdoor Space

From the first floor, a staircase leads to an expansive landing area which is flooded with light from tall floor-to-ceiling double doors that open directly onto the roof terrace. The terrace is screened in opaque glass on each side, offering privacy, while clear glass along the back frames verdant treetop views. This space is a suntrap from early morning to late afternoon, with plenty of space for outdoor entertaining. The floor is finished in a pale grey poured resin, flecked with black and white.

The Area

The apartment is on the doorstep of Askew Road, which offers a great variety of independent shops including the award-winning Happy Sky Japanese bakery, The Ginger Pig butchers, and modernist furniture store Max Inc. There is an abundance of green spaces within walking distance, including Wendall Park, Ravenscourt Park, Chiswick Common and Acton Park. Westfield shopping centre can be reached on foot in around 20 minutes, while the recently renovated Television Centre – also nearby – is home to a host of independent restaurants such as Kricket and Homeslice, along with a cinema and the new Soho House members’ club White City House.

Chiswick High Road and Hammersmith’s King Street are also within easy reach, offering more independent eateries and boutique shops. Shepherd’s Bush is very popular with young families, in part due to the number of good schools in the area; the closest is Good Shepherd’s rc Primary, ofsted-rated “Outstanding”. Also nearby is the independent Montessori Nursery.

St. Elmo Road is well-positioned for plenty of transport options. Shepherd’s Bush Market (Circle and Hammersmith & City Lines) and Shepherd’s Bush (Central Line and Overground) are reached in 10 minutes via the 207 bus route, a 2-minute walk away. Stamford Brook and Turnham Green tube stations (District Line) are just over 15 minutes’ walk and Acton Central (Overground) is a 17 minute walk away. Easy access to the Westway provides a fast route out of London to the West, towards Heathrow Airport and the M4.

Tenure: Share of Freehold
Length of Lease: Approx. 921 years remaining

detailedDescription:
A substantial 'Passivhaus' status 5/6 bedroom family home with 2 floors of flexible living/entertaining space and 2 floors of bedrooms close to Brook Green with its excellent schools and transport links.

This bright and spacious property achieved 'Passivhaus' standard in 2010 and was the first house in the UK to be retrofitted to this standard. Consequently 20 Lena Gardens has extremely low energy consumption and provides exceptional levels of thermal comfort. The total energy/electricity/gas bill is approximately £500 per year. There are also 6 solar pv panels and 3 solar hot water panels which generate electricity and hot water. The property has been cleverly and practically configured allowing prospective buyers to use and live in as necessary/required.

This well presented Passivhaus of approximately 2,500 sq ft is incredibly quiet being triple glazed, oozes contemporary style and has all the Eco-credentials. It is therefore unique in the area and a must see!

detailedDescription:
An outstanding Victorian family house located on one of Fulham's finest roads.

This four bedroom property extends to 2,241 square feet (208 sq m) and is arranged over four floors. The ground floor layout comprises a double reception room with original features, cloakroom, walking through to an extended bespoke kitchen breakfast room with Miele appliances and bi-folding doors leading out to a South facing rear garden. The first floor has an elegant master bedroom suite with fitted wardrobes, as well as a walk in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom, a further double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and ensuite bathroom is to the rear. On the second floor there are two further double bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms. There is a cellar which can be used as a useful storage area or utility room. The house has been completed with premium finishes including Wire brushed engineered fine oak wooden flooring throughout, an underfloor heating system on the ground floor and in all bathrooms.

Ringmer Avenue is a quiet residential street located in a desirable group of roads that run just off the Fulham Road. The attraction of the area is the close proximity of the restaurants, cafés and shops of the Fulham Road and Parsons Green which is only a short walk away. The area is a preferred location with families seeking larger houses in good locations and as such is always in high demand. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2) which is within walking distance and buses running towards Chelsea and central London from the Fulham Road and the Thames riverside walk and the re-developed Bishops park (popular with families) is a real bonus being only a short walk away.

detailedDescription:
An immaculately presented, light filled and fully extended, 5 bed period house with basement, in leafy Parsons Green situated off the north side of New Kings Road between Parsons Green and Eel Brook Common.

The house has a fabulous open plan layout at ground floor, that creates a real feeling of light and volume as you enter. Off the front entrance hall, there’s a generous double reception room, feeling wider than many Fulham houses, this steps down to a light filled, kitchen/dining family room to the rear. The kitchen was recently refitted by Roundhouse and features folding glazed doors opening onto the rear west facing garden.

The first floor comprises principal bedroom with ensuite bathroom and generous built in storage throughout. There is a further double bedroom (currently used as study) with glazed doors onto the roof terrace to rear, overlooking the garden, on this floor.

The second floor has a further two, generous double bedrooms and family bathroom.

The basement features a large family playroom/ media room with skylights, providing excellent natural light. A 5th bedroom suite with ensuite shower room, Guest WC and large utility room.

The west facing garden to the rear has a paved area and artificial grass for easy maintenance and built in raised flower beds<br /><br />Parthenia Road is ideally located between Parsons Green and Eel Brook Common off the north side of New Kings Road. Both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway Underground stations are within a very short walk. Parsons Green also offers the varied facilities of shops, bars and restaurants and ‘a village green’ community vibe. The local schools are also very conveniently located and include Pippa Pop-Ins, Thomas’s, Lady Margaret and Marie d’Orliac ( Lycee Francais).

detailedDescription:
A charming four bedroom semi-detached house within the Ravenscourt and Starch Green conservation area.

This wonderful family home sits on Rylett Crescent; a pretty tree lined street a few moments from both Wendell and Ravenscourt park. The accommodation includes a well-proportioned and bright double reception room with square bay window, marble fireplace and original cornices. There is a pretty internal courtyard off the reception room with access through to the extended and open plan kitchen / dining room, that has concertina doors out to a lovely south west facing garden.

The house has three double bedrooms, a fourth guest / study room and family bathroom on the upper floor; the master has very pretty views of the gardens of Binden Road. The whole house is full of natural light and has a lovely natural flow plus there is the added benefit of a large attic space, a ground floor WC and additional side storage cupboard.<br /><br />

address: Central Avenue, Fulham Riverside, London SW6
detailedDescription:
Prime London are proud to present this exclusive listing of a delightful and rare five bedroom triplex home, situated within the ever popular Fulham Riverside. Situated on Central Avenue, you are a moment's walk from the Thames path, a truly idyllic location.

This substantial property of 2484 sq ft (230 sqm) is perfect for a family and enjoys five double bedrooms, with fully fitted wardrobes, internal lighting and individual air cooling to each of the bedrooms and living room. There are two en-suites with a further two family bathrooms and a WC on the top floor, located just off the open plan living/eating/entertainment space. There is also an allocated underground parking space.

The property is homely and cosy with wool carpets in the bedrooms and high ceilings in the living area with tasteful and contemporary decoration and furnishing throughout. The kitchens are fitted out to a high specification with fully integrated appliances including an Miele induction hob, oven, combi microwave, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and wine cooler unit. There is also a free-standing Miele washer/dryer in a separate utilities room.

The bathrooms feature Duravit sanitary ware with Grohe chrome finish brassware, and heated feature walls with towel rail and hooks. En suites also feature walk-in showers.

Fulham Riverside is a peaceful and tranquil place to live along the river and residents benefit from beautiful landscaped piazzas, podium gardens, a 24 hours concierge service and a residents only fitness suite. In the immediate vicinity is a Sainsburys superstore and neighbours include renowned institutions like the Hurlingham club and The Harbour Club and you are in just a short walking distance of the wonderful Kings Road.

The development has been master planned by Lifschutz Davidson Sandilands, a multi-award winning firm of architects and urban designers whose vision calls for exemplary housing with generous open space and improved access to the river.
At the centre of Fulham Riverside you will find the beautiful podium gardens - a multi-layered open area facing the Thames.

Channels of water flow towards the river around a central lawn forming a large pool, before cascading down an impressive three-metre waterfall.
Exploring the gardens reveals an outdoor gym, a croquet lawn and play areas, along with a number of separate green spaces each with its own character and style: Spaces for picnics, reading or relaxing in the sun.

Available with 995 year leasehold

detailedDescription:
A spacious three bedroom flat split over the top two floors of an attractive period building moments away from Parsons Green.

Charlie Crane is pleased to offer to the market this interesting property in a fabulous location. After a number of years as a rental investment, it offers the new owners an opportunity to refresh and update to their own style and specification. There is a large living room with period fire place, bay window, beautiful original cornicing and ceiling rose as well as access through French doors onto a balcony overlooking Parsons Green Lane. Moving towards the rear of the property there is great size double bedroom, bathroom and an eat in kitchen with centre island. On the top floor there is another large double room with interesting window alcove, built in storage, a further double bedroom and a family bathroom.

Parsons Green Lane is located in the heart of Fulham and incredibly close to the green itself, Parsons Green tube station (District and Circle lines) and the plentiful bars restaurant shops the local area has to offer.

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A very special and immaculately presented three-bedroom maisonette in a handsome period conversion which has huge character on tree lined Oxberry Avenue complete with a beautiful South West facing garden. The double reception room overlooking the garden is especially impressive with its high ceilings, large bay windows which allows natural light to flood the room with plantation shutters throughout, a gas working fireplace and an elegant mantel piece with attractive shelving either side. In addition, there is very rare wallpaper from the celebrated fashion designer, Vivienne Westwood

The kitchen is equipped with all mod-cons to include gas hob with electric oven below, integrated fridge and washing machine as well as a large larder. The garden is accessed by a stable door onto the South West facing vibrant colourful and very secluded split level garden with jasmine covered bespoke fencing and several well established trees and shrubs including a thirty foot olive tree. There is also storage under the garden with electricity.

The master ensuite bedroom downstairs is spacious with plenty of room for a large double bed, in addition there is an abundance of inbuilt storage and a lower terrace accessible from French doors. The bathroom comprises an extra deep bath, shower, sink with vanity mirror above and storage below and a W.C. The second bedroom is a double again overlooking the lower terrace with the third bedroom being a smaller double but both of which have inbuilt storage. There is a family wet room bathroom tiled with a large walk-in rain shower, sink and W.C.

Oxberry Avenue is located just off the Fulham Road with easy access to both Bishops, Hurlingham and Wandsworth parks and local tennis courts as well as a the walkway along the banks of the River Thames soon with a new additional walkway all the way to Hammersmith along the re built Fulham Football Ground. There are a wealth of shops, bars, restaurants and local supermarkets in the local vicinity as well as a large choice of local schools including All Saints, Thomas' Academy, Fulham Prep, Kensington Prep, Fulham Boys School and Lady Margaret. There are also well served transport links from Putney Bridge and Parsons Green tube stations (District Line) as well as extensive bus services 14,414,74,220 to the West End, Hammersmith and beyond.

Location

Tasso Road is located off Greyhound Road in Barons Court. The nearest tubes are West Kensington (0.6 miles from the property) and Barons Court (0.4 miles from the property). A fabulous family home set over three floors, offering both light and spacious living, and wooden floors throughout.

The first floor comprises a sizable principal bedroom, two double bedrooms and a modern family bathroom with bath. Two of these bedrooms have built-in storage.

detailedDescription:

There are a range of excellent public transport links close by, including Putney Bridge and Parsons Green underground stations, each located a mere 10 minute walk from the property, linking the property to the City and the main business districts. There is also & an array of bus routes into the main shopping and entertainment districts, the West End and Central London.

The green open spaces of Parsons Green itself, Bishops Park, Fulham Palace and Hurlingham Park, are all within a short radius, as is the River Thames with its popular walk, the Thames Path.

address: Compass House, Park Street, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A modern Manhattan style one bedroom apartment in the Chelsea Creek development, moments from Imperial Wharf Station and on the borders of Fulham & Chelsea.

A stylish and modern Manhattan style apartment in the desirable Chelsea Creek development, in an excellent location close to the Thames riverside and on the borders of Chelsea.

Situated on the second floor of this impressive modern apartment building, this apartment offers 452 sq ft (42 sq m)of living space configured as a spacious open plan kitchen and reception room, with large doors leading off to a separate bedroom space. The property also has a spacious and luxury bathroom along with plenty of built in storage space By buying into the exclusive Chelsea Creek development residents can also enjoy a host of added benefits, including a fully equipped gym, swimming pool, sauna and steam room, lift access and 24- hour concierge service.

The highly convenient Imperial Wharf overground railway station
is very close by which is both only one stop South to Clapham Junction (where you can pick up trains to a plethora of popular destinations) and North to West Brompton underground station (District Line, Zone 2). Both the Chelsea Design centre and Chelsea harbour are only a stones throw away, as is the Thames riverside walk and the restaurants, bars and supermarkets of Imperial Wharf itself. Fulham Broadway underground station (District Line, Zone 2) is also within reach and you can catch frequent buses from Imperial Wharf into Chelsea and Central London.

detailedDescription:
A substantial family house presented in excellent decorative order and being sold chain free by the sellers who have already completed on their purchase in the countryside.

The property comprises: Four bedrooms, three bathrooms, utility room, guest WC, double reception room, roof terrace, modern well-equipped kitchen which leads onto the south facing garden.

Chaldon Road offers easy access to a wide array of local amenities including the extremely popular Virgin Active/Fulham Pools complex and Normand Park, with its popular playground. The Munster Road has a good selection of eateries, wine bars and convenience stores. West Brompton, Fulham Broadway, and Parsons Green tube stations are within walking distance and extensive bus routes can be found on Lillie Road.

address: Alder Lodge, Stevenage Road, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription: With river views from the reception room, this very well presented fourth floor two double bedroom, two bathroom apartment in this iconic securely gated riverside development, must be seen. At 1044 sq.ft, the apartment is light and airy with high ceilings and comprises an amazing 30 foot reception room, a kitchen, a substantial master bedroom with an en-suite shower room, a further generous double bedroom, a family bathroom and a private terrace. There is also a secure underground bike shed and car parking space, a concierge, a swimming pool and a lift to all floors. River Gardens has direct access to the Thames Path and is a short walk to Bishops Park and the Nuffield health club. Putney Bridge underground station and the excellent bus links on the Fulham Palace Road to Hammersmith, Putney and the West End are close by too. With a long lease, in excess of 950 years and a motivated seller, early viewing of this superb lateral apartment is highly recommended.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Myrtle House, Sulgrave Road, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
Nestled between beautiful Brook Green and Brackenbury Village, this one double bedroom second (top) floor apartment is set within a handsome Victorian mansion building. The mansion apartments in Sulgrave Road are unique and highly prized homes that exude period charm and offer close proximity to superb local amenities. The apartment is comprised of a reception room, kitchen/breakfast room, double bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a generous bathroom featuring a bath and separate shower. You’ll find swathes of wooden flooring, perfectly preserved period features including fireplaces and ceiling roses and the bonus of a large utility/storage space. In good condition and offering well-proportioned rooms throughout, the apartment is ready for its next owner.

The excellent location of this mansion apartment offers the owner a short stroll to the best amenities offered by Brook Green, Shepherd's Bush and Hammersmith. Whether it’s a cup of artisan coffee or a freshly baked loaf from Gail’s, a pint from Sindercombe Social, French cuisine from Le Petit Citron or vegan delights from Eat of Eden, an unbeatable selection of local options are moments from your doorstep. Hammersmith Grove favourites like Brackenbury Wine Rooms, The Grove and Bertotti are just 5 minutes on foot. For world class shopping, entertainment and dining experiences, Westfield Shopping Centre is approximately 10 minutes away. The newly developed bbc Television Centre and White City House are just over 15 minutes on foot, offering additional options including Chelsea favourite Bluebird and Michelin starred Endo at the Rotunda. Awash with local events, a strong sense of community pervades this pretty patch of West London. Farmer’s market enthusiasts will enjoy the 12 minute stroll to the Brook Green Market and Kitchen, open on Wednesdays and Saturdays. With Brook Green, lovely Loris Garden and Shepherd’s Bush Green all a short walk away, you’re spoilt for choice when it comes to West London’s green spaces. Commuters benefit from superb transport links including a 3 minute stroll to Goldhawk Road station (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines); Shepherd’s Bush station (Central line) is less than 10 minute on foot whilst a variety of artery bus links from Shepherd’s Bush Road and Goldhawk Road will wing you into central London.

Call Horton and Garton, your local market-leading agent, to diarise your viewing.

detailedDescription:
This very stylish two bedroom apartment (848 sq ft/78.2 sq m) is located on the fourth floor of this purpose-built apartment block with 24 hour porter & security. Interior designed by Tara Craig, a very spacious and bright reception room opens onto a balcony overlooking the main boulevard leading to the river. A separate fully fitted kitchen is located off the reception room and there are two double bedrooms, an ensuite bathroom and a separate family bathroom. The apartment also has air conditioning, video entry, an underground parking space and access to a resident's gym.
Regency House is located on the Boulevard in the heart of Imperial Wharf, moments from the river and the beautiful communal gardens of Imperial Park. There are many shops, cafes and restaurants close by and excellent transport links from Imperial Wharf overland rail station as well as a water taxi service to the city.

detailedDescription:

Being of redbrick construction the property offers good accommodation throughout with a long central corridor, good size living room/dining room, modern fitted bathrooms suite, secondary double glazing, two double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes offering ample storage, modern fitted shower room, fully fitted modern kitchen with built-in integrated appliances, the property further boasts access to communal private gardens which also have two tennis courts and is situated next to the world-famous Queens Tennis.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An outstanding four bedroom house located between Parsons Green and Eel Brook Common.

This beautiful house extends to just over 1,300 sq ft and has been newly renovated, creating a stylish living space throughout by the current owners. The ground floor comprises a large open plan reception room and a bespoke modern kitchen with integrated appliances and an island. Doors lead out onto a private patio garden. On the first floor are two good sized double bedrooms, a large modern family bathroom with a bath and separate shower, and one further bedroom/study to the rear of the house. On the top floor is a large master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room as well as a South facing roof terrace.

The house is situated in an extremely convenient location on Novello Street (one of Fulham's most idyllic streets), only moments from Parsons Green Station (District Line, Zone 2) and in-between the large open spaces of Eel brook Common and the incredibly desirable Parsons Green. There is a Waitrose supermarket nearby as is the famous White Horse Pub and numerous independent shops, cafes and restaurants located on the Fulham Road, New Kings Road and Parsons Green close to hand. Fulham Broadway is also only a short stroll away through the park where there is a Wholefoods market, a Vue cinema, David Lloyd gym and a plethora of other amenities.

address: Lillie Square, Earl's Court, London SW6
detailedDescription:
The hight of luxury living, this beautiful brand new one bedroom apartment with Juliet balcony, in the highly sought after Lillie Square development, comes furnished and is being sold chain free through Prime London.

This higher floor contemporary apartment (access via lift) comprises a large open plan reception room and fully fitted kitchen with dining area, large double bedroom with substantial dressing area, family sized bathroom, and ample storage. The property also benefits from having underfloor heating & comfort cooling.

The 5 star concierge service and extensive members' clubhouse facilities offer a new approach to luxury living. Residents will enjoy a range of high end amenities including a residents' lounge, 20m indoor swimming pool, gym, jacuzzi, sauna and steam room as well as spa treatment rooms and a private exercise room. A private cinema room and private function room offer residents a space to entertain guests and can be booked for private events.

Situated 2 minutes walk from West Brompton Station (District Line & London Overground), Lillie Square offers garden square living in a distinctive new development in Earls Court. title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A charming four bedroom family home, located on Chancellors Road in Hammersmith.

Location

Chancellors Road is on a residential street situated by the River Thames and is approximately 0.4 miles to Hammersmith Broadway, which is a major transport hub with an underground interchange (Piccadilly, District, Circle, Hammersmith and City lines).

Description

This end of terrace property expands over four floors, providing over 1400 sq ft of living space, and has a garden both to the front and rear of the property.

Entering on the ground floor, there is a double reception room with high ceilings, wooden floors and period fireplaces. The room is flooded with natural light through the tall windows and double doors overlooking the garden. To the rear is a study, ideal for those working at home, with a door out onto the balcony.

The open plan kitchen diner is found on the lower ground, with access out onto both patio gardens. Below the balcony is a bike storage. There is also a bathroom with shower on this floor.

The sleeping accommodation is spread over the top two floors, with the principal bedroom, double bedroom, and family bathroom with twin sinks and a free-standing bath, on the first floor. These two bedroom benefit from built in storage. The third double bedroom with eave storage is on the top floor.

Square Footage: 1450 sq ft

detailedDescription:
A two-bedroom split level flat with a private garden and great extension potential, located in Fulhams sought after ‘Bury Triangle’.

The property is currently configured with a separate kitchen on the raised ground floor. There is room for a table and chairs and an external staircase leads to the rear garden. The garden has space for a table and chairs and bbq and is fenced for privacy from the ground floor flat below.

On the first floor, there is a reception room to the front with large feature sash windows, two bedrooms, and a bathroom and a separate WC.

Planning was approved in 2015 to extend into the loft space creating an extra bedroom, bathroom, and roof terrace. This planning could be reapplied for, or a new buyer may wish to extend the property further creating two bedrooms and a bathroom in the loft space. The larger extension would take the total size over 1000 sq ft (93 sq m).

Hazlebury Road is located a short walk from Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway underground stations (District Line - zone 2), and Imperial Wharf overground station. There’s a great selection of independent cafes, shops, and restaurants on the nearby Wandsworth Bridge Road as well as one of Fulham’s best gastro pubs ‘The Sands End’ which is just around the corner. South Park, one of Fulham’s largest parks is a short walk away, as is the extremely popular Thames river path.

detailedDescription:
Exceptional family home offering excellent entertaining space.

Location

Gunterstone Road is a one way street situated just south of Brook Green and north of Barons Court and West Kensington, providing excellent commuter routes into central London and out to the countryside.

The A4 which runs through Hammersmith and becomes the M4 immediately to the west of town, provides fast access to Heathrow and out to the West Country. In the other direction, it provides a quick route into Central London towards Harrods and the West End.

There are an excellent variety of local shops, cafes, delicatessens and restaurants close by in Brook Green and Hammersmith as well as Westfield Shopping Centre with its extensive retail, restaurant, leisure and transport facilities.
The location is renowned for some of London's most sought-after schools including St Paul's Girls School, Godolphin, Latymer, Larmenier and Bute House.

Description

This is an unusually wide 6 bedroom family home with high ceilings, a wonderful feeling of space and lovely square rooms, overlooking a newly landscaped 62' southerly garden with summerhouse and trampoline at the rear. The property was fully refurbished five years ago by the current owners with a focus on embedding modern technology while preserving period features and incorporating lighting design to make a timeless family home for their three children.

The bespoke kitchen/breakfast/family room spans the width of the lower ground floor and opens through triple doors onto the garden which is initially paved with plenty of space for a large table and chairs, with steps up to the expansive low maintenance lawned area. The garden has electricity and water at front and rear and the summerhouse could easily be used as or upgraded to an alternative home office. There is a separate lower ground floor entrance and a utility room with space for chest freezer and drinks fridge, as well as cellar storage to the front of this floor. The terraced area at the front of the property has a bespoke unit for bike, bin and log storage for the wood burning stove. On this floor off the utility room is also a self-contained bedroom/studio with en suite and kitchenette which has access to the lower ground floor entrance to give great privacy to a nanny/au pair or lodger.

The raised ground floor has an impressive hallway entrance and two receptions with original fire places (one gas and one log burning stove) and 12ft ceilings. One is used as a sitting room and overlooks the garden, the other is currently used as a formal dining room/study with hidden fitted office. The house is completely Cat 6 wired for internet and modern communications enabling easy home working. The reception rooms can also be opened front to back as required via reclaimed original Victorian sliding doors. Also on this floor is a large boot room with bench seating, shelving, hanging space and ample storage for the whole family. There is also a large cupboard for hiding scooters, and hidden it racking for the house's computer and media centre.

The house has a large master suite on the first floor overlooking the garden, with his and hers walk through dressing room/wardrobes, double basins and double ended roll top bath as well as walk in shower. There is a twin guest bedroom and bathroom on this floor. On the second floor, there are three further bedrooms and a family bathroom with double sinks and shower as well as bath. The street, being one way, is amazingly quiet and all bedrooms overlook the garden other than one on the second floor which has a lovely balcony overlooking Gunterstone Road. There is excellent and significant loft storage accessed by a fixed stair case from the top floor (secured for children) and large, remote operated Velux windows (with blackout blinds as needed) to the roof space allowing light to flood down the stairs.

This substantial house of approximately 3300 sq ft combines contemporary style with traditional features, extensive and thoughtful storage and a great balance of bedroom accommodation to living/entertaining space in addition to a fantastic garden - A must see!

Square Footage: 3303 sq ft

address: Television Centre, 101 Wood Lane, London W12
detailedDescription:
A brilliant apartment within the historic Television Centre development.

Location

Located in the heart of White City. The former bbc Television Centre sits on Wood lane, next to Westfield West London. Ith White City Station (approximately 0.1 mile, Central line), Wood Lane (approximately 0.1 mile, Hammersmith & City and Circle lines) and Shepherds Bush (approximately 0.6 miles, Central line and Overground lines) stations on your doorstep.

Television Centre is served by excellent Underground, Overground, bus and road routes into the West End, the City and Canary Wharf. The historic forecourt offers many restaurants, cinema, television studios, health club, spa and a Soho House.

Ideally located with access to the glorious open space of Hammersmith Park boasting a Japanese Garden, a gated children's play area, bowling green, tennis courts and five-a-side football pitches

Description

A wonderful two bedroom apartment on the fifth floor of the iconic Television Centre development.

Overlooking the landscaped Television Centre gardens this apartment offers excellent living and entertaining space for family and friends. Featuring an Italian style Dada kitchen, Terrazzo worktops and built in appliances and storage.

The kitchen opens to the reception area presents access to the private balcony via bi-folding glass doors which let in an abundance of natural light and offers fantastic views over the gardens and iconic Helios building.

The principal bedroom is situated to the rear of the property benefitting from a walk-in wardrobe, ensuite and high ceilings. The second bedroom is situated adjacent and offers further built-in storage. A family bathroom sits opposite with the advantage of a bathtub.

Television Centre offer excellent local amenities and access to the private members gym, swimming pool, screening room and 24hr concierge.

Square Footage: 924 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 971 years remaining

detailedDescription:
*Book a virtual viewing* This 2 bedroom apartment is location on the raised ground floor. The apartment is dual aspect and finished to a high specification with distinctive interior design.

Description

Visit our Brand New Showhome
Our new showhome is now available to view, created by renowned designer, Nick Auston.

We asked Nick to produce a 'Quintessentially British' interior design scheme for a 2-bedroom apartment by using small and local businesses along the King's Road. Our main aim for this showhome is to explore originality, whilst delving into the rich history of the site itself as well as surrounding area of Fulham.

In addition, the apartment brings a new meaning to the showhome concept with innovative software that allows potential purchases to interact with items in the showhome whether visiting in person or virtually. The unique technology offers an in-depth insight into the property, its interiors and the vision for King's Road Park.

Transforming London's Heritage

King's Road Park will transform a hidden part of London's heritage, to create a new sustainable neighbourhood set within a beautiful park, truly designed for life.

Situated just 60 metres from the iconic King's Road and close to the River Thames, King's Road Park is in one of south-west London's most celebrated locations. Perfectly located in Zone 2 and only a 10 minute walk from both an Underground and Overground station, this sought-after address is well connected and close to the very best that London has to offer.

King's Road Park is the last project of its scale yet to be started within the Fulham Riverside Regeneration Area and south-west London. This will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings set within a new public square. 100,000 sq. Ft. Of commercial space will provide a choice of restaurants, bars and offices.

*Virtual viewings available with our marketing suite staff. Book your appointment today to find out more about our latest release at King's Road Park. At present in-person viewings are permitted but we encourage a virtual viewing in the first instance.*

A collection of stylish suites, 1,2,3 and 4 bedroom apartments, a new public park with an extensive range of community facilities.

Prices from £725,000.

Location
As part of the Fulham regeneration area, King's Road Park will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings, set within new public square and contemporary designed commercial space. The development is situated just 60 metres from the King's Road in Chelsea and a stones through to the River Thames.

The Zone two location is within easy reach of Fulham Broadway Underground station (15 minutes to Victoria on the District Line), and Imperial Wharf Overground station, taking you one stop to Clapham Junction south of the river.

Amenities
Residents will benefit from a beautiful landscaped public park at the centre of the development, providing a significant open space for the local community. The development provides access to luxury health and fitness facilities featuring a gymnasium and studios, 25m swimming pool with vitality pool, steam room, sauna and treatment rooms. Finally, residents will enjoy private access to a cinema, golf simulator and games room.

The ground floor and first floors feature an elegant lobby with a 24-hour concierge, a private dining room and meeting rooms, with a private bar, a relaxing work space and communal gardens.

Images are CGIs and indicative only.

Square Footage: 810 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 998 years remaining

We asked Nick to produce a 'Quintessentially British' interior design scheme for a 2-bedroom apartment by using small and local businesses along the King's Road. Our main aim for this showhome is to explore originality, whilst delving into the rich history of the site itself as well as surrounding area of Fulham.

In addition, the apartment brings a new meaning to the showhome concept with innovative software that allows potential purchases to interact with items in the showhome whether visiting in person or virtually. The unique technology offers an in-depth insight into the property, its interiors and the vision for King's Road Park.

Transforming London's Heritage

King's Road Park will transform a hidden part of London's heritage, to create a new sustainable neighbourhood set within a beautiful park, truly designed for life.

Situated just 60 metres from the iconic King's Road and close to the River Thames, King's Road Park is in one of south-west London's most celebrated locations. Perfectly located in Zone 2 and only a 10 minute walk from both an Underground and Overground station, this sought-after address is well connected and close to the very best that London has to offer.

King's Road Park is the last project of its scale yet to be started within the Fulham Riverside Regeneration Area and south-west London. This will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings set within a new public square. 100,000 sq. Ft. Of commercial space will provide a choice of restaurants, bars and offices.

*Virtual viewings available with our marketing suite staff. Book your appointment today to find out more about our latest release at King's Road Park. At present in-person viewings are permitted but we encourage a virtual viewing in the first instance.*

A collection of stylish suites, 1,2,3 and 4 bedroom apartments, a new public park with an extensive range of community facilities.

Prices from £725,000.

Location
As part of the Fulham regeneration area, King's Road Park will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings, set within new public square and contemporary designed commercial space. The development is situated just 60 metres from the King's Road in Chelsea and a stones through to the River Thames.

The Zone two location is within easy reach of Fulham Broadway Underground station (15 minutes to Victoria on the District Line), and Imperial Wharf Overground station, taking you one stop to Clapham Junction south of the river.

Amenities
Residents will benefit from a beautiful landscaped public park at the centre of the development, providing a significant open space for the local community. The development provides access to luxury health and fitness facilities featuring a gymnasium and studios, 25m swimming pool with vitality pool, steam room, sauna and treatment rooms. Finally, residents will enjoy private access to a cinema, golf simulator and games room.

The ground floor and first floors feature an elegant lobby with a 24-hour concierge, a private dining room and meeting rooms, with a private bar, a relaxing work space and communal gardens.

Images are CGIs and indicative only.

Square Footage: 984 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 998 years remaining

detailedDescription:
A charming two bedroom garden flat, located on Holmead Road in Fulham with potential to upgrade and extend.

Location

Holmead Road is situated on the sought after Moore Park Estate and. It is approximately 0.3 miles from the underground station, shops, restaurants and bars in Fulham Broadway and convenient for buses along both Kings Road and Fulham Road in to the West End and the City.

The property is ideally located to the green open spaces of Eel Brook Common with playground and tennis courts.

The area has an excellent selection of schools including Kensington Prep, Thomas's Fulham and Marie d'Orliac.

Description

Entering the property on the ground floor you'll find a large double bedroom with built in wardrobes. There is then a family bathroom and guest W.C.

The property leads through to a generous open plan kitchen reception which is flooded with natural light from the conservatory at the rear. Double doors give direct access out to a lovely south-west facing garden.

Stairs lead to the first floor which hosts a generous reception room and second double bedroom.

The property would also benefit from potential re-configuration/extension (subject to planning permission).

The property has the below planning permission:
2021/01387/ful | Erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition; and excavation of the front garden and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the creation of a new basement. | Maisonette Ground And First Floors 28 Holmead Road London SW6 2JD

Square Footage: 938 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 141 years remaining

Charming garden apartment.

Location

This property is ideally located; a stone's throw from Shepherd's Bush Green and approximately 0.3 miles from London's Westfield Shopping Centre, approximately 0.9 miles from Soho House, and a multitude of restaurants bars and other local amenities.

It is also well situated for transport links, served by the Central and Overground lines approximately 0.3 miles (Shepherd's Bush station) and Circle and Hammersmith and City lines approximately 0.8 miles (Wood Lane station) as well a multitude of bus services.

Description

A charming apartment in the heart of Shepherds Bush with its own spacious private garden. The flat has recently been refurbished throughout to a high standard, it's a must see.

The property is located along the end of a beautiful, tree-lined street. The garden apartment has its own spacious reception room, double bedroom with in-built storage, a separate kitchen, separate lavatory and bathroom to the rear of the property.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Parking available as an optional extra.

Fulham Riverside is a major new destination for South West London and a fabulous place to live located on the northern bank of the river Thames. Built on one of the few remaining undeveloped stretches of riverside in central London, Fulham Riverside is located just a short walk from both Chelsea Harbour and the famous King’s Road. Each of the properties available has their own private outdoor area: A balcony, a terrace or a garden.

The development offers 24 hour concierge service for your convenience and security, underground parking spaces (by negotiation), an on-site 92,000 sq. Ft Sainsbury's superstore, a cafe and a fitness suite. The development is set around an acre of quiet planted gardens that include a children's play area, and an area to play badminton and croquet. The relaxing gardens setting also include water features and an impressive 3 metre waterfall. The river Thames is right on your doorstop.

This two bedroom apartment boasts 1261 sq ft of living space located on the ground floor. This apartment offers stylish contemporary interiors throughout and comprises light and spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen areas with floor to ceiling windows, one spacious bedrooms and a modern bathroom suite. Further benefits include direct views of the River Thames, hardwood flooring, underfloor heating, comfort cooling, wireless music system and secure video entry.

The development offers easy access to a number of transport links, including Imperial Wharf Overground station and Chelsea Harbour. The proximity of transport routes provides easy access to both the City and the West End. Just a five minute ride from Imperial Wharf Overground station in Clapham Junction. There are also regular links driving you to both London Bridge and Waterloo. You also have the option of taking a boat from Chelsea Harbour for a relaxed commute to Putney, Embankment or Blackfriars.

detailedDescription:
An architecturally designed and immaculately presented three bedroom terraced house with 1989 sq ft (185 sq m) of internal space and large garden. The property is excellently located for the hubs of both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway.

When you first cross the threshold upon entering this property it is immediately clear just how much time and energy has been invested in its design and execution. Every inch of the property has been extremely well-conceived and planned with meticulous detail.

On the ground floor, there is a large reception to the front, with a working gas fireplace and custom seating which allows for large entertaining. In the middle section of the ground floor, there is a useful cloakroom and ground floor WC. To the rear is the enormous kitchen which has been beautifully designed with a feature brick wall that runs from the dining space out into the garden.

The garden has been landscaped for low maintenance living and has ample space to entertain, its southerly aspect also makes it a great sun trap. The basement doubles up as a useful utility space and wine cellar. Planning approval was granted in 2016 for a full basement which would have increased the total property size to approximately 2700 sq ft (250 sq m).

Upstairs there are two ensuite bedrooms on the first floor, a large master suite to the front and a generous guest bedroom to the rear. The top floor is currently used as one huge bedroom with ensuite and study, although this could easily be changed to two bedrooms if required. The use of large glass ceilings on the top floor is fantastic, it floods the property with natural light and creates a fantastic feature shower in the bathroom.

Shorrolds road is excellently located for the hubs of both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway. Parsons Green Station is 0.5 miles, and Fulham Broadway Station just 0.4 miles from the house (both District Line - zone 2). The area offers many excellent schools, and parks yet are still within easy reach of the West End.

This is an excellent property that is sold with no onward chain.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
The property opens on the ground floor into an enviable triple reception room. The front reception area sits within a large bay window and opens into the central space that spans 26'9ft. Adjoining at the rear is a charming dining area that features a large skylight that floods with natural light, and leads out into the spacious West facing garden. The kitchen is semi-open plan with fitted appliances and a large larder/pantry. At the front of the house is a useful utility room with further storage and a guest WC.

On the first floor, there are four double bedrooms with built-in storage, a family bathroom, shower room and a guest cloakroom. The largest bedroom on this floor benefits a private terrace that overlooks the garden.

The second floor comprises of the principal bedroom that boasts an abundance of space, storage, natural light throughout, and a private ensuite bathroom.

The property benefits a private driveway at the front of the house. There is potential to expand the property further, subject to planning permission.

The house is located on a popular street offering easy access to the local amenities and to the transport links of Parsons Green (District Line). With South Park situated opposite, this house is perfectly positioned for a family. The A3 is also within easy reach.

address: St Dunstans Road, West Kensington W6
detailedDescription:
Set over two floors in this period building is an exceptional three-bedroom apartment that has been organised in such a way to allow the property to be flooded with light. Large open plan/living room with doors to balcony, modern fitted kitchen with built-in integrated units, modern fitted bathroom suite, hardwood floors that flow throughout, three double bedrooms, walk-in wardrobe, ensuite bathroom with both shower cubicle and bath, Juliet balcony offering far reaching views and one of the real features of this property is how close you are to Barons Court tube station which is only a stone's throw away.

St Dunstan’s Road is a highly regarded and much sought after location offering easy access to the West End and Knightsbridge (A4 and Piccadilly line) as well as Heathrow and of town (A4/M4). There are many excellent schools nearby including St. Pauls, Godolphin and Latymer, The French Lycée, Jacques Prevert, Larmenier, and Fulham Prep.

title: 3 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
A spacious three double bedroom apartment arranged over the top 3 floors of a wider than average Victorian building in the centre of Parsons Green.

The property offers 1235 sq ft (115 sq m) of well configured living space with the additional benefit of a large roof terrace with views towards central London.

On the first floor there is bright and spacious reception room with a feature fireplace, large windows and high ceilings. On the second floor is a modern kitchen with plenty of space for dining and a pretty outlook over the neighbouring residential streets, two double bedrooms with excellent built in storage, one of which also has an ensuite shower room, and an additional second shower room. There is a private roof terrace on the top floor as well as a large master bedroom with plenty of built in wardrobes and some useful eave storage space as well as a modern ensuite bathroom. The property further benefits from having a share of freehold for the building.

The flat is centrally located with the shops, restaurants and cafes of popular Parsons Green close to hand, including a Waitrose supermarket and one of London's most well-known pubs, The White Horse, as well as the popular Amuse Bouche. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2) and there are also plenty of buses running from Fulham Road & New Kings Road into Chelsea and towards central London.

detailedDescription:
A well-presented, three double bedroom Victorian family home in a great location not far from Fulham Road.

The ground floor of the house is split between a reception room at the front and a modern kitchen breakfast room to the rear with new wooden flooring, looking out onto a South facing rear patio/garden. On the first floor there are two double bedrooms and a family bathroom (with a bath and shower). The loft space has been converted into a large and bright master bedroom with en suite shower room.

Horder Road is a very popular residential street not far from the open spaces of Bishops Park and only a short walk from the Fulham Road with its shops, restaurants, cafes and bars. Parsons Green underground station (District line, Zone 2) is within easy walking distance.

detailedDescription:
Beautifully presented apartment on Thornfield Road.

Location

Thornfield Road is one of the most popular streets in Shepherd's Bush. It is quiet and has residents parking available.

The nearest stations are Goldhawk Road, approximately 0.4 miles (Circle and Hammersmith & City), Shepherd's Bush Station, approximately 0.7 miles (Central and Overground) and Hammersmith, approximately 0.9 miles (Piccadilly, District, Circle and Hammersmith & City) there are also a range of buses that provide excellent services to central London.

Thornfield Road is in a prime location for access out of London to the west via the A4 and M4. A range of local amenities are provided nearby including two brilliant gastro pubs and the close by Westfield complex offers a range of extensive shopping, restaurant and entertainment facilities.

Thornfield Road is suitably located for the best private and public schools in the borough including St Stephens primary school.

Description

An immaculately presented two bedroom apartment situated on Thornfield Road.

The ground floor comprises of a double reception room which has been opened up to create dining area and reception space enjoying period bay window. To the rear of the property is the fully fitted kitchen and looks out to the garden. The garden offers fabulous space for entertaining and a comfortable space to enjoy al fresco dining.

The first floor presents the principal bedroom with high ceilings, bay window and a second double bedroom which overlooks the garden. There is also a bathroom with double sink, shower and bath tub.

Square Footage: 922 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 103 years remaining

detailedDescription:
Lovely large split level period apartment.

Location

Shepherds Bush Road is a popular location in Brook Green, bordering Kensington and provides excellent schools including St Paul's Girls' school and Ecole Francaise de Londres Jacques Prevert.

The location has excellent nearby transport links to Hammersmith Shepherd's Bush Market, approximately 0.6 miles (Circle line and Hammersmith & City), Shepherds Bush Station, approximately 0.8 miles (Central line, Overground and National Rail), and Goldhawk Road Station, approximately 0.5 miles (Circle line and Hammersmith & City). Shepherds Bush Road offers quick and easy access to the A4 taking you into central London or out to the countryside.

There are an excellent variety of local shops, cafes, delicatessens and restaurants plus Westfield shopping centre.

Description

Lovely fully refurbished, large split level period property.

This apartment comprises of a bright reception room, boasting high ceilings, a traditional fire place, bay window and large sash windows and leads through to a fully fitted contemporary kitchen which offers plenty of storage, good work surface area and space for dining table.

To the rear of the first floor there is a double bedroom with built in wardrobes and a family shower room adjacent. The second floor briefly comprises of three bedrooms with the principle boasting an en-suite bathroom with shower facilities, a bay window allowing plenty of light and bespoke fitted wardrobes. The bedroom next door also offers built in wardrobes and makes use of the bathroom across the hall, a further fourth bedroom to the rear of the property is found and makes use of the fourth bathroom as well as further storage cupboards.

Square Footage: 1596 sq ft

detailedDescription:
A stunning one bedroom maisonette in a wonderful location within Munster Village. This very spacious property benefits from being arranged over two floors, has its own front door and is in excellent condition throughout.

The property consists of a large open plan reception room with wooden floors and modern kitchen, contemporary bathroom and a generous bedroom with built in wardrobes.

St Peter's Terrace is nestled between the 'Villes' and 'Munster Village' area of Fulham and allows access to either Parsons Green or Fulham Broadway underground station.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This outstanding Victorian family home with good sized South facing garden, and located only a short walk from Parsons Green and moments from the coveted South Park.

This outstanding three bedroom Victorian family home with good sized South facing garden, is located a short walk from Parsons Green and moments from the coveted South Park, with its excellent recreational facilities and in close proximity to Thomas’s school and the Ecole Marie d’Orliac. The property is arranged over three floors and extends to 1,611 sq ft (150 sq m). The property features an impressive ground floor split level open plan entertaining space. This comprised entirely of a double reception room with a feature bay window, a separate W.C and a stylish and modern extended kitchen with a view straight through onto a beautiful 29’6’ South facing garden via set of sliding doors. The master bedroom suite is situated on the first floor with a large en-suite bathroom and built in wardrobes. A further double bedroom and modern family bathroom are located to the rear, with stairs leading up to a third double bedroom and en-suite bathroom converted in the loft space. There’s also scope to extend the property by adding a basement, a very popular addition (subject to the usual planning consents), as well as a pod room extension to the second floor.

Beltran Road is a quiet residential street located in a popular group of roads nestled right next to South Park, one of Fulham’s largest parks, complete with a children’s play area, cricket ground and tennis courts. detailedDescription:
We are delighted to present this beautifully refurbished and fully extended house on highly desired Greenside Road in Ravenscourt Park.

This Super Stylish house is set over 4 floors featuring 2 floors of versatile entertaining space with a dual aspect double reception room on the raised ground floor which features a wood burning fireplace. On the lower ground floor is a chic cinema room with a working gas fireplace and additional street access (which could be used as a fourth bedroom).. A large open plan fully fitted Schüller Kitchen with stainless steel work tops, underfloor heating and an abundance of bespoke storage. The Dining area, with sliding glass doors opens out to a gorgeous west facing 35ft porcelain tiled leafy garden - a quiet suntrap perfect for summer entertaining.

The Master and Second bedroom are on the 1st floor and a large third bedroom on the 2nd floor all with fitted wardrobes and new double glazed sash windows. The property features 3 luxurious bathrooms all with Lefroy Brooks fittings and with underfloor heating.

Greenside Road is located off Goldhawk Road close to popular Ravenscourt Park. The house sits between Brackenbury and Askew Villages which offer local favourite spots such as the excellent Anglesea Pub, The Ginger Pig Butcher, Hartswood Tennis Club and the Leith Cooking School of Food and Wine. It is also within easy walking range of for several top private schools such as Ravenscourt Park Prep, Latymer Upper and Godolphin & Latymer as well as outstanding Ofsted schools such as John Betts and the West London Free school

The closest transport links include plenty of frequent Bus links to the city and Ravenscourt Park (District Line) and Goldhawk Road (Hammersmith and City Line) Underground stations are both within a 10 minute walk. Extensive shopping and entertainment facilities are also nearby at Westfield Shopping Centre.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Comments from the owner:
What do you love about the flat?
This was a first purchase for me, I was working in the West End and the City, so location and transport links were a priority, being close to the tube with 3 lines, zone 2, plus easy access to the A4 & M4. I love my home as it's quiet and peaceful, with high ceilings, and being larger than average, there is a sense of space. With a private patio area to look out onto, and communal gardens adjacent. I love the Edwardian architecture with its solid build and feel completely secure. Being close to the iconic Hammersmith bridge too, a piece of history on the doorstep!

Why are you moving?
I have owned this flat for many years and it is time to move on. I have rented the property over the latter years successfully enough to allow me to live elsewhere as cash flow hasn't been a problem.

What will you miss about the area?
The area has much to offer being close to the river, lovely walks, iconic pubs, and convenient transport links. There is so much choice within easy reach and something for everyone - the ultra modern refurbished Riverside Studios, nearby Brasserie Blanc; amazing food & wine. Or why not sit where Cromwell once sat in the Doves public house! The tranquility of just being by the river Thames and all that it has to offer, with easy access to the towpath, walks to Chiswick, or East to Bishops Park, Fulham Palace and beyond... I have never tired of the surrounding area.

Property Details:

Accommodation comprises entrance hall leading into the bright reception room with ample space for relaxing and dining, and sliding doors out onto the delightful enclosed patio garden. A doorway leads through to the separate kitchen, comprising a range of matching wall and base units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit and further space for appliances. There is a spacious double bedroom with a useful inbuilt wardrobe, and a bathroom with modern white suite.

The property is superbly located close to the banks of the Thames and within a short walk of Hammersmith station, as well as numerous bus routes linking the surrounding area. There are a variety of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants within a short walk in this fantastic central location.

Viewings are strongly recommended.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Beauclerc Road, Brackenbury Village, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
This substantial six bedroom family home offers one of the most generous internal footprints in Brackenbury Village, spanning just shy of 2800 Sq’ – 259 SqM. Spread across five storeys, you’re greeted by a welcoming entry hallway leading onto the vast 30’ bay-fronted double reception - featuring a gas fireplace and original cornicing - and also onto the kitchen dining room. To the rear of the house you’ll find a traditional wooden kitchen and dedicated dining room, flooded with natural light from both the ceiling lantern and French doors leading onto the private 30’ garden. Surrounded by mature beds, the paved garden provides a natural extension of the house as an al fresco entertaining and dining space. The first floor comprises a bedroom, currently used as a home office, dedicated utility room and separate w/c as well as the palatial principal suite. The generous principal bedroom leads onto an en-suite with bath, separate shower and double sinks. A further three double bedrooms and family bathroom can be found across the second floor while the third floor offers a sixth double bedroom with en-suite, an ideal au pair’s room or dedicated guest room. With each room in the home as well-proportioned as the last, the home offers a light and airy feeling throughout. You’ll find swathes of oak flooring, ample built-in storage in each bedroom, eaves storage and a the bonus of a natural cellar offering the opportunity to further extend across the existing ground floor footprint subject to the normal planning consents. Beautifully presented throughout, the house offers buyers with their own design aspirations the opportunity to imagine the phenomenal, flexible floorplan to their exacting requirements alongside the enticing prospect of adding further square footage – and value – to the home.

Lined with mature trees and handsome Victorian homes, Beauclerc Road is a Village favourite where residents enjoy a strong sense of community and the occasional street party. The amenities of Brackenbury Village, Hammersmith Grove and Goldhawk Road are all a short stroll from your front door; you’ll enjoy family-friendly gastro pubs, local cafés, delis and restaurants and a long-established butcher shop. The wider amenities of King Street are just over 10 minutes on foot and Askew Village is a 15 minute walk. Three Green Flag Award-winning parks are nearby: Both Ravenscourt Park, with its cafés, garden centre, playgrounds, paddling pool, football, basketball and tennis courts and calendar of events and Cathnor Park are a 9 minute stroll from your front door while Brook Green with its café, playground and tennis courts is just over 10 minutes away. World class shopping, dining and entertainment options can be found at Westfield Shopping Centre – just over 15 minutes on foot or a 5 minute drive. Families are spoilt for choice with exceptional state and independent schools a short stroll away such as Ofsted Outstanding Brackenbury Primary School and the highly desirable co-ed West London Free School. Independent options include co-ed Ravenscourt Park Preparatory School, all-girls Bute House Preparatory School, co-ed Latymer Upper and all-girls St Paul’s and Godolphin & Latymer schools – both ranked first and second in the nation respectively by Times Parent Power 2021. Superb transport options include Goldhawk Road station (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines) and Hammersmith Broadway (Piccadilly, District, Circle and Hammersmith & City lines as well as artery bus links to central London). Keen cyclists will benefit from bespoke sunken bike storage cleverly secreted in the front garden.

detailedDescription:
The property opens into a spacious 28'3ft double reception room that boasts a stunning traditional limestone fireplace, built-in shelving perfect for a library area, a front bay window, and a glass window that looks through to the rear kitchen. At the rear, the dining room is part separated from the kitchen and features a duplicate limestone fireplace and a built-in seating area.

The kitchen has been fitted with built-in appliances including a wine cooler and gas stove, and has an abundance of storage throughout. There are skylights that stretch the length of the kitchen and dining room that allow for plenty of natural light. The kitchen opens into a charming patio garden provides a tranquil green space with built-in planters that surround this space. On the lower ground floor, there is a useful utility room and cellar for storage. There is potential to enlarge the existing basement, subject to planning permission.

On the first floor is the principal bedroom which is an expansive space that benefits from a large bay window, wall-length fitted wardrobes, hardwood flooring and a large ensuite. The ensuite has a whirlpool bathtub, shower, double vanity unit and bidet. There is a WC and a further double bedroom with wall-length shelving currently used as a home office. On the second floor, there are two large double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, an ensuite and a shared bathroom.

The top floor comprises of an exceptional studio that features a central atrium which floods the room with light. This spacious room can be used as the principal bedroom and benefits large sliding doors that lead out onto a balcony with beautiful views of the street.

This is an expansive townhouse with the potential to extend further, creating a perfect home for a large family.

Radipole Road is located moments from the many amenities and green spaces of Parsons Green. Positioned on the north side of Fulham Road, with an abundance of eateries, restaurants, and shops on the doorstep.

Parsons Green Underground Station (District line) is a short walk away with fantastic transport links into Central London. Fulham Road is well connected with buses serving Chelsea and the West End.

detailedDescription:
A fantastic three bedroom apartment situated in the Television Centre with a private terrace and parking.

Location

Located in the heart of White City. The former bbc Television Centre sits on Wood lane, next to Westfield West London.
With White City Station (approximately 0.1 mile, Central line), Wood Lane (approximately 0.1 mile, Hammersmith & City and Circle lines) and Shepherds Bush (approximately 0.6 miles, Central line and Overground lines) stations on your doorstep. Television Centre is served by excellent Underground, Overground, bus and road routes into the West End, the City and Canary Wharf.

The historic forecourt offers many restaurants, cinema, television studios, health club, spa and a Soho House. Ideally located with access to the glorious open space of Hammersmith Park boasting a Japanese Garden, a gated children's play area, bowling green, tennis courts and five-a-side football pitches.

Description

A fantastic three bedroom apartment situated in the historic bbc Television Centre with a private terrace. This bright apartment benefits from a large open-plan kitchen/reception room creating exceptional entertaining/family space. The sunlit reception has the advantage of a large floor-to-ceiling sliding door which leads out to the spacious private terrace and enjoys views of Hammersmith Park.

This flat comprises of three double bedrooms. The principal bedroom has the benefit of a walk-in wardrobe and en suite bathroom with underfloor heating. The second bedroom can be found alongside, benefiting from the large window overlooking the communal gardens and allows for an abundance of light to enter the property. The third bedroom sits beside the reception and has two access points one via sliding door and second from the hall way and makes use of the contemporary family bathroom.

The apartment further has useful inbuilt store room in the hall.

This delightful apartment has parking and can make use of access to the excellently equipped Soho House gym, swimming pool, cinema and a twenty-four hour concierge service.

Square Footage: 1389 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 972 years remaining

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An elegant six bedroom Victorian family home in an excellent position close to the prestigious Hammersmith Grove.

Location

Situated in Brackenbury Village the property is within easy reach of sought after schools, as well as excellent local shops and restaurants. Just minutes away from this property are Hammersmith Station (Hammersmith and City, District and Piccadilly Lines), Goldhawk Road Station (Hammersmith and City Line) and Shepherds Bush Station (Overground and Central Lines). There is also a good network of buses servicing central London.

Description

Located in the heart of Brackenbury village, this substantial Victorian family house offers six bedrooms and exceptional entertaining space, with a charming garden. Arranged over four floors, the layout is very effective, with a cleverly configured ground floor providing high ceilings and incredible living space.

This beautiful home enjoys an elegant double reception room to the front of the house with two stunning fireplaces. Steps then go down onto a fully fitted kitchen and dining area which benefits from an abundance of light and space. To the rear, large doors open onto a charming paved garden and ample storage is further provided in a substantial cellar.

The first floor offers a spacious hallway and study area, cloakroom and fully equipped utility room. A large master suite is located on this level benefitting from excellent storage and high ceilings. The large master bathroom is both luxurious and stylish.

The second floor offers three double bedrooms and a family bathroom and there is a further bedroom on the top floor with a bathroom and additional eaves storage. The house has fabulous proportions, with a family feel throughout and benefits from plenty of storage and period features throughout.

Square Footage: 2349 sq ft
