address: Shepherd's Bush Road, Brook Green, Shepherd's Bush, London W6
detailedDescription:
Freehold available separately - Set across the first, second and third floors of this handsome Victorian house in a prime location moments from excellent Shepherd’s Bush and Brook Green amenities, this generous three double bedroom maisonette measures in excess of 1300 Sq’ – 120 SqM. Newly redecorated and beautifully presented both inside and out, it offers a turn-key home to discerning buyers. First floor comprises the first of three double bedrooms, a modern family bathroom and the fantastic principal suite complete with the unique bonus of a walk-in dressing room. You’ll also find a sunny, fully decked private garden terrace on the first floor which offers a wonderful outside space perfect for lounging, BBQs and al fresco entertaining. The second floor houses the third double bedroom, contemporary shower room and the phenomenal reception room with vaulted ceiling open to the kitchen/dining room on the third floor. The home, which offers a floor plan to rival many local terraced cottages, provides an abundance of natural light and superb storage solutions throughout.

The exceptional location of this maisonette offers the owner a wealth of amenities on their doorstep. Whether it’s a cup of artisan coffee or a freshly baked loaf from Gail’s, a pint from Sindercombe Social, a taste of Italy from Pizza Fresco or vegan delights from Eat of Eden, an unbeatable selection of local options are moments from your doorstep. For world class shopping, entertainment and dining experiences, Westfield Shopping Centre is just a 7 minute stroll. The newly developed bbc Television Centre and White City House are approximately 15 minutes on foot, offering additional options including Chelsea favourite Bluebird and Michelin starred Endo at the Rotunda. Awash with local events, a strong sense of community pervades this pretty patch of West London. Farmer’s market enthusiasts will enjoy the ten minute stroll to the Brook Green Market and Kitchen, open on Wednesdays and Saturdays. With Shepherd’s Bush Green, Brook Green and Hammersmith Park all a short walk away, you’re spoilt for choice when it comes to West London’s most beautiful open spaces. Commuters benefit from superb transport links including a 6 minute stroll to Goldhawk Road station (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines); Shepherd’s Bush station (Central line) is less than 10 minutes on foot whilst a variety of artery bus links will wing you into central London.

Call Horton and Garton, your local market-leading agent, to diarise your viewing.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Aldensley Road, Brackenbury Village, London W6
detailedDescription:
Nestled in a tree lined Brackenbury Village Street, this natural three storey home offers a flexible floorplan, four / five double bedrooms and the possibility to further extend into the loft (STPP). A beautiful example of classic Victorian architecture, the raised ground floor comprises a bay-fronted formal reception room and two double bedrooms. Down the stairs to the natural lower ground floor, you will find a fabulous double reception room and kitchen/dining room to the rear leading onto a paved garden with mature raised beds. A w/c completes the lower ground floor footprint. Across the first floor you will find two further double bedrooms and a spacious family bathroom featuring a roll top bath and separate shower. Dedicated bike and bin storage areas to the back and front of the house complete the home. The house offers a generous floorplan more than 1533 Sq’ – 142 SqM and comes with the opportunity to extend further into the loft space to create an additional double bedroom with en-suite – perfect for buyers who are keen to add value and explore their own grand designs. Exuding period charm with its original feature fireplaces and swathes of wooden flooring, this family home is utterly charming throughout.

Aldensley Road is an iconic Brackenbury Village Street offering a one-minute stroll to Village shops including Pekoe Mellow Tea House and Stenton Family Butcher with two family-friendly gastro pubs just three minutes on foot. In less than 10 minutes you are delivered to the beautiful Green Flag Award-winning Ravenscourt Park with its tennis, basketball and football courts, cafés, garden centre, playgrounds, paddling pool, annual calendar of events and more. Riverside’s Furnivall Gardens and the walks, vistas, historic pubs, and water sports available on the River Thames are under 15 minutes on foot from your front door. Excellent amenities abound with King Street and Hammersmith Grove a short stroll away and world class entertaining, dining, and shopping options of Westfield a 6-minute drive. Enjoy independent gems like the Brackenbury Wine Rooms, Patri, The Grove and Bertotti – all a 3-minute walk from your front door. Families will benefit from the Ofsted Outstanding catchments offered by the coveted West London Free School and Earls Court Free School primaries, just 4 minutes to the school gates on foot. Independent co-educational Ravenscourt Park Preparatory and all-girls Bute House Preparatory are both nearby. Secondary school options are equally superb with West London Free School just over 10 minutes on foot as well as independent options like Latymer Upper and all-girls Godolphin & Latymer and St Paul’s Girls’ School, currently ranked second and first in the nation by Times Parent Power 2021, respectively. For commuters, Hammersmith Broadway (Piccadilly, District, Circle and Hammersmith & City lines and artery bus links to central London) and Ravenscourt Park station (District line) are under 10 minutes on foot.

Call the team at Horton and Garton, Brackenbury Village’s Number 1 market leader, to diarise you are viewing.

This stunning five-bedroom house sits on Binden road, a beautiful tree lined street moments away from Ravenscourt and Wendell park.

The house was refurbished throughout by the current owner and set to the highest of standards.

Upon entering the house you see it is set across three levels. Immeditaly to the left is the double recpetion, which is currnelty set up as a home office at the back. There is ample light through these rooms as this is south facing. Plenty of original feautures throughout also with cast iron fireplaces.

Leading to the back is the modern kitchen which is where you head on out to the garden through the french doors. You will also find the entrance to the cellar as you exit the ktichen to see the rest of this lovely home. This is set up as a full utility area.

The first floor is set up with two large doubles, a huge family bathroom in the middle and also a separate WC. The master bedroom has shower fitted ensuite.

Moving to the top floor, the layout is as follows; three more double bedrooms, another shower room and also a huge loft space you could look at extending into subject to planning.

Binden Road sits on the borders of Chiswick and Hammersmith, close to the open spaces of Ravenscourt Park. Askew Road provides an ever-expanding range of amenities including butchers, coffee shops and a selection of delis, boutiques and niche suppliers.

Transport links are excellent with Stamford Brook station (District Line) being 0.6 miles away by foot as well as easy access to the M4 and Heathrow for the motorist. There are also a number of excellent maintained state and independent schools for all ages in close proximity.

detailedDescription:
*Available for live online viewing*
The Helios, Television Centre is considered a mid-century modern masterpiece, with its circular bands of original Crittall windows and central golden statue. This new apartment comprises 613 sq ft of contemporary living space, with a bright and spacious open-plan reception with breakfast bar, and luxury fitted kitchen with high-spec appliances. The double bedroom has fitted wardrobes and a stylish family bathroom. The Television Centre is the reinvention of a London landmark into a working, living, thriving community with television studios, independent restaurants, a Soho House hotel, an art-house cinema, and a 25,000 square foot leisure facility including a premium health club, pool and spa. Residents also benefit from a 24-hour concierge, residents' lounge with outdoor seating and, Japanese landscaped gardens. Direct routes to public transport include the step-free Wood Lane underground station which is only 21 minutes to King Cross St Pancras, and White City underground station only 14 minutes to Oxford Circus. Both are just 0.1 miles / approx 2 minutes' walk away. Hammersmith Park is only 0.4 miles, with a gated children's play area, a bowling green and tennis court.

detailedDescription:
Lillie Square offers garden square living in a distinctive new development in Earls Court, London's new prime residential address.

An exceptional apartment with panoramic views of Central London is set amongst modern garden squares, with a private members' club and 5-star concierge service.

The apartment has been stylishly finished to the highest standard with Bulthaup bespoke kitchens including Miele appliances, contemporary bathrooms and underfloor heating and comfort cooling throughout.

This light and spacious flat which spans 940 sq. Ft and covers two stories, is located a stone's throw away from Barons Court tube station and in good decorative order. The raised ground floor which on entry has an original Victorian tiled entrance hall, offers an impressive double reception room which benefits from high ceilings, original floorboards, stained glass windows and cornicing. There is a separate kitchen and access to a balcony which leads onto a private patio garden. On the lower ground floor there are two spacious double bedrooms which are served by a modern bathroom. The flat also has the advantage of being accessed from both the raised ground floor and the lower ground floor.

Margravine Gardens is located in the heart of Barons Court and is a short walk from the local amenities of Palliser Road and Queens Club. Wider amenities can be found on the nearby North End Road and the Curtains Up pub is a small stroll away along with the renowned butcher hg Walter.
title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A smart, recently refurbished 2 bedroom conversion flat situated on the ground floor, which features bright open-plan living space and a great location, just moments from Fulham Broadway.

Dawes Road provides a convenient range of local amenities, while the shops and bars of Fulham Road and Fulham Broadway Underground Station (District Line) are also nearby.

This fantastic property also offers excellent transport links to and from London, with Goldhawk Road Underground Station (Circle, District, Hammersmith & City Lines) moments away.

address: Lime Grove, Shepherd's Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
This lower ground share free hold flat comprises of two bedrooms one bath with empal storage space providing a unique opertunity for comfortable living. This fabulous two bedroom apartment is oozing with charm and character. Unique and individual the property boasts a stunning bright reception room with feature red brick walls which is a rear aspect. Two generous master bedroom and one family bathroom. Well-presented throughout and conveniently situated, this is a rare opportunity to purchase in such a historic local landmark property.

Private entrance.
Location:
Situated at the Uxbridge road end of Lime grove in close proximity to, Shepherds Bush market and Shepherds Bush tube stations (Offering Hammersmith and City, Circle and Central lines). Shepherds Bush green and Westfield London are also just moments away.
title: 2 bed flat for sale

address: Bulwer Street, Shepherd Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
Located on a quite road in Shepherds Bush with in walking distance to Westfield Shopping centre.

The accommodation comprises three generous sized bedrooms and a huge reception room. Private garden, fully tiled bathroom and a fitted kitchen as well as an garden (private to the apartment). Offered with no onward chain.

This development is perfect for a rental investment and for an end user alike. Early viewings highly recommended as we feel this will go fast! We have specifically asked the vendor not to refurb the apartment as we want any incoming buyer to have full control of the future refurbishment.

Bulwer street is moments away from Westfield Shopping Centre and within easy reach of the three underground lines, Overground and bus links of Shepherds Bush. Uxbridge Road nearby has a range of popular cafes, gastropubs and independent shops.
title: 3 bed detached house for sale

address: Castletown Road, West Kensington, London W14
detailedDescription:
An exceptionally well presented one bedroom ground floor flat that is elegant and stylish throughout. With its large south facing bay window and 3.5m high ceiling, the living room benefits from an abundance of natural light. Both the living room and bedroom offer stripped wooden floors and a full complement of original architectural features including sumptuous feature fireplaces and large ceiling roses. The property further comprises a modern fitted kitchen with integrated units/appliances and a triple aspect modern fitted shower room. The flat's exterior and the communal porch and hallway have been recently redecorated.

Castletown Road boasts excellent transport connections. West Kensington and Barons Court underground stations are a very short walk away as are a range of cafes, restaurants and pubs, and several supermarkets. The extensive amenities of Kensington High Street and Fulham Broadway are within a mile's walk. Those travelling by car will benefit from convenient access to the A4/M4.

detailedDescription: An exceptional 6 double bedroom 3 bathroom end of terrace house with excellent living/entertaining space on the ground floor and a wonderful landscaped southerly garden and roof terrace. address: Fulham Reach, Distillery Road, London W6
detailedDescription:
Fulham Reach offers the ultimate in London riverside living. Located on one of the most dramatic stretches of the River
Thames, this is London riverside living at its finest, all just eight minutes by underground from South Kensington
and 11 minutes from Knightsbridge.

The apartments make the most of their prime waterside position, with interiors inspired by one of three exclusive palettes, created by world-class interior designers.

Every resident becomes a member of an exclusive lifestyle club, featuring a host of private facilities from a screening room to the finest spa and swimming pool. A state-of-the-art gymnasium to the latest virtual golf simulator. Set in an elegant landscaped environment, on the north bank of a green and tranquil stretch of the River Thames.

detailedDescription:
A stylish recently redecorated two double bedroom flat with a roof terrace, located a short walk from Parsons Green

The property is set over the first and second floor of this Victorian property, offering over 1,110 sq ft (103.5 sq m) of space. On the first floor is a spacious open plan reception room/kitchen with space for dining and a balcony at the front, the smart kitchen has integrated appliances and a breakfast bar. On the second floor is the master bedroom with built in storage and en suite shower room as well as a large eaves storage space, there is a further double bedroom and a main bathroom. On the top floor is the fantastic South-West facing roof terrace. The property is presented in very good condition throughout.

Shottendane Road is in an excellent location just off the Fulham Road and only 400m from Parsons Green underground station (District Line, Zone 2) and ‘the Green’ itself. There is a Waitrose supermarket nearby as is the famous White Horse Pub and numerous independent shops, cafes and restaurants located on the Fulham Road, New Kings Road and Parsons Green close to hand. Fulham Broadway is also only a short stroll away through the park where there is a Wholefoods market, a Vue cinema, David Lloyd gym and a plethora of other amenities.

detailedDescription:
We are delighted to bring to the market this 4 bedroom, 3 bath house with an extra cinema room/bedroom to the loft, arranged over 2,002 sq ft (186 sq m). To the ground floor there is a double reception with a bay window, original ornate cornice and wooden flooring, an extended kitchen breakfast room leading onto the southwest facing garden, ground floor WC and cellar. The first floor has three double bedrooms and a family bathroom. The second floor has two bedrooms and two bathrooms (one ensuite).

Darlan Road is a quiet residential street located just off the Fulham Road, very close to Parsons Green underground station (District Line, Zone 2). The house is in close proximity to a range of excellent restaurants, independent cafes and boutique shops. There's also a very convenient Sainsbury's on Fulham Road, as well as a large Waitrose and Whole Foods supermarket in nearby Fulham Broadway. You can catch regular buses from the Fulham Road into Chelsea and towards Central London

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
The property opens on the ground floor into a spacious hallway with built-in storage at the entrance. Leading round to the front reception room that has been designed to a contemporary style throughout that boasts a large bay window, modern fireplace and built-in drawers/shelving.

The entire ground floor is open-plan, with a wonderful modern kitchen/dining room at the rear that has been fitted with integrated appliances (including miele, atag and siemens), a kitchen island and a large skylight that floods the room with natural light. Through wide sliding glass doors, the house opens into a beautiful decked garden with a charming cottage-style shed and a magnolia tree, creating a perfect entertainment space for families.

The lateral lower ground floor is made up of two interconnecting reception rooms with a central modern staircase, good ceiling height and natural light throughout. The rear reception room has floor-to-ceiling fitted wardrobes with LED underlighting on either side of the room, and has access to the garden above. The front reception room spans 34'7 ft with a large bay window and fitted drawers, creating a wonderful media room. There is a useful utility room with miele washing machine and dryer, and a WC on this floor.

On the first floor is the principal bedroom that features a large bay window, wall-length fitted wardrobes, and a large ensuite bathroom. The ensuite has a walk-in shower, bathtub, double vanity unit and further storage. There is a further bedroom and shared bathroom on this floor.

The second floor comprises of three double bedrooms, the largest bedroom is located at the front with three large windows that flood with natural light and fitted wardrobes. The third floor has a bathroom and a spacious double bedroom with a juliet balcony, fitted wardrobes, skylights and large eaves storage.

This is a wonderful house that has been elegantly designed throughout to create a charming home for a growing family.

Tournay Road is an attractive tree-lined street close to all the comprehensive amenities of Fulham Broadway, while Parsons Green is only a short walk away.

Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green underground stations are within walking distance which services the District line to Central London. There are many useful bus routes close by.

address: Bishops Mansions, Bishops Park Road, Fulham SW6
detailedDescription:
A beautifully apportioned 2 bedroom second floor flat with two good size reception rooms, one with log burner, and the other south/south westerly facing kitchen/diner at the rear for afternoon and evening sunlight. There is a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a Victorian fireplace and a second bedroom with French windows opening onto a private balcony overlooking Bishop’s Parks tennis courts, ideal office space or second bedroom. The flat benefits from a communal garden at the rear, small private shed and shared bike facility.

Bishop’s Mansions is considered to be the premier mansion block in Fulham, located by the conservation area of Bishop’s Park with its frontage onto River Thames and overlooking the Putney rowing clubs. As well as Bishop’s Park the flat has good access to the cafes, the walled garden of Bishop’s Palace, good sports facilities (tennis, gym, bike rental, rowing) and the River Path to Riverside Studios for the performing arts, film, restaurants and pubs.

Putney Bridge (District Line) is the closest underground station with good bus service to Hammersmith (District, Piccadilly, Metropolitan and Circle Lines) and buses to South Kensington, Chelsea and Westfield.

Exclusively marketed with johns&co.

A stunning house presented in immaculate condition. Exceptionally high quality materials have been used throughout to create a stylish home in arguably the finest location in Parsons Green. detailedDescription:
With just under 1,300 sq ft of accommodation this amazing apartment offers huge amounts of living space. Entrance hall to large open plan living room with modern kitchen and private balcony. Three spacious double bedrooms with the principal bedroom benefitting from an en-suite dressing room and shower room. There is a further family bathroom, good storage space and a secure allocated parking space.

Further benefits include good storage, private underground lockable storage facilities for bicycles and twin lift facility with block manager/porter.

The property is a few minutes walk to the Central Line (White City) and Hammersmith and City line (Wood Lane) facilitating easy access in to The City and The West End as well as other good local transport links including Shepherds Bush Overground station and it is well connected to the M40, M4 and around 30mins drive to London Heathrow.

The block itself sits above a Sainsbury's supermarket and health/gp surgery and is opposite a small parade which includes a coffee shop and dry cleaners. Westfield shopping centre is nearby offering a large selection of high street stores including John Lewis and luxury brand designer 'Village'.

Local amenities include the newly developed bbc television centre which includes a wealth of new restaurants and bars including the recently opened Soho House members club and multiscreen Everyman cinema.

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
It is with a heavy heart that our client, after some 40 or more years, says goodbye to this much loved Victorian family house, which is set in a quiet street, in W14 on the fringes of High Street Kensington and Holland Park. It enjoys excellent communications and facilities, including a variety of good schools, shops, and places of entertainment, with the delightful St Pauls gardens just across the road, to which you have access.

The House retains all the lovely original features. With high ceilings to all principal rooms, but it would now benefit from some tender loving care. We are reliably informed that, with the appropriate planning permission, the house could be extended upwards, downwards and outwards, if required.

However, there is presently, at least 1857 ft of living space, which includes the double drawing room with its corniced ceiling, a kitchen/ dining room, four bedrooms, family bathroom, shower room, guests cloakroom, and a sizeable cellar, providing good storage. The West facing enchanting garden, leading off the kitchen/dining room is full of colour. Surrounded by mellowed walls, over which scented roses and flowering shrubs tumble, it's well established flowering borders and immaculate lawn make it a wonderful setting for entertaining, or just enjoyment all the year round.

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented family home, located on Sulivan Road in Parsons Green

Location

Sulivan Road is a quiet street located between Hurlingham Park and South Park. The nearest underground station is Parsons Green (approximately 0.7 miles) and there is an excellent bus route along the New Kings Road in to Chelsea and the West End (approximately 0.5 miles).
The area has an excellent selection of nursery, primary and secondary schools including Pippa Pop Ins, Thomas's Fulham and Lady Margarets.

Description

On the ground floor you'll find an entrance hallway, leading you through to a beautifully finished modern kitchen, featuring Gaggenau appliances and kitchen island. There is plenty of room for dining and relaxing and floor to ceiling sliding glass doors that access a generous landscaped garden. The ground floor also has a guest W.C.

The lower ground floor hosts an elegant reception room/media room, a modern family bathroom and the fourth bedroom, which could be used as a study.

The main sleeping accommodation is located on the upper floors, consisting of two large double bedrooms (one of which is en suite) and a modern family bathroom. The principal suite is located on the top floor with a luxurious en suite bathroom with sauna and a private balcony with wonderful views across Parsons Green tennis club. All three bedrooms benefit from extensive built-in wardrobes.

The property further benefits from solar panels on the roof and a sprinkler system in the kitchen and basement.

Square Footage: 2355 sq ft

A light, spacious, and neutrally decorated first floor maisonette flat. The property encompasses the top three floors of the building, has a separate living room and kitchen, two bathrooms, and four bedrooms. Large, double glazed windows bathe the property in natural light throughout. Located in the heart of Fulham the flat benefits from local amenities but is sheltered from the rush of the Broadway.

Living Room (69.80m (229))

The first floor living room is bright and spacious with two large windows that look out over Dawes Road. The room features a small electric fire and high Victorian ceilings.

Kitchen Dining Room (44.20m (145))

The kitchen-cum-dining-room is well proportioned and looks out over the rear of the property. The large Southerly facing window make the room bright and inviting and the kitchen provides ample storage. Current kitchen appliances in place (oven, dishwasher, fridges) are included in the sale of the property if desired.

Shower Room (12.19m (40))

The first floor shower room is compact and functional with a built-in shower and WC. The room also doubles as a utility room and houses the washing machine and dryer, both of which are included in the sale if desired.

Bedroom 2 (40.23m (132))

Located on the second floor of the flat the second bedroom faces the rear of the property and is well-proportioned with built-in storage.

Bedroom 3 (33.53m (110))

Bedroom 3, also located on the second floor of the building, faces the front of the property, looking out over Dawes Road. The room benefit from large built-in storage.

Bedroom 4 (42.67m (140))

Bedroom 4 is adjacent to Bedroom 3, also faces the front of the property, and has built-in storage.

Bathroom

The second floor bathroom, which is located immediately above the first floor bathroom, has a combination bath-shower and is tastefully decorated.

Master Bedroom (63.40m (208))

The top floor master bedroom is spacious and light. It has several skylights and under-eaves storage.

This 72sqm (774 Sqft) apartment comprises of 2 well propositioned bedrooms, a modern fitted kitchen with integrated appliances including hob oven and extractor fan, built in dishwasher, washing machine and fridge freezer, a contemporary 3 piece shower room suite. detailedDescription:
Located moments from Eel Brook Common, this property is presented in excellent condition throughout and offers a unique opportunity to purchase a freehold house of this size.

The ground floor offers fantastic entertaining space in the form of a large reception room and eat in kitchen with superb ceiling height, partially divided by a pretty courtyard garden. The house has superb light due to south facing nature and there are windows and roof lights in abundance.

The first floor comprises two double bedrooms and a bathroom and the recently added upper floor has wonderful vaulted ceilings designed to be a studio space but could be used as a third bedroom as it also has its own shower room.

Moore Park Road is ideally positioned just on the Chelsea/Fulham border and conveniently located for the shops and restaurants of the fashionable King's Road, along with the fantastic transport links of Fulham Road. The nearest underground station is within five minutes walk at Fulham Broadway (District line).

title: 2 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A magnificent and beautifully presented Victorian maisonette with three / four double bedrooms, three bath / shower rooms, and offered for sale with no chain. Spacious accommodation is laid out over three floors and the property benefits from owning a share of the freehold, and there is a long lease with 102 years unexpired. This maisonette is in a Victorian mid terraced “Lion House” and is located in the ever-popular Peterborough Estate, which has a real sense of community. Conveniently close to Eel Brook Common and Parsons Green with the shops, restaurants and cafes on the Kings Road and Wandsworth Bridge Road all within a short walk. The closest underground station is Fulham Broadway (District line zone 2), and Parsons Green station also nearby. There are also plenty of buses that you can pick up on the Kings Road itself that run into Chelsea and towards central London. South Park, Hurlingham Park, Chelsea Harbour, and the River Thames are all close by.

A communal entrance hallway with an entry phone system leads to the first-floor private entrance. The split level first floor landing is accessed via a solid timber private front door, and there is an alarm panel and doors to all rooms. The sitting reception room is front aspect, south facing, and light floods in through a large, double-glazed sash window with window shutters, and French style doors to the balcony. There is a Chesneys limestone character feature fireplace with a gas coal effect fire, and custom-made storage cupboards with shelving above built into the alcoves. Internal bi-folding solid wood doors lead to the dining reception room with a Chesneys limestone character feature fireplace, and a large double glazed sash window. The dining room could easily be used as a fourth double bedroom. The kitchen dining reception room is rear aspect and has a range of modern fitted units with granite worksurfaces. An extensive range of integrated Smeg appliances include oven, four ring hob, extractor fan and dishwasher. There is an integrated fridge freezer, space and plumbing for a washing machine, rear aspect sash window and ample space for a dining table and chairs. The modern fitted Megaflow Worcester Bosch gas central heating combination boiler is floor mounted. There is a family bathroom and W.C with a modern fitted white suite with a bath with a handheld shower attachment. There is a wall mounted sink unit, two double glazed frosted windows, chrome heated towel rail and a limestone tiled floor.

Stairs lead to the second-floor landing with a large double glazed Velux window with an integrated blind and doors to all rooms. The master bedroom suite is rear aspect and has a spacious double bedroom, double glazed sash window and a door to the en-suite bathroom and W.C. There is a modern fitted white suite with a bath with a handheld shower attachment and an overhead shower attachment. There is a vanity sink unit, chrome heated towel rail, double glazed Velux window with an integrated blind and a limestone tiled floor.

Stairs lead to the third-floor landing with doors to all rooms. There is front aspect second double bedroom with a large double glazed Velux window with an integrated blind and an interconnecting door leads to the third bedroom. A further door leads to the en-suite shower room and W.C with a shower cubicle with overhead shower attachment. There is a wall mounted sink unit, chrome heated towel rail, large double glazed Velux window with an integrated blind and a limestone tiled floor. The third double bedroom is rear aspect and has two double glazed Velux windows with integrated blinds. Additional features include high ceilings with cornicing, a Banham alarm system, double glazed sash windows and gas central heating. Outside there is a small front aspect first floor balcony, bin storage, and residents parking (permits available via Hammersmith and Fulham council – Zone Q).

detailedDescription:
A stunning end of terrace Victorian house arranged over 3 floors located on a quiet residential street. The ground floor has an impressive 28 foot long reception room that is a superb entertaining space with ample room for both dining and relaxing in the living area. Leading on from the reception is the kitchen is that is open plan but separated by a single step raised platform. Access to the private patio is either through the rear entrance by the kitchen or the side entrance at the front of the house which is useful for bringing in larger items such as bikes.

The first floor comprises two spacious double bedrooms and the main bathroom with separate bathtub and shower cubicle. On the top floor is the main bedroom suite that enjoys access to a private south facing roof terrace and en suite bathroom.

Being end of terrace the whole house enjoys light coming in from the south and west throughout the day.

Prothero Road is a quiet residential road which offers superb transport links via either Fulham Broadway or West Brompton underground stations.

detailedDescription:
On the ground floor, there is a beautiful bespoke kitchen and dining room with a reception area beyond and bi-fold doors onto a patio garden. There is a further reception room which can be used as a garage with weight bearing for cars and accessed via Blake Gardens. There is also a guest cloakroom and WC on this floor.

On the lower ground floor, there is a spacious reception room with fitted storage, large skylights that floods the room with natural light and adjoins to a luxury sauna. There are two double bedrooms with ensuite showers and fitted wardrobes in the larger bedroom, a separate larder and a useful utility room on this floor. The basement level benefits tall head-height and underfloor heating throughout.

On the first floor, there is a spacious reception room with period features throughout, a study area at the rear, a large bay window, and further benefits a roof terrace and balcony. There is a bathroom on the half landing leading upstairs.

On the second floor, there are two double bedrooms, a third bedroom/study, and a further roof terrace.

The principal bedroom comprises of the third floor and boasts fitted wardrobes, an ensuite bathroom, and a balcony with enviable views overlooking the park. All bathrooms benefit from underfloor heating.

This is a wonderful family home with perfectly balanced living throughout, located on Fulham's most sought-after streets.

Musgrave Crescent runs along the eastern side of Eel Brook Common. The property is within easy reach of the amenities at Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway. The closest underground station is Fulham Broadway (District Line) and there are many useful bus routes.

detailedDescription: A beautiful period family house arranged over four floors, that offers practicality as well as a great feeling of space and definitely a home to settle down in. In this desirable and quiet position between Hammersmith Grove and Brackenbury Road, Benbow Road is a quiet and elegant street that has the benefit of good local shops, cafes and restaurants close at hand in Brackenbury Village and on Hammersmith Grove. Westfield, Central Line tube and Hammersmith Broadway (Main tube and bus station) are equidistant, and within a short walk. Goldhawk Road tube is also only a few minutes walk from the property. It is within the catchment area of good local primary schools and close to numerous nurseries as well as to Ravenscourt Park.

detailedDescription:
Located moments from the Fulham Road and Parsons Green, this stunning four bedroom family house is arranged over three floors and benefits from spacious living accommodation including a large formal reception room with bay window, wooden flooring, stunning fireplace and beautiful built in cabinetry.

To the rear of the house the kitchen / dining room has been fully extended with bi folding glass doors leading out onto the private garden. There is also a downstairs cloak room with utilities and storage.

On the first floor is the principal bedroom with large en suite bathroom, as well as the fourth bedroom which is currently used as a study. The third floor has two further double bedroom and a second, family bathroom which has a sash window and skylight.

Location

Bishops Road is conveniently located close to Parsons Green and the Fulham Road with many popular boutique shops, cafes and restaurants close by, including Megan’s by the Green, Hally’s and the Brown Cow.

Local transport links include Underground services via the District Line from either Parsons or Green Fulham Broadway, as well as good local bus routes.

There is an excellent selection of local nursery and primary schools.

A stunning two bedroom split-level apartment, with impressive views of the river

Location

detailedDescription:
A wonderfully bright and spacious two double bedroom flat measuring 969 sq ft arranged over the second floor of a Victorian building in a central Fulham location.
Situated on the second floor, this fantastic flat is presented in good condition throughout and offers a great combination of living and entertaining space. The unusually large reception room is in the middle of the flat and is the focal point of the property. It is light and bright and has a lovely feeling of space. Steps lead down to the fully fitted kitchen/dining room which has ample room for a good sized dining table. A door in the kitchen leads out to the pretty South-facing roof terrace offering another fantastic entertaining area during the warmer months. There are two generous sized double bedrooms, both of which have excellent storage by way of fitted wardrobes. They are served by the well-presented bathroom which is ideally located in between the bedrooms. The property would make an ideal flat for sharers with the similar sized bedrooms or a great rental investment.
The property is located on the Fulham Road so is therefore extremely convenient for the numerous surrounding shops, bars and restaurants and is also only a short walk from Parsons Green underground station.

Situated close to the River Thames, there are good transport links from Imperial Wharf and there is also the river taxi from Chelsea Harbour. The property benefits from on-site bars and restaurants, with the wide range of amenities of the Kings Road also within close proximity.<br /><br />

agency_name: John D Wood & Co. - Chiswick Sales
detailedDescription:
An incredibly rare opportunity to purchase this remarkable detached family house which offers fantastic development potential, a gated forecourt with off-street parking for multiple cars and a substantial south facing garden. Believed to have previously been used as a candle factory, this unique property provides great width and a vast amount of living space measuring approximately 3,365 square feet with excellent proportions and high ceilings throughout. The property has a vast amount of scope for redevelopment and modernisation.

The ground floor accommodation comprises three reception rooms, a dining room, study, utility, cloakroom and kitchen. French doors lead out from the rear reception to a magnificent south facing garden. The first floor provides four spacious bedrooms, an en-suite bathroom and an additional W/C. On the second floor there is a further kitchen/reception and three further rooms.

The property is in an excellent location privately positioned on the corner of Stamford Brook Road and the private road, Stamford Brook Gardens. The property is within a minutes’ walk of Stamford Brook Common, and is within a short walk from Stamford Brook (District Line) station, Turnham Green (District Line) station and Chiswick High Road.

*virtual viewing tour available upon request*

detailedDescription:
This striking share of freehold property is arranged over the ground floor of a charming period conversion in Fulham, just moments from the river. The flat is made up of two double bedrooms, a family bathroom and an impressive open-plan kitchen reception room to the rear. This room has very high ceilings, fantastic entertaining space and bifolding doors opening out to a large, private south-facing garden. There is a studio at the end of the garden which is an ideal space for anyone working from home.

Kenyon Street is a highly sought-after address in the Alphabet Streets, located next to the River Thames and the green spaces of Bishops Park. When it comes to transport, the property is an easy walk to the underground links at Hammersmith and Putney Bridge stations and there are frequent buses leaving from Fulham Palace Road which take you in and out of Central London. For families, there is a fantastic selection of local schools to choose from. Viewings are highly recommended!

detailedDescription:
Summary
A stunning 4 bedroom family house with 3 bathrooms located in Central Shepherds Bush moments from superb amenities including Westfield shopping centre and superb transport links.

Description
This well maintained and superbly presented period style family home benefits from four double bedrooms and three bathrooms (two of which are en suite). Arranged over three floors and located along this residential road in the heart of Shepherds Bush and moments away from the World famous Westfield shopping Centre and the superb transport links including multiple stations and bus routes.

The accommodation comprises of an entrance hall, double reception room with bay windows and a period fireplace, A generous proportioned kitchen/diner towards the rear and bi folding doors leading to the west Facing rear garden.
The first floor has a Master bedroom with a large en suite bathroom/wc, a second shower room/wc and a double bedroom. The half landing has a further double bedroom and the top floor boasts a large bedroom with under eaves storage and another ensuite shower room/wc.

Located within the catchment area of St Stephens School (CofE) which is rated outstanding by Ofsted.

Also located close by is Hammersmith Park with it's children's playground and Japanese style Gardens.

This is an exceptional family home and viewing is very highly recommended.

Studdridge Street is situated on the prestigious Peterborough Estate located moments from New Kings Road and Fulham Road with its many boutiques, restaurants and bars and also excellent bus links to Chelsea and The West End.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

The apartment consists of three bedrooms, One bathroom, Seperate WC, One reception room and a separate fully fitted kitchen, that is situated on the 2nd floor, requires updating with lift access.

Currently the flat has 54 years lease remaining with an extention option to purchase a share in the freehold 999 years lease, subject to Section 42 Notice conducted by the Vendors suggests an estimated premium guide price of circa £148,000 for the new longer lease.

The development is gated and has many benefits including access to communal gardens, service lift, heating and hot water included as well as a 24 hour security and porter.

Latymer Court is located to the west of Kensington High Street between Hammersmith Broadway and Olympia very close to the shopping and entertainment facilities of Kensington and Hammersmith. The nearest underground station is five minutes' walk away at Hammersmith Broadway (District, Metropolitan and Piccadilly lines) with a direct link to Heathrow, and road connections to all routes to the West.

detailedDescription:
Available on the Help to Buy Scheme

A bespoke, first-floor apartment with balcony, to be finished to an exceptional standard within the new, luxury 'Boot Court' development in this quiet, West London backwater. Westfield shopping centre, Ravenscourt & Wendell Parks and Askew village, with its plethora of independent retailers and restaurants, are all within the locality, as well as great transport links - short walks to Stamford Brook tube station, serviced by the District Line, and Uxbridge Road bus stops.

The flat will benefit from a German manufactured kitchen/living room with granite worktops and integrated Bosch kitchen appliances, sizeable bathroom with electric towel rail and branded sanitary ware, two bright and spacious bedrooms and will be fitted with LED lighting, new, acoustically compliable double-glazed windows and hardwood engineered flooring with underfloor heating throughout.

Communal areas will be tastefully designed with discreet lighting and modern, tiled floors.

Call today for your pre-launch on Saturday 12th June 2021 between 10am-12pm.

detailedDescription:
A stunning recently re modelled three double bedroom split level Maisonette on The Kings Road in London. This property has circa 1400sqft of internal space split over three floors with a private entrance on the side road allowing easy parking and access.

The first floor holds a large living and dining area with herringbone wood flooring, high ceilings and access on to a front balcony and rear flat roof accessed via double French doors allowing plenty of natural light and fresh air. The kitchen is off the mid landing with plenty of storage space and almost new appliances built in with beautiful worktops and backsplash.

The second floor holds two large double bedrooms with the rear bedroom benefitting from a small balcony and double doors, these bedrooms share a large bathroom suite with large walk in shower and separate bath.

The master suite is beautifully presented with glass balustrades ample storage and plenty of natural light along with access on to a large flat roof, the en suite bathroom again has a large walk in shower and separate bath .

The whole property has been totally refurbished with excellent attention to detail when it comes to fittings and interior design.

Located in the heart of Fulham amongst many popular cafes, restaurants and gastro-pubs. address: Haymarket House, 15 Wolverton Gardens, London W6
detailedDescription:
A fantastic contemporary two bedroom apartment found on Wolverton Gardens

Location

Wolverton Gardens is a very sought after residential street situated between Brook Green and Hammersmith, on land which was long used as a nursery supplying fruit and vegetables to the city of London. The location is popular, bordering Kensington and provides excellent schools including St Paul's Girls' school and Ecole Francaise de Londres Jacques Prevert. The property provides easy access to the A4 taking you straight to central London or out to the countryside, as well as excellent transport facilities including Hammersmith for the underground (0.2miles). An array of local shops, cafes, restaurants and delicatessens can be found close by with more extensive retail and entertainment facilities available at Westfield Shopping Centre.

Description

A fantastic contemporary apartment found in the Haymarket House building on Wolverton Gardens.
This apartment offers an open plan reception and fully fitted kitchen with a separate private dining area which could be used as a home office.
Along the corridor you will find the principle bedroom which offers an en suite bathroom with shower facilities and a second double bedroom which makes use of the family bathroom across the hall. The family bathroom offers both bath and shower facilities.
Useful built in cupboards are found in the hallway by the entrance door ideal for storage.
This apartment also has access to communal outside space, on ground level and a roof terrace and benefits further with a secure parking spot underground.

Square Footage: 829 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 120 years remaining

detailedDescription:
Wonderful two bedroom garden flat with private patio garden.

Location

Harwood Road runs between New Kings Road and Fulham Road in the very centre of Fulham Broadway. The underground services at Fulham Broadway, Eel Brook Common and numerous shops and restaurants are conveniently located to the property. The area has an excellent selection of schools including: Pippa Pop Ins, Millie's House nursery, Kensington Prep, Thomas's Fulham, Marie d'Orliac and Lady Margaret's.

Description

A wonderful two bedroom garden flat with extensive built-in storage and good sized private south west facing patio garden. With it's own front door, the entrance benefits from a cellar storage room (plumbed for utilities) and private built-in bike storage in front garden.

To the front is a spacious living room/dining room area. The separate kitchen features granite worktop and integrated appliances. To the rear is a sizeable bathroom with bath, overhead shower and underfloor heating, and the second double bedroom with views of the garden.

The Principal bedroom features extensive storage and en suite shower room, also with under floor heating, as well as access to the garden. The property is double glazed throughout and the entire building was recently upgraded by the freeholder.

Leasehold with approximately 159 years remaining

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Redmore Road, Brackenbury Village, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
This immaculate three bedroom family house, in the heart of beautiful Brackenbury Village, has been the subject of extensive refurbishment and offers discerning buyers a stunning turn-key home. The handsome bay-fronted Victorian house is located in leafy, residential Redmore Road and offers a floorplan spanning 1038 Sq’ – 96 SqM. The ground floor comprises a welcoming entry hall and a double reception room featuring wooden flooring, swathes of hand-built storage and a traditional wood burning stove opening onto a fantastic kitchen and adjacent dining room. Natural light floods these rooms via the vaulted glass ceiling and glass double doors leading onto a private garden complete with raised beds, apple tree and useful storage shed – ideal for al fresco dining and entertaining. A w/c completes the ground floor footprint. On the first floor, you’ll find a phenomenal principal bedroom with a wall of integrated bespoke wardrobes and a vaulted ceiling. A second bedroom also boasts sweeping ceilings and a third bedroom offers a dual aspect over the rear garden. A beautifully finished contemporary family bathroom - with bath, separate shower and exceptional ceiling height - completes the first floor. Each room in the home is uniquely light, bright and airy; the house effortlessly marries period charm and modern living.

Redmore Road is a well-loved Brackenbury Village street, ideally located a 5 minute stroll from the heart of the Village including the café and deli, family butcher and family-friendly gastro pubs. Also 5 minutes on foot you’ll find the beautiful open spaces of Green Flag Award-winning Ravenscourt Park which include two cafés, a garden centre, tennis courts, basketball courts, football pitches, three children’s playgrounds, a paddling pool, an annual calendar of events and much more. Riverside’s Furnivall Gardens and the walks, vistas and historic pubs found along the River Thames are 10 minutes from your front door. Excellent amenities abound with King Street and Hammersmith Grove a short stroll from your front door and world class entertaining, dining and shopping options of Westfield a 5 minute drive. Families will benefit from the Ofsted Outstanding catchment offered by the coveted John Betts Primary School, just 4 minutes to the school gates on foot. Independent co-educational Ravenscourt Park Prep is a 6 minute walk. Secondary school options are equally superb with West London Free School nearby as well as independent options like Latymer Upper and all-girls Godolphin & Latymer, currently ranked second in the nation by Times Parent Power 2021. For commuters, Ravenscourt Park station (District line) is 3 minutes on foot and Hammersmith Broadway (Piccadilly, District, Circle and Hammersmith & City lines as well as artery bus links to central London) is a 9 minute walk.

Call the team at Horton and Garton, Brackenbury Village’s Number 1 market leader, to diarise your viewing.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
This extremely stylish property is drenched in natural light and has been the subject of complete refurbishment throughout.
The property comprises on the first floor of two equal sized generous double bedrooms with luxurious carpets and light fittings, a beautiful bathroom with marble tiles and quality fittings and a storage/utility cupboard with plumbing for a washing machine and space for a dryer too.
Stairs, complete with bespoke carpet runner, lead up to the second floor which offers a glorious reception room with engineered washed oak flooring, Velux windows, a huge skylight and double doors to the Juliette balcony bring light flooding into this space. The kitchen dining room has under floor heating and houses the bespoke kitchen with quartz worktops, integrated appliances including a bosch oven and an induction hob. Double doors lead out to the private roof terrace with lighting and built in seating that opens for storage.

Location:
The Groves area of Shepherds Bush continues its relentless march to being one of the most fashionable and desirable family locations within the area. With two exceptional gastro pubs and a chic cafe on your doorstep and the increasingly charming and well cared for Wormholt park just down the road. Within close proximity you will also find the Westfield Shopping Complex and Circle, Central and Hammersmith & City underground Lines. It is difficult to imagine why you would not want to live here.

detailedDescription:
A stunning and well-presented three double bedroom period family house with a large private rear garden. This home is well loved, maintained and decorated throughout and has a warm family feel. Accommodation is perfectly balanced and comprises a light and airy double reception, complete with feature fireplace, period features and wood flooring which then leads to a separate study/home office with WC. The ground floor continues down to a large fully fitted kitchen which access into the side return and beyond to the well-appointed rear garden measuring in excess of 700 Square feet. Living accommodation on the first floor (split level), comprises three sizeable double bedrooms with the master incorporating an en-suite which encompasses the full width of the first floor. A family bathroom services the remaining two double bedrooms. Although this property has an excellent flow and space, further extension is possible (subject to planning) in line with other homes on the road where extensions into the rear side return and loft have been added.

Location:
Bloemfontein Road is well located for Shepherds Bush tube station on the Hammersmith and City and Central Line. Nearby are the shopping facilities of Westfield and the Uxbridge Road

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An outstanding first and second floor three double bedroom, two bathroom (one en-suite) Victorian Maisonette offering 1259 sqft / 117.01 sqm of living space and a lovely private garden. Beautifully presented and maintained by our clients, this fabulous apartment has high quality double glazing throughout, built in cupboards in all three bedrooms and a large loft space for storage too. Moreover, the property has its own private entrance and the high ceilings, large windows and wide landings create a fantastic light and airy home.

On the first floor there is a large, bright and spacious reception with alcove built in units and a feature fire place, two generous double bedrooms, a family bathroom and a fitted kitchen. An internal staircase leads down to a landscaped 40'2’’ private garden. On the top floor, there is a great sized master bedroom with an en-suite shower room. Subject to the usual consents, a "Pod" room could be added to the back addition, at second floor level, to provide a large double bedroom.

This super property is a stone’s throw from Bishops Park, the Thames Path and the Nuffield health club as well as the excellent shops, bars and restaurants on the Fulham Palace and Munster Roads. Putney Bridge underground station (District Line) and the regular bus services on the Fulham Palace Road to Hammersmith, Putney and the West End are close by too. Offered with a share of freehold, early viewing is highly recommended.

detailedDescription:
Situated on one of West London's most favoured squares is this truly wonderful 2 bedroom apartment with private front and rear gardens. Steps down your front garden lead you to your private entrance and onto the central hallway which provides access to all rooms.

To the front of the flat is a generous master bedroom with an abundance of natural light flooding in and views of the garden which has been thoughtfully stepped to maximise the view.

To the rear is the charming substantial reception room with French doors to the private landscaped west facing rear garden. The kitchen is to the side of the reception with a window overlooking the West facing garden. A second bedroom is also to the rear. A stunning bathroom with bath and separate shower sits beside an extremely useful utility room.

address: Wandsworth Bridge Road, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A fantastic five bedroom, four bathroom upper maisonette with a stunning roof terrace spanning nearly 2200 square feet is being sold with the freehold of the whole building (shop below on a long lease).

This substantial property boasts excellent proportions throughout with high ceilings, large windows and plenty of natural light flow. With its own front door on the ground floor, you enter into a wide entrance hall with stairs leading up to a double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom on the split level to the rear. The first floor comprises two further double bedrooms, one with a kitchenette and en-suite bathroom and a separate family bathroom to service the other bedroom.

There is another double bedroom with en-suite bathroom on the next split level to the rear. The impressive reception room on the second floor provides generous lateral space and boasts a beautiful period fireplace as a central feature. Next door you will find the large eat-in kitchen that leads to the gorgeous, west facing roof terrace. The fifth and final double bedroom occupies the entire third floor and has a kitchenette, en-suite bathroom and a balcony.

Conveniently located just a short walk to both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway tube stations, Imperial Wharf Overground station and Chelsea Harbour pier. The property is close to numerous local bars, restaurants and cafés on the Wandsworth Bridge Road and also to those on the Kings Road and Fulham Road. The Green open spaces of Eel Brook Common and South park are also very nearby.

detailedDescription:
A stunning six bedroom Victorian town house on Finlay Street and situated in the heart of the hugely desirable 'Alphabet Streets'. The house has been fully renovated to the highest of specifications, set over four floors and spanning 3,520 sqft it has been meticulously designed throughout, offering comfortable accommodation and is perfect for an ever-growing family.

As you enter on the ground floor you will find the reception room with high ceilings and wooden floors. The room has ample space for a large sofa, coffee table and chairs with the focal point being the fireplace with an attractive wood burner. There is underfloor heating running throughout with recessed ceiling speakers. The open plan kitchen / diner is at the rear of the house and overlooks the landscaped garden which is accessed by large bi-fold doors. The kitchen is fitted with all the modern appliances to include an integrated tall fridge and freezer, induction 6 zone hob with extractor above, Nespresso machine, double oven with microwave and wine fridge. It also benefits from underfloor heating and again has recessed ceiling speakers. You will also find a small guest W.C.

The large media room is situated on the lower ground floor with brilliant ceiling heights. It has underfloor heating and is perfect for entertaining. A large double bedroom is at the front of the house with an ensuite shower room. There is a utility room which doubles as a second kitchen, which has a washing machine, tumble dryer, microwave oven and fridge freezer. On the first floor is the master bedroom which is served by a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom which comprises a bath, walk in shower, sink with vanity mirror above, with underfloor heating. There is a further double bedroom with inbuilt storage along with bathroom. The second floor has three further bedrooms as well as a shower room.

Finlay street is a quiet residential street, it is situated in the popular 'Alphabet Streets' in the Bishops Park conservation area with Bishops Park and leafy riverside walks nearby. It is close to the river Thames and Bishop's Park, with fantastic transport links of Hammersmith Broadway (Circle, Hammersmith & City, Piccadilly and District lines) and Putney Bridge (District line) in close proximity, there are also bus routes into central London and beyond.

detailedDescription:
Summary
This is a superb freehold property in Barons Court, situated on a beautiful tree-lined street.

Description
Just shy of 1700sqft, the house offers fantastic accommodation arranged over three floors, comprising of two reception rooms, an eat in kitchen, four double bedrooms, a laundry room, three bathrooms and a large garden.
With original period features throughout, the property is full of character and charm. On the ground floor there are two reception rooms, leading through to the eat in kitchen at the rear. Accessed through the French doors off the kitchen, is a stunning south facing garden. There is a cloakroom under the staircase.
The first floor has a generous double bedroom overlooking the front garden, with the master suite with a huge dressing room, modern en-suite and a large balcony with room for table and chairs.
The second floor is made up of a further two double bedrooms, a generous family bathroom and a separate laundry room.
St. Dunstans is wonderfully located 0.3 miles from Barons Court Station (District and Piccadilly Lines), 0.6 miles from Hammersmith Station (District and Piccadilly Lines), with easy access into the city and a short walk to the River Thames path.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Wingate Road, Brackenbury Village, London W6
detailedDescription:
Situated on a leafy cul-de-sac in the heart of Brackenbury Village, you’ll find this lateral second (top) floor two double bedroom purpose built apartment offering a footprint of 634 Sq’ – 58.9 SqM with the unique bonus of a private garage. A welcoming entry hallway leads onto all of the main rooms including a fantastic south facing open plan reception/dining room with an adjacent open plan kitchen. Two double bedrooms and a family bathroom complete the floorplan. The apartment features zoned underfloor heating, remote blinds and built-in storage in each bedroom. Rarely found in the Brackenbury Village area, a private garage is included in the purchase of the home. Light, bright, well-proportioned and in good condition throughout, the apartment comes with no onward chain and its Share of the Freehold.

The apartment’s location is simply unparalleled. Set in quiet, residential Cressy Court, a popular gated development off beautiful Wingate Road and moments from Green Flag Award-winning Ravenscourt Park, the home is on the doorstep of fantastic local amenities. Both Brackenbury Village and Askew Village shops are a short stroll away and wider amenities of King Street and Goldhawk Road provide superb shopping options; a variety of neighbourhood gastro pubs are also within walking distance. You’ll find freshly baked loaves, artisan coffee, handmade ice cream and a family butcher shop all within minutes of your front door. Much-loved Ravenscourt Park offers local residents a calendar of events, two cafés, a garden centre, several playgrounds and a paddling pool, tennis and basketball courts, football pitches, a historic lake and much more. World class shopping, dining and entertainment options can be found at nearby Westfield – a 20 minute walk or 5 minute drive. Commuters will benefit from the 10 minute stroll to either Ravenscourt Park station (District line) or Goldhawk Road station (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines). Artery bus links running into central London are available from Goldhawk Road and King Street.

Call Horton and Garton, your Brackenbury Village market leaders, to diarise your viewing on .

detailedDescription:
A fabulous opportunity to acquire a substantial four bedroom family house on St. Dunstans Road with huge potential to to extend subject to the usual planning consents. The house is currently semi separated into two flats but has retained a wealth of charming period features including the fireplaces, cornicing and ceiling roses which you will find throughout the house.

The ground floor has been adapted as a one-bedroom flat with an open plan kitchen and reception room which is separated by elegant bi-folding doors. The bedroom is at the rear of the house and has an ensuite and overlooks the mature garden. There is also access to a large cellar, perfect for storing household items not wanted on display, and wine.
On the first floor you will find a spacious and bright reception room along with a separate kitchen with can accommodate a good-sized table and chairs. The master bedroom is an exceptionally large double with inbuilt storage. There is a family bathroom which comprises a bath, W.C. Sink with vanity mirror above, there is also access to a small but pretty balcony. On the second floor the is another large double bedroom and bathroom which again comprises a bath, W.C. And sink with vanity mirror. The real potential lies in the attic as you would be able to convert this space into another large bedroom with ensuite bathroom and dressing room (STPP).

St. Dunstans Road is ideally located close to the River Thames with its several riverside pubs and restaurants, and between two underground stations (Barons Court and Hammersmith) which offer access to the District, Piccadilly and Hammersmith & City Lines as well as a wide variety of amenities, shops and supermarkets as well as Queens Tennis club. The house is perfectly positioned for heading West out of the city along the A4/M4 and a quick drive to Heathrow Airport.
title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

address: 22 Bowery Apartments, Fountain Park Way, London W12
detailedDescription:
Hamptons and St James are offering a range of beautiful apartments at White City Living where luxury interiors, outstanding facilities, world-class retail and excellent transport links create an experience like no other.

Private pre booked appointments available from the St James Marketing Suite.

Apartment:

This one bedroom, 569sqft (53sqm) apartment boasts a 64 sqft private north facing balcony.
The apartment has a spacious open plan kitchen/living room opens onto the private balcony.

The interiors have been designed by Johnson Naylor whilst the kitchens have integrated Miele appliances and composite stone worktops. There is comfort cooling to all habitable rooms and underfloor heating throughout.

Amenities:

Residents’ facilities include 24-hour Concierge, swimming pool with sun terrace, Residents’ Club Lounge, therapeutic hydro-pool, dining room and private kitchen, fully equipped gym with rooms for personal training and classes, treatment and massage rooms, café, two 12-seat private cinemas with food and drink facilities, business lounge and meeting rooms, entertainment suite and secure parking (by separate negotiation).

Residents of this latest phase of White City Living will enjoy a touch free journey to their apartment. The lobby doors will automatically open as you arrive and the intelligent lift takes you to your floor. You can also arrange deliveries and issue virtual keys to friends and family via your smartphone. Communal areas, including the car parks are covered by CCTV.

Surroundings:

On completion White City living will be a community of 2,300 homes within 8 acres of parks and gardens, surrounded by world-class retail, entertainment and educational institutions including Westfield Shopping Centre (Europe's largest mall) and Imperial College’s new 23 acre campus campus is nearby.

The Water Gardens consists of 526 apartments in three buildings at the heart of this new neighbourhood. They are a unique opportunity to live beside the oriental water gardens, which flow through a landscape of hand-selected trees and plants, under elegant bridges, over cascades and waterfalls.

Transport:

Two Underground stations are on the edge of the development: White City (Central Line) and Wood Lane (Circle Line and Hammersmith & City Line). Bond Street is 12 minutes away and Paddington Station is 8 minutes away with its connections to Heathrow and the forthcoming Elizabeth Line (Crossrail).

The M40 and M4 both provide convenient access out of London.

Images are computer generated and floorplans are indicative only.

detailedDescription:
A charming Victorian house split over four floors with gorgeous rear garden.

Location

Situated in the heart of Brackenbury Village the property is within easy reach of excellent local shops restaurants and amenities.

There are a number of excellent maintained and independent schools for all ages nearby, including the highly-esteemed Godolphin & Latymer and St Pauls.

Westfield Shopping Centre is also near for more extensive shopping, restaurant, leisure and additional transport facilities including Shepherds Bush (Overground and Central Line) Ravenscourt Park, 0.6 miles (District line), Shepherds Bush, 0.7 miles (Central Line) and Hammersmith, 0.7 miles (Piccadilly, District, Circle and Hammersmith & City lines) offering excellent transport links into the city. There is also a good network of buses servicing central London. Hammersmith is also excellently positioned for the A4 offering convenient access to Heathrow airport and beyond.

Description

This Victorian home retains many original features and is situated on a quiet tree lined cul-de-sac.

The property briefly comprises; entrance hall leading to a double reception room with fully functioning fire place leading to the fully fitted kitchen. The forty foot south garden can be accessed from the reception room and the kitchen and is paved with mature trees and low maintenance borders equipped with an automated irrigation system.

The basement features a wine store, guest cloakroom and a second kitchen and utility room.

On the half landing there is a family bathroom with a separate bath. On the first floor there are two bright bedrooms including the principle.

The second floor offers two further double bedrooms with built in wardrobes and further shower room on the landing.

There is the opportunity to extend the property to the side return, garden and loft subject to planning permission.

Square Footage: 1893 sq ft

detailedDescription:

detailedDescription:
Rainsborough square lies behind a grand gated entrance, which guards this elegant Georgian townhouse in Fulham.
This 5-bedroom abode set across five floors would be perfect for a family that are looking for a place to call home. An exclusive 40 house development that is a closed community - it’s all about who your neighbours are!

By strict appointment only!

Don’t miss this opportunity!

Lease 999 Years From 1st Jan 2014
Service Charge £10,000 pa approx.
Ground Rent £100 pa approx.

Covering 279.3 sq m / 3006 sq ft, you really have to witness the extensive space here which can be used for entertaining your loved ones along with the very generous bedroom space.

Your new home is finished to the highest spec, with a central hardwood staircase encased with glass balustrades that links seamlessly with all floors, wide hallways along with a study area, utility room and Miele kitchen appliances.

On the lower ground floor you will find a large open plan kitchen that not only has a breakfast bar which is great for serving up your culinary masterpieces but it also has a patio area where you can choose to go al fresco! As you walk through your kitchen you will notice the graceful sky light that allows you to have spectacular natural light flowing through.

The ground floor showcases a substantial reception room that opens to your very own private garden, which will allow you to have the freedom to relax or entertain and overlooks your kitchen patio area.

The bedrooms are arranged over the next 3 floors, the master bedroom covering the whole of the first floor which comes with built in wardrobes and a large en suite in a beautifully tiled finish which includes a large stand-alone tub that will allow you to have a relaxing soak to feel refreshed and regenerated.

The second floor has 2 bedrooms both with ensuite & the third floor houses a further 2 bedrooms which could be used for family members or even guests complete with a shared bathroom.

You will also have access to your very own spacious garage which is situated on the lower ground floor.

Rainsborough square is a secluded development of secure and modern townhouses arranged around a spacious landscaped private garden square. There is also 24-hour concierge at this highly desired development.

The development is close to some of the most prestigious independent schools in the area such as the Chelsea Independent college, which is 0.29 miles away, Kensington prep school which is 0.46 miles away and The Fulham Preparatory School which is 0.61 miles away.

Not only is this coveted area surrounded by well-established educational organisations, you are also close to some very convenient transport links, it is an 8 minute walk (0.4 miles) to West Brompton Station, an 8 minute walk (0.4 miles) to Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green which is a 14 minute walk away (0.7 miles).

Lease Hold - 999 years from 1 January 2014
Service Charge – Approx £10,000 per annum
Ground Rent - Approx £100 Per annum

Downstairs there is a utility room, four beautiful double bedrooms with inbuilt wardrobes, two of which have ensuite shower rooms, a family bathroom and an impressive home office.

The property has underfloor heating throughout, air conditioning to the upper levels, and a heat recovery system to every room in the lower ground floor for unlimited fresh, filtered air. address: 15 Bowery Apartments, Fountain Park Way, London W12
detailedDescription:
Hamptons and St James are offering a range of beautiful apartments at White City Living where luxury interiors, outstanding facilities, world-class retail and excellent transport links create an experience like no other.

Private pre booked appointments available from the St James Marketing Suite.

Apartment:

This two bedroom, 875sqft (81.3sqm) apartment overlooks White City Living's Central Gardens which have been meticulously designed to celebrate every passing season. The principal bedroom has a dressing area and en suite bathroom and there is a second double bedroom and shower room. The open plan kitchen/living room opens onto the private balcony.

The interiors have been designed by Johnson Naylor whilst the kitchens have integrated Miele appliances and composite stone worktops. There is comfort cooling to all habitable rooms and underfloor heating throughout.

Underground parking is available for an additional £55,000.

Amenities:

Residents’ facilities include 24-hour Concierge, swimming pool with sun terrace, Residents’ Club Lounge, therapeutic hydro-pool, dining room and private kitchen, fully equipped gym with rooms for personal training and classes, treatment and massage rooms, café, two 12-seat private cinemas with food and drink facilities, business lounge and meeting rooms, entertainment suite and secure parking (by separate negotiation).

Residents of this latest phase of White City Living will enjoy a touch free journey to their apartment. The lobby doors will automatically open as you arrive and the intelligent lift takes you to your floor. You can also arrange deliveries and issue virtual keys to friends and family via your smartphone. Communal areas, including the car parks are covered by CCTV.

Surroundings:

On completion White City living will be a community of 2,300 homes within 8 acres of parks and gardens, surrounded by world-class retail, entertainment and educational institutions including Westfield Shopping Centre (Europe's largest mall) and Imperial College’s new 23 acre campus campus is nearby.

The Water Gardens consists of 526 apartments in three buildings at the heart of this new neighbourhood. They are a unique opportunity to live beside the oriental water gardens, which flow through a landscape of hand-selected trees and plants, under elegant bridges, over cascades and waterfalls.

Transport:

Two Underground stations are on the edge of the development: White City (Central Line) and Wood Lane (Circle Line and Hammersmith & City Line). Bond Street is 12 minutes away and Paddington Station is 8 minutes away with its connections to Heathrow and the forthcoming Elizabeth Line (Crossrail).

The M40 and M4 both provide convenient access out of London.

detailedDescription:
Francis-James Residential are pleased to bring to the market this large, attractive Victorian Period converted Maisonette, located on a quiet and sought after street in the heart of Munster Village.
Situated on the First and Second floor, this bright and spacious 3 double bedroom property boasts a large reception room with an adjoining kitchen and comprises of three double bedrooms and two bathrooms - as well as an impressive south facing roof terrace, perfect for outdoor summer dining.
The master bedroom located on the top floor, is a really impressively large room with direct access to the roof terrace and it also benefits from an en-suite bathroom.
Munster Village is popular for it's array of coffee shops, restaurants and boutiques - as well as being central to Fulham and connecting to Parsons Green, West Brompton and Putney Bridge Station. Bishops Park and the leafy surroundings nearby the river Thames, are also only a short and pleasant walk from the property.
Viewings strongly advised.
