detailedDescription:
A beautiful and bright four bedroom, two bathroom freehold house offering excellent proportions throughout, ideally located close to the many amenities on Wandsworth Bridge Road.

This gorgeous property comprises a generous amount of living space with a front reception room that leads to a sleek and stylish fully integrated kitchen/diner with breakfast bar. The pretty rear garden is accessed via bi-folding doors creating a fluid connection between the inside and outside space making it ideal for entertaining.

On the first floor you will find three double bedrooms, two with built in wardrobes and a modern family bathroom. The large master bedroom occupies the entire second floor and has wall to wall fitted wardrobes and an en-suite shower room.

The property is perfectly situated to enjoy the bars, restaurants and cafés on Wandsworth Bridge Road whilst being set back on a quiet residential street. Both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway tube stations are close by with regular District Line services running into the city. Imperial Wharf station is also a short walk away which has Overground services to the city and Southern Rail trains which run to Clapham Junction and out of London. The green open spaces of Eel Brook Common and South Park are only a short walk.

detailedDescription:
St Elmo Road, London W12

A wonderful mid terraced Edwardian house offering generous accommodation over three floors and excellent built in storage. Whilst the house has been extended in to the loft space there is still scope to extend in to the side return area of the garden.

The accommodation provides interlinking reception rooms with many original features and French doors on to the rear garden as well as opening to a generous kitchen / dining room again leading on to the rear garden. The upper floors provide a principal bedroom, three further bedrooms, a walk in wardrobe and a family bathroom and separate shower room. To the rear is a private garden with pedestrian access to the rear service road (secured at either end) meaning good access for bicycles etc. The house is well located for local amenities along the Askew Road with further facilities to be found at Westfield London including the transport hub located there. It is also within the catchment area for both The Good Shepherd and Wendell Primary schools.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
The house is laid out over four floors and is accessed on the raised ground floor. As you enter there is a large reception room to the front of the house, double doors lead into the kitchen and dining room, there is a further set of double doors which lead onto a rear balcony with steps that lead down to the rear garden. On the lower ground floor is a further rear reception room with bi-folding doors that lead out onto the 50 foot rear garden, there is a guest bedroom with ensuite shower room and a utility room to the front of the house. On the first floor are two double bedrooms, a study (which is currently used as a dressing room) and a family bathroom. The master bedroom suite is located at the top of the house and has an ensuite bathroom with a separate shower, built in wardrobes and a mezzanine dressing area.

Situation
Hammersmith Broadway is less than half a miles walk away for its numerous bus routes for access into and out of the area. The Piccadilly Line, District Line, Hammersmith and City and Circle Lines can also be accessed from Hammersmith Station.
The A4/ M4 is a short drive away for access into and out of London.

address: Wandsworth Bridge Road, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
An exceptionally well presented and perfectly appointed two bedroom, two bathroom property set on the northern end of Wandsworth Bridge Road. The apartment is located on the first floor of an imposing Victorian, red brick building close to Eel Brook Common, South Park, King's Road and Fulham Broadway.

The flat is immaculately presented throughout and offers an excellent feeling of both space and light. At the front, a sizeable but cosy reception room offering over 4x4 meters in space and wonderful high ceilings with a bespoke lit Italian framed wall which elegantly complements the fireplace.

Move through to the rear of the flat, there is a delightful bedroom en-suite, a modern yet soft-designed eat in Italian designed kitchen, equipped with all the modern conveniences one would expect; and separate second bedroom and shower room at the back. Throughout the main living areas within the flat, there is a rich oak flooring which really adds to the warmth of the property.

Early viewing for this wonderful property is highly recommended.

King's Road Park will transform a hidden part of London's heritage, to create a new sustainable neighbourhood set within a beautiful park, truly designed for life.

Situated just 60 metres from the iconic King's Road and close to the River Thames, King's Road Park is in one of south-west London's most celebrated locations. Perfectly located in Zone 2 and only a 10 minute walk from both an Underground and Overground station, this sought-after address is well connected and close to the very best that London has to offer.

King's Road Park is the last project of its scale yet to be started within the Fulham Riverside Regeneration Area and south-west London. This will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings set within a new public square. 100,000 sq. Ft. Of commercial space will provide a choice of restaurants, bars and offices.

detailedDescription:
A well presented Victorian terraced house having been extended to the rear and into the loft. Entrance hall to double reception room with bay window and feature fireplace. Spacious kitchen/diner with bi-fold doors to the west facing rear garden. To the first floor are the principal bedroom with large en-suite bathroom, second shower room and double bedroom, to the half landing above is a further double bedroom and the top floor boasts a large bedroom with eaves storage and en-suite shower room.

A quiet, residential location but also moments from the excellent shopping and amenities of Westfield Shopping and Leisure complex (Cinema, Bowling, Gym etc) also to Uxbridge Road and Shepherds Bush Market, London's most multi-cultural and vibrant community offering an a huge variety of international cuisines and local shopping.

White City House (Soho House) and further restaurants are also minutes away at the remodelled bbc Television Centre.

Great transport links - Shepherds Bush Hammersmith and City Line and Central Line, Mainline station and Bus station all within 0.3 miles.

The property is in the middle of Macfarlane road and so is extra quiet. There is also the added benefit of easy on road parking with little competition for spaces.

In the catchment area of the very sought after and popular, Ofsted Oustanding. St Stephens School (Cof E).

0.4 miles from Hammersmith Park with playground and Japanese Gardens.

A lovely family house looking for a new owner!

address: Higham House, Carnwath Road, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
Ref: Anruf

***london view top floor penthouse***

***viewings available***

***virtual tour available***

“Penthouse” a grandeur residence comes to mind, this particular penthouse in Parsons Green gives you just that and more. Encased in high ceilings and polished floors are 4 en suite bedrooms, large reception and open plan kitchen and dinning area, wrapped around by a balcony with views of the green from all corners.

Every spacious room with access to the balcony, has built in wardrobes, is carpeted and has a bathroom with either stand-alone shower or marble bath-tub.

Walking through the apartment is thoroughly impressive, reaching the reception room where the splendour of the apartment really shines. A large space deluged with light has so much potential. Whether you’re throwing a party, or gathering family together for movie night, this room is perfect for any joyous occasion.

From the reception is a convenient transfer between entertainment rooms as you enter the dinning and open plan kitchen area. Gather a small team for a lovely meal in the dinning room using the elegantly designed and decorated kitchen fully equipped with high specification appliances to suit most culinary skills.

Included with all the beautiful rooms and features in this apartment is a powder room, laundry room and utility room, also you will given a parking space which is underground private and secure. In addition, there is a private code in the lift that allows only the penthouses to access this floor.

This is a lovely neighbourhood in Parsons Green where you can have a stroll, sit along the Thames across the road, or enjoy the greenery. If you’re using public transport to get around London, Parsons Green Station is around a 10 minute walk from the apartment, where you’ll also find grocery shopping and boutique bars, restaurants and clothing and gift shops.
An apartment for comfort and entertainment without compromising the magnificent character and atmosphere of a Penthouse.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
The Tower houses a stunning selection of three bedroom premier flats offering an exclusive London dock-side development and boasts luxurious living with access to exceptional communal facilities and gardens.

Set within a impressive dock-side development close to Fulham Broadway, a selection of three bedroom premier flats are available. Each flat features a well deigned open-plan living area with ample space to dine, custom designed fully integrated European fitted kitchen with Miele appliances, contemporary bathrooms with Villeroy and Boch sanitary ware, three generous double bedrooms with bespoke fitted wardrobes with leather doors and two private balconies with impressive views. Set within a secure development with 24-hour concierge, video entry system, CCTV and gated parking, each apartment further benefits from access to a landscaped park and dock-side piazza as well as a gym and spa including a swimming pool, sauna and steam room.

This stylish riverside development is ideally located close to a range of fashionable bars and restaurants available along Chelsea's fashionable King's Road and with Fulham Broadway.

address: Woodlawn Road, Bishops Park, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
Arranged over the first and second floors of this attractive period building, this well presented apartment has a stunning reception room with vaulted ceilings, bay window and an additional window allowing natural light to flow throughout the reception space. A well designed kitchen on the mezzanine level allows for excellent dining space with direct access onto the private roof terrace. On the first floor, there is a main bedroom with wall to wall fitted wardrobes, second double bedroom with fitted wardrobe, a newly appointed, stylish bathroom, new flooring throughout the majority of the property and the added potential for a second bathroom/en-suite.

Situation
Woodlawn Road is situated on the "Alphabet Streets" area of Fulham and is conveniently located within walking distance of the beautiful green spaces of Bishops Park. There are also many excellent shops, restaurants and cafes nearby. The nearest underground station is Putney Bridge (district line) and there are numerous buses running into central London. For the motorist, there is easy access to the A4/M4 towards Heathrow and the West.

On the top floor there is a large double bedroom with an ensuite shower room, skylights and an abundance of storage, perfect to use for a guest bedroom.

This is a superb family home that has beautifully designed to create a great living space.

A stylish mid terraced family home in the heart of Fulham. This four bedroom Victorian house is arranged over three floors and extends to just under 1,600 sq ft (148 sq m).

title: 5 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
A four bedroom Victorian house opposite Eel Brook Common.

Located opposite Eel Brook Common, this period property has recently benefited from newly fitted hardwood double glazed sash windows, new pointing and roof works giving the new owners a rare opportunity to purchase a well maintained house that requires some internal modernisation.
The ground floor comprises a reception room with a bay to the front with park views, leading to a dining room and an eat in kitchen facing on to a secluded private rear garden. The first floor is arranged with the master bedroom to the front with park views and en-suite shower room, two further bedrooms and a family bathroom. The second floor has the 4th bedroom with a large cupboard and storage area.
There is huge scope to extend the property, including increase the loft conversion, side/rear extension and basement conversion (subject to the usual planning permissions).

Campana Road is a quiet residential street located in an extremely popular group of roads that sit 'between the Greens', Parsons Green and Eel Brook Common, which comprises 3 acres of open space with tennis courts for hire, a children’s play area and arranged sporting activities It is without question one of the very best locations Fulham has to offer. There's an array of restaurants, independent cafes, boutique shops, a Whole Foods market and a Waitrose nearby. The nearest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2) which is only minutes from the property. You can also catch regular buses from the New Kings Road into Chelsea.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Newly converted, this two bedroom apartment is stunning throughout. The use of space is superb and this well known local developer has provided another outstanding apartment.

Brand new throughout and covered by guarantees, this apartment provides two double bedrooms with a stylish family shower room. The open plan reception is set at the top of the building and measures in at over 350 sq ft creating a very light and bright space for entertaining.

The property boasts a wonderful matt grey kitchen with copper effect handles, quartz worktops and Bosch appliances. They also boast instant boiling water taps and Insinkerators (waste disposal unit) Crittal style doors in this apartment lead out from the oak wood floor clad open plan reception area with vaulted ceilings, to a charming Juliet balcony giving an airy effect to the room. The property heating is controlled by a Hive wireless thermostat.

The property is located on Elbe Street which is just around the corner from the popular Sands End pub and Wandsworth Bridge Road where you will discover many other local bars, shops and restaurants. Transport links are accessible via Fulham Broadway tube station or Imperial Wharf Overground station and there are bus routes accessible via Wandsworth Bridge Road leading to Chelsea, Hammersmith and Clapham Junction. There is a river bus service that runs from Chelsea Harbour/Imperial Wharf with frequent services to Blackfriars and Canary Wharf.

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A delightful two double bedroom ground floor garden flat extending to 674 sq. Ft. On a quiet and popular road in Fulham.

The property benefits from a bright reception/dining room with a large bay window and natural wooden flooring. This lovely room overlooking the front boasts excellent built in storage and bookshelves and decorative fireplace. The kitchen comprises a range of wall and base units which are modern and houses good integrated appliance, including fridge/freezer, oven and dishwasher.

There are two generous double bedrooms which both feature newly installed plantation shutters and views of the garden. There is a fully tiled and smart bathroom featuring modern fittings. The south facing garden is very private and not overlooked and is accessed through both the kitchen and one of the bedrooms. It offers practical outside space for alfresco dining and comes with a shed for additional storage. All the windows and external doors were recently replaced. There is potential scope to extend into the side return, subject to planning permission.

The flat is located at the preferred eastern end of Halford Road and sits equidistant between Fulham Broadway and West Brompton stations where the District Line and overground services operate, along with other excellent transport links. The area is very central and surrounded by a wide choice of shops, restaurants and bars, including popular supermarkets such as, Wholefoods and Waitrose, and the Market Hall with its choice of eateries.<br /><br />

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A truly one of a kind house set on a highly desirable road within the South Park collection of streets in South Fulham. This spectacular end of terrace family home boasts over 2500 square feet and is appointed over three floors. The focus of this property was the creation of ample space and light throughout emphasised by lowered floors and raised ceilings. It comprises of a large reception room flowing through to a vast eat-in kitchen that has both a kitchen island and more than enough space for dining and some serious entertaining. This kitchen/garden area will leave you the envy of many people during the summer evenings. The sliding doors open onto the lush and secluded garden which has the additional benefit of side access via Settrington Road. There is a garage also accessed via Settrington Road fully equipped with power, lighting, electric door and mains drainage. A rare benefit for a property in Fulham and perfect for tucking away the car or conversion into a home office should this be desired. Any further conversions would be subject to planning permission.

On the first floor you will find a large double room at the rear of the property and a large en suite bathroom. At the front is the master bedroom with en-suite and plenty of storage. The second floor offers a further three double bedrooms and a family bathroom with shower over the bath.
Whilst the house offers ample space, there is of course scope to further extend into the basement and over the first floor rear addition. Planning permission was previously granted for a basement as part of a consent (H&F 2003/01537/Ful) which was partially implemented. This should allow the purchaser to build a basement without further planning consent. Purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with the planning authority but further information is available from the agents and vendor.
Woolneigh Street is a few steps from the gates to South Park, a wonderful leafy area with tennis courts and fields perfect for kids or dog walks. A short stroll across the park takes you in the direction of Parsons Green and towards central Fulham. Head South and the river is only a short walk away with Wandsworth Town station just on the other side of the bridge.

This one of a kind house is offered to the market with no onward chain, and early appointment bookings are highly recommended.

title: 5 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
The property opens through a private side entrance from the garden and into an elegant hallway that leads to the main reception, kitchen, and WC. The spacious front reception room boasts a beautiful bay window, traditional feature fireplace, hardwood flooring, and flooding with natural light throughout.

The kitchen/family room measures over 30ft in width provides a wonderful dining area and additional seating area in front of the grand fireplace. The kitchen itself has been designed to an English-country style with modern built-in appliances and a large kitchen island with two built-in wine coolers. There are two skylights that provide plenty of natural light and double bi-fold doors to the garden.

The expansive garden measures over 30ft benefitting a private driveway for parking, sliding gate door and a useful garden shed. The landscaped garden is enclosed and provides a wonderful outside space for children to play due to its safety aspect and size.

The lower ground floor provides a self-contained level, perfect for an au pair or live-in nanny, with access to the main house or private access from the garden. There is a charming reception room with access to a private patio area which includes an external storage unit. There is a double bedroom that has built-in shelving and accesses the garden with external storage opposite, a separate kitchen and a shower room.

The principal bedroom is located on the first floor, boasting a wide bay window, a dressing area with built-in storage, and a large ensuite with a walk-in shower, double vanity unit, and bathtub. The second bedroom on this floor provides a large space with an abundance of natural light, two built-in wardrobes, and an ensuite bathroom – ideal for a guest bedroom.

On the second floor, there are three bedrooms; the two smaller bedrooms share an adjoining ensuite bathroom, perfect for children. The larger third bedroom on this floor is currently used as a study and benefits a private ensuite bathroom, two skylights that provides plenty of natural light, and ample eaves storage.

Owing to our commitment to keep both our colleagues and clients safe during this period of recommended isolation, we have many self-serve viewing options that may be available to you. These could include video walkthroughs, 360 virtual reality viewings and enhanced comprehensive photography. Call the team to discuss further.

Acfold Road is a pretty tree-lined street, just moments from the New Kings Road. It is well located for the green spaces of Eel Brook Common, Parsons Green and South Park, and the extensive shopping, leisure and dining facilities of the area.

Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green underground stations are both within a short walk that services the District line into Central London. There are many bus services that run along New Kings Road, Wandsworth Bridge Road and Fulham Broadway.

This property has huge scope to extend at the rear and into the loft void (subject to planning permission). The property boasts a beautiful large mature garden to the rear, original features and off road parking in the driveway with further potential for extra off road parking in the front. The house is with-in walking distance of East Acton (Central line Zone 2), Acton Central Station (Overground) and Acton Mainline Station (forthcoming Crossrail). There are some fantastic schooling options nearby along with the open green space of Acton Park and the ever-trendy Churchfield Road. There is also easy access to the a40 trunk road into central London and Heathrow airport. No further chain.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Walham Grove was built in the 1860s on land owned by the Harwood family. Set well back from the road, this semi-detached linked house forms part of an elegant proportioned tree lined terrace, and is listed as a Building of Local Merit.

The exceptionally wide four-storey freehold property has been meticulously rebuilt and fully furnished by Vitruvius & Company to create an outstanding home. The property benefits a private annex that offers space for working from home or as a separate gym.

Walham Grove offers generous proportions, exceptional design and unparalleled entertaining space on one of Fulham's most desirable streets close to Kensington & Chelsea.

Owing to our commitment to keep both our colleagues and clients safe during this period of recommended isolation, we have many self-serve viewing options that may be available to you. These could include video walkthroughs, 360 virtual reality viewings and enhanced comprehensive photography. Call the team to discuss further.

Walham Grove is an elegant and sought after street running off North End Road on Fulham Broadway. As such it is well-located for a splendid array of local amenities with trendy restaurants such as the Michelin starred Harwood Arms, bars, cinema complex, shops and boutiques and a choice of top grade supermarkets.

Fulham Broadway is the closest Underground Station (District Line) and there is a choice of bus routes leading to and from the West End. West Brompton Station with its link to the Overground is also within walking distance.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
*Help to Buy Scheme Available*
Boot Court is a new boutique gated development of eight, two and three bedroom apartments.
Set within a quiet West London location, the apartments are only moments from Ravenscourt and Wendell Parks and the vibrant range of independent retailers and restaurants situated on both the Askew Road and Chiswick High Road.
The eight bespoke apartments range in price from GBP599,000 and some will include allocated parking. The apartments will be finished to a high standard with quality kitchens fully integrated with a high specification appliance range, as well as hardwood flooring and underfloor heating.
Reception rooms open out onto private terraces, ideal for those long summer evenings, creating the perfect space to enjoy and unwind. Jeddo Road is positioned a short stroll from Askew Village with its selection of local favourites such as The Ginger Pig, October 26 Artisan Bakery and Askew Wine.
There are a number of excellent schools in the area plus Leiths School of Food and Wine and Kite Art Studios. A further fifteen minute walk from Boot Court takes you to Chiswick High Road with offers an amazing array of shops, bars and award winning restaurants.
Westfield London is only ten minutes away by car offering further shopping and entertainment options. For sports lovers, David Lloyd Acton Park and Club Des Sports are just a convenient five minute cycle and Hartswood Tennis Club is a five minute walk. Boot Court benefits from close proximity to a variety of bus links into the city and is just over a ten minute walk from Stamford Brook Tube (District Line).

Further details on this prestigious development can be found online at .

*Sample floor plan and photography supplied by a third party and are for illustrative purposes only*

detailedDescription: A beautifully presented two bedroom apartment, with a delightful private garden on one of Bishops Park’s favoured alphabet streets. A modern one bedroom third floor apartment in Shepherds Bush.

The property comprises a large double bedroom with an abundance of built in storage, a modern show room and a beautifully bright and spacious open plan kitchen/living area with built in appliances.

The development offers residence usage to safe bike storage space, communal courtyard and allotments for gardening.

Benefits include a long lease, no chain and a private lift.

Apex Court is a well-managed and secure residential development just 0.2 miles from Goldhawk Road Station (Hammersmith & City and Circle Lines) and 0.4 Miles from Shepherds Bush Stations offering the Central Line and London Overgound and southern rail way.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
We are delighted to present this fantastic family home spanning nearly 2000 square feet, located on this desirable residential street within the Alphabets'.

Bursting with charm, this gorgeous end of terrace period house comprises a spacious double reception room that leads through to the dining room and well-equipped kitchen and guest WC. The conservatory at the rear provides a further living space with double doors that open up onto the beautiful, mature garden providing a peaceful sanctuary to enjoy. The side return includes a secure covered area accessible from the street for storing bicycles etc.

On the first floor you will find three generous double bedrooms, all with built in wardrobes, a family bathroom and a large en-suite bathroom serving the master bedroom. On the top floor there are two more double bedrooms, a WC and a further space which can be used as an office.

Inglethorpe Street is brilliantly positioned within walking distance of leafy Bishops Park and the popular River Café as well as many other local amenities. Both Putney Bridge and Hammersmith underground stations are close by with many bus links available on Fulham Palace Road.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Eynham Road, Ladbroke Grove, London W12
detailedDescription:
This newly renovated, immaculately presented two double bedroom natural maisonette, circa 758 Sq’ - 70 SqM, offers the owner their own front door and two private South West facing outdoor areas. Situated on the West side of leafy Eynham Road, part of a desirable residential crescent of Victorian homes, the ground floor apartment comprises a generous entrance hallway, two double bedrooms – one bay fronted and the other with glass doors leading onto its own private sun trap terrace – and a stylish modern shower room complete with underfloor heating. To the rear of the apartment is a sociable open plan kitchen/reception room with glass door opening onto a private South West facing paved garden with raised beds where green-fingered buyers will enjoy creating their own urban oasis. The contemporary kitchen houses integrated appliances and features underfloor heating. Beyond the cosmetic updates, a full programme of works has been undertaken including the side extension, new plasterwork, ceilings, electrics, radiators and a new boiler. This superb period apartment comes with no onward chain.

The quiet, residential location of this natural maisonette belies its proximity to West London’s most desirable amenities. The new bbc Television Centre development, White City House and Westfield Shopping Centre, just over 10 minutes on foot, offer world class dining, shopping and entertainment options. The amenities of North Kensington, Ladbroke Grove and Notting Hill are nearby; a 20 minute stroll delivers you to the beating heart of Portobello Road with its fantastic shops, cafés, restaurants and pubs as well as its world-famous weekly market. Renowned for its green spaces, this area of West London offers the owner a short stroll to the 200 acres of Wormwood Scrubs, Little Wormwood Scrubs and Green Flag Award-winning Kensington Memorial Park. The nearest tube stations include White City (Central line) and Wood Lane (Hammersmith & City and Circle lines). Imperial College’s White City campus is a 2 minute walk.

This flat comprises of two bedrooms which offer good storage facilities, high ceilings, sash window and traditional fire place.

The principle bedroom is well sized and boasts feature fire place and sits beside the family bathroom. The second bedroom sits to the front and rear of the property.

This flat benefits from a separate and good sized kitchen that sits beside the family bathroom and offers full facilities. A good sized south west facing reception room is found to the front of the property and boasts a bright sunlit feel.

Well located, two bedroom flat in the heart of Shepherds Bush boasting bright rooms and benefitting from separate kitchen and reception area.

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented four bedroom, three bathroom house located on a quiet residential street in the sought after Sands End' area.

This wonderful property has excellent entertaining space on the ground floor with a spacious front reception room, an open plan kitchen/reception/diner to the rear with bi-folding doors leading to the tranquil, south-west facing garden. The first floor comprises two double bedrooms, both with stylish en-suite bathrooms and a single bedroom. There is a further very generous double bedroom on the top floor and a family bathroom on the split level. Further benefits include a guest WC on the ground floor, ample storage and plenty of natural light flow throughout.

The house is situated on Glenrosa Street, close to the popular Sands End pub and around the corner on the Wandsworth Bridge Road you will discover many other local bars, shops, cafés and restaurants. The property is located near to several schools of excellent repute and the green spaces of South Park, Imperial Park and William Parnell Park are all close by. Transport links are accessible via Fulham Broadway, Parsons Green tube station or Imperial Wharf Overground station and there are bus routes accessible via Wandsworth Bridge Road leading to Chelsea, Hammersmith and Clapham Junction. There is a river bus service that runs from Chelsea Harbour/Imperial Wharf with frequent services to Blackfriars and Canary Wharf.

address: King's Road Park, King's Road SW6
detailedDescription:
New show apartment now launched - contact us to arrange A viewing!
Virtual viewings now available


King's Road Park is a new sustainable residential development located just off the King’s Road, SW6. Residents will benefit from a plethora of nearby famous landmarks including Sloane Square, Chelsea Harbour and Parsons Green and Chelsea Football Club, there’s something for everyone.

As part of the Fulham regeneration area, the development will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings, set within new public square and contemporary designed commercial space. The development is situated just 60 metres from the King’s Road in Chelsea and a stone’s through to the River Thames. The Zone two location is within easy reach of Fulham Broadway Underground station (15 minutes to Victoria on the District Line), and Imperial Wharf Overground station, taking you one stop to Clapham Junction south of the river.

Residents will benefit from a beautiful landscaped public park at the centre of the development, providing a significant open space for the local community. The development provides access to luxury health and fitness facilities featuring a gymnasium and studios, 25m swimming pool with vitality pool, steam room, sauna and treatment rooms. Finally, residents will enjoy private access to a cinema and games room. The ground floor and first floors feature an elegant lobby with a 24-hour concierge, a private dining room and meeting rooms, with a private bar, a relaxing work space and communal gardens.

Images are CGIs and indicative only

address: King's Road Park, King's Road, London SW6
detailedDescription:
*Visit our new showhome* Beautifully designed 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment situated on the 1st floor of the Beaumont with a private balcony with park views and 900sq ft.

Description

Visit our Brand New Showhome
Our new showhome is now available to view, created by renowned designer, Nick Auston.

We asked Nick to produce a 'Quintessentially British' interior design scheme for a 2-bedroom apartment by using small and local businesses along the King's Road. Our main aim for this showhome is to explore originality, whilst delving into the rich history of the site itself as well as surrounding area of Fulham.

In addition, the apartment brings a new meaning to the showhome concept with innovative software that allows potential purchases to interact with items in the showhome whether visiting in person or virtually. The unique technology offers an in-depth insight into the property, its interiors and the vision for King's Road Park.

Transforming London's Heritage

King's Road Park will transform a hidden part of London's heritage, to create a new sustainable neighbourhood set within a beautiful park, truly designed for life.

Situated just 60 metres from the iconic King's Road and close to the River Thames, King's Road Park is in one of south-west London's most celebrated locations. Perfectly located in Zone 2 and only a 10 minute walk from both an Underground and Overground station, this sought-after address is well connected and close to the very best that London has to offer.

King's Road Park is the last project of its scale yet to be started within the Fulham Riverside Regeneration Area and south-west London. This will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings set within a new public square. 100,000 sq. Ft. Of commercial space will provide a choice of restaurants, bars and offices.

*Virtual viewings available with our marketing suite staff. Book your appointment today to find out more about our latest release at King's Road Park. At present in-person viewings are permitted but we encourage a virtual viewing in the first instance.*

A collection of stylish suites, 1,2,3 and 4 bedroom apartments, a new public park with an extensive range of community facilities.

Prices from £725,000.

Location
As part of the Fulham regeneration area, King's Road Park will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings, set within new public square and contemporary designed commercial space. The development is situated just 60 metres from the King's Road in Chelsea and a stones through to the River Thames.

The Zone two location is within easy reach of Fulham Broadway Underground station (15 minutes to Victoria on the District Line), and Imperial Wharf Overground station, taking you one stop to Clapham Junction south of the river.

Amenities
Residents will benefit from a beautiful landscaped public park at the centre of the development, providing a significant open space for the local community. The development provides access to luxury health and fitness facilities featuring a gymnasium and studios, 25m swimming pool with vitality pool, steam room, sauna and treatment rooms. Finally, residents will enjoy private access to a cinema, golf simulator and games room.

The ground floor and first floors feature an elegant lobby with a 24-hour concierge, a private dining room and meeting rooms, with a private bar, a relaxing work space and communal gardens.

Images are CGIs and indicative only.

Square Footage: 900 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 998 years remaining

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented house with a fantastic 54ft south facing garden

Location

Fernhurst Road is a desirable, family-friendly road running to the east of Munster Road, known locally for its well-proportioned houses and large gardens. It is well located for the shops, cafes and restaurants of the Fulham Road, as well as local parks including Bishops Park, Fulham Palace, Hurlingham and walks along the River Thames.
Transport links are excellent with Parsons Green tube (District Line) approximately 0.6 miles away.
There are several well regarded schools within a half mile radius, including Kensington Prep, Parsons Green Prep, Sinclair House and Fulham Prep.

Description

The ground floor of this property has spacious and bright rooms ideal for family life and entertaining. To the front is a double reception room with wood flooring, attractive ceiling detail and a wood burner. To the rear is a contemporary kitchen with plenty of space for dining and relaxing. Bi-fold doors open to a fantastic 54ft southerly facing garden. The garden is separated in to a patio area, perfect for al fresco dining, and lawn surrounded by mature trees making it feel very private.
There is a useful utility room on the lower ground floor.
On the first floor are three double bedrooms (one with a balcony) and a family bathroom.
On the second floor is a large double bedroom with en suite bathroom, a further double bedroom and further shower room.

Square Footage: 2148 sq ft

detailedDescription:
A cocoon of tranquillity and security in the heart of London

A stunning modern townhouse, arranged over five floors and offering over 4,400 sq ft of internal accommodation, with six bedrooms, a separate studio and a patio garden. Situated in an exclusive crescent of 12 townhouses accessed via remote controlled security gates, it also benefits from a secure two-car integral garage and an allocated underground car park.

The property boasts a traditional kitchen and a conservatory area leading to an outside patio garden and a separate studio (400 sq ft ) with shower room plus a study/bedroom conveniently located on the ground floor. Two first floor drawing rooms with east and west facing balconies. A 625 sq ft. Master apartment spanning the entire second floor featuring a principal bedroom, a dressing area and a bathroom plus two east and west facing balconies. Two further bedrooms with en-suite shower rooms on the third floor. Guest or staff bedroom connected to utility room with access to a small patio garden and a two-car integral garage on the lower ground floor.

11 Imperial Crescent is located within the prestigious and award-winning Imperial Wharf development. Separated from the main buildings by Imperial Park, which has been landscaped to include a pond and mature trees and shrubs, Imperial Crescent is discreetly tucked away behind secure CCTV-monitored gates on a private road, to which only Imperial Crescent residents enjoy access. The property also enjoys views of the River Thames, and the Imperial Wharf Riverside Promenade as well as the river walks beyond into Chelsea are accessible within a minute′s walk.

The renowned Harbour Club Chelsea is located directly outside the gates to Imperial Crescent. With its facilities ranging from fitness rooms, swimming pools and tennis courts to a health spa & clinic and complementary creche, the club is universally acknowledged as one of London′s finest health, rackets & fitness clubs.

The closest station is Imperial Wharf (National Rail), located 0.4 of a mile away. There are many excellent shops and restaurants nearby at Imperial Wharf, and there is a Sainsburys Superstore on William Morris Way.

  • Open plan kitchen: Beech wood wall units with blue quartz worktop, tiled backsplash throughout. New wood effect vinyl flooring.
  • Bedroom: Double bedroom with newly fitted wardrobes. New wood flooring.

What happens after I register my interest?

After registering your interest for a Peabody home, you will receive an email confirmation from us. The email will confirm what you need to do next to secure a property viewing which includes completing a financial assessment with a mortgage advisor and completing the Shared Ownership Application Form.

If you don’t receive this email within an hour of your registration, please check your spam or junk folders and set your spam filter to allow incoming emails from Peabody. If you still haven’t received the email after checking here, please contact and our team will be able to help you.

detailedDescription:
Francis-James Residential are pleased bring to the market as sole agent, this attractive Two double Bedroom First floor property, set in an attractive Victorian Period conversion front-facing Bishops Park. Benefitting from a large and bright open-plan kitchen/reception room which has been neutrally decorated, this flat comprises of a good-sized double bedroom which looks out over the gardens at the rear, with a separate bathroom leading to the second double bedroom at the rear of the property. With smart and well-maintained communal areas of this attractive Victorian conversion, this is an ideal First Time Purchase and also an excellent buy-to-let investment.

Situated on the First floor of an attractive Victorian conversion and enviably positioned at the end of the terrace so that it benefits from privacy and seclusion, this fantastic two bedroom flat faces bishops park and set in a popular catchment area. Only a stones-throw from the prestigious and increasingly popular Bishops Park and other attractions such as the River Thames Towpath as well as the convenience of the Fulham Garden centre (opposite) and local coffee shops and restaurants that populate one of Fulham's most sought after locations.

Populated with families and professionals, Bishops Park is close to excellent transport links which include a pleasant riverside walk to both Putney & Hammersmith Station (District and Piccadilly line, both within a 15 minute walk)

Transport Links: Hammersmith (District, Circle, Piccadilly and Hammersmith & City Lines) and Putney Bridge (District Line), Frequent bus services to Hammermsith, Putney & London (424,74. 220,430)

The appeal of this property is high and internal inspection is advised.

detailedDescription:
** property market remains open for viewings & valuations in person or by virtual appointment **

A beautifully presented one bedroom conversion flat set within an attractive semi detached property conveniently located close to the River Thames and fashionable amenities in nearby Hammersmith and Fulham. The property boasts a wealth of period character and appeal, offering bright, well laid out accommodation including a stunning reception room with wide front aspect bay, separate well equipped kitchen and modern bathroom. Features include gas central heating, double glazing quality floor coverings, ample inbuilt storage and share of freehold.

Accommodation comprises entrance hall with inbuilt storage cupboard, leading into the bright and spacious reception room with wide front aspect bay window, feature cast iron fireplace, stripped wood flooring, and ample space for relaxing and dining. The separate kitchen comprises a modern range of matching wall and base units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit, gas hob with overhead extractor and electric oven, and further space for appliances. There is an inviting bedroom with quiet rear aspect, and a stylish bathroom with modern suite, stainless steel fixtures and part tiled walls.

The property is superbly located within easy access of Hammersmith, Barons Court and Parsons Green underground stations as well as numerous bus routes linking the surrounding area. The lovely green space of Lillie Park and its fitness centre are directly opposite and the River Thames Towpath is a stone's throw away with its variety of bars, Bistro Pubs and restaurants. The stores and amenities of Fulham Palace Rd are immediately close, with nearby Hammersmith and Fulham also offering a further selection of shops, convenience stores and fitness centres.

Viewings are strongly recommended.

Seller’s Comments

'This beautiful flat has been my safe and comfortable home for 13 years and now it’s time for someone else to enjoy this fantastic location. You will love it. '

Lease Information

We understand the property is offered to the market with share of the freehold and lease of 99 years from 29 September 1983 - 62 years remaining. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries and verify this information with a solicitor.

Service Charges

To be confirmed. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries and verify this information with a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Built in 2011 this interior designed new build house is arranged over four floors and is immaculately presented throughout.

Set back from the road through an attractive archway this unusual property presents modern living and design.

On the ground floor is a bedroom, currently used as a study, a contemporary shower room and a wonderful reception room which benefits from an abundance of natural light from the large windows overlooking a fantastic green living wall display. The reception room is of a good size and has bi-folding glass doors that lead on to a charming west facing private terrace.

On the lower ground floor is a further bedroom/study, a guest cloakroom and a utility room. The fully fitted state of the art kitchen with a separate dining area is located at the rear of the property and benefits from excellent light and a further patio.

The first floor is arranged with two generous double bedrooms and two en suite bathrooms; one with a shower, the other with a bath.

The luxurious master suite is arranged over the entire second floor. With a fantastic bedroom with an entire wall of windows and an area dedicated to storage. The sumptuous ensuite bathroom has a walk in shower, double sinks and a freestanding bath. This wonderful floor benefits from a balcony at both the front and the back of the property. The charming east facing balcony at the front of the property is particularly private and benefits from picturesque rooftop views over the Peterborough Estate.

This is the perfect modern house.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This one bedroom apartment is located on the first floor. The apartment is North west facing and finished to a high specification with distinctive interior design shaped by Johnson Naylor.

Description

Visit our Brand New Showhome
Our new showhome is now available to view, created by renowned designer, Nick Auston.

We asked Nick to produce a 'Quintessentially British' interior design scheme for a 2-bedroom apartment by using small and local businesses along the King's Road. Our main aim for this showhome is to explore originality, whilst delving into the rich history of the site itself as well as surrounding area of Fulham.

In addition, the apartment brings a new meaning to the showhome concept with innovative software that allows potential purchases to interact with items in the showhome whether visiting in person or virtually. The unique technology offers an in-depth insight into the property, its interiors and the vision for King's Road Park.

Transforming London's Heritage

King's Road Park will transform a hidden part of London's heritage, to create a new sustainable neighbourhood set within a beautiful park, truly designed for life.

Situated just 60 metres from the iconic King's Road and close to the River Thames, King's Road Park is in one of south-west London's most celebrated locations. Perfectly located in Zone 2 and only a 10 minute walk from both an Underground and Overground station, this sought-after address is well connected and close to the very best that London has to offer.

King's Road Park is the last project of its scale yet to be started within the Fulham Riverside Regeneration Area and south-west London. This will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings set within a new public square. 100,000 sq. Ft. Of commercial space will provide a choice of restaurants, bars and offices.

*Virtual viewings available with our marketing suite staff. Book your appointment today to find out more about our latest release at King's Road Park. At present in-person viewings are permitted but we encourage a virtual viewing in the first instance.*

A collection of stylish suites, 1,2,3 and 4 bedroom apartments, a new public park with an extensive range of community facilities.

Prices from £725,000.

Location
As part of the Fulham regeneration area, King's Road Park will see the restoration of two Grade II listed buildings, set within new public square and contemporary designed commercial space. The development is situated just 60 metres from the King's Road in Chelsea and a stones through to the River Thames.

The Zone two location is within easy reach of Fulham Broadway Underground station (15 minutes to Victoria on the District Line), and Imperial Wharf Overground station, taking you one stop to Clapham Junction south of the river.

Amenities
Residents will benefit from a beautiful landscaped public park at the centre of the development, providing a significant open space for the local community. The development provides access to luxury health and fitness facilities featuring a gymnasium and studios, 25m swimming pool with vitality pool, steam room, sauna and treatment rooms. Finally, residents will enjoy private access to a cinema, golf simulator and games room.

The ground floor and first floors feature an elegant lobby with a 24-hour concierge, a private dining room and meeting rooms, with a private bar, a relaxing work space and communal gardens.

Images are CGIs and indicative only.

Square Footage: 611 sq ft

Acreage: 16 Acres

detailedDescription:
This split-level period conversion boasts alot of character with a modern twist.

This appealing property is presented in good order throughout; when entering the flat, you lead straight upstairs to the first floor. The second double bedroom with plenty of built-in wardrobes and storage space is straight ahead. To the left is the modern fitted family bathroom.

Moving to the front of the building, you head up a few more stairs and straight into the kitchen, this is segregated to the reception but still completely open to the living/reception space, absolutley perfect for entertaining.

Leading out of the living space and up a couple more stairs you walk straight out to the roof terrace, this is beautifully decked and has garden furntiure and a BBQ.

Finally you land into the top of the property entering the master bedroom, there is plenty of built in storgae and tons of space in the eaves. There is a stunning en suite bathroom fitted.

detailedDescription:
Sunny south-facing two-bedroom apartment located on the first-floor of a two-storey block on a quiet well-maintained and sought after private development, close to Wendell Park. Offered chain-free, this top floor property features a bright open-plan sitting-room/diner/fitted kitchen, a double bedroom and a single bedroom, both with fitted wardrobes, and a bathroom with over-bath shower.

With views over attractive and well cared for communal gardens, the property has its own private parking space and also offers bicycle storage, which is a real plus when living in London.

Close to the popular green spaces of Wendell Park and Ravenscourt Park, it is a few minutes walk from two corner shops, and also convenient for the local shops and amenities of Askew Road and The Vale, and the independent pubs and shops of Churchfield Road.

Stamford Brook (District Line) tube station is a short walk away, Turnham Green and Acton Central stations are within easy reach, and nearby bus routes take you to Shepherd′s Bush, Westfield Shopping Centre, Chiswick High Road and into central London.

This is a fantastic opportunity and the property will work equally well as a main home, a London pied-a-terre, or as an investment property.

detailedDescription:
A modern two bedroom garden flat with its own entrance on Harwood Road, only a short walk from Fulham Broadway.

This spacious flat offers almost 850 sq ft (78.7 sq m) of living space, set on the lower ground floor of this period conversion. There is a smart open plan kitchen living room with bi folding doors opening onto a two-tiered private garden. This stylish flat comprises a master bedroom with built in storage and an en suite bathroom,
a second bedroom with built in storage and a separate modern shower room. There is a further storage area at the front of the flat. The property is presented in very good condition throughout.

Located a short walk from Fulham Broadway Station (District Line, Zone 2) and the amenities of the Fulham Road. There are many excellent local restaurants, bars, shops and independent cafes nearby including a David Lloyd Gym, Vue cinema, Waitrose supermarket and a Whole Foods market. Eel Brook Common is also only a very short walk away, as is Parsons Green (on the west side of the park) where you can find more shops, cafes and the famous White Horse pub. You can also catch frequent buses from the Fulham Road or the New Kings Road into Chelsea and towards Central London.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Brackenbury Road, Brackenbury Village, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
This three bedroom conversion apartment is set across the first and second floors of a handsome Victorian house in the popular Brackenbury Village area. The architect designed home boasts a floorplan in excess of 1100 Sq’ – 102 SqM; the first floor comprises two double bedrooms and one single bedroom, which is ideal for a nursery or home office, alongside a stylish family bathroom. The heart of the home is undoubtedly the fabulous dual aspect open plan reception room with dedicated dining space and adjacent kitchen, set across the second floor. A wall of sash windows provides stunning South Westerly views, including spectacular sunsets. You’ll find swathes of wooden flooring, glass ceiling lights, built-in Smeg appliances and cleverly integrated custom storage solutions. The home comes with the rare bonus of access to private outdoor space and a dedicated utility and boot room, complete with washing machine and separate tumble dryer. The apartment is finished to a high standard of décor and is presented in excellent condition offering discerning buyers a light, bright, turn-key family home.

Set in the heart of Brackenbury Road, a tree-lined residential street in the perennially popular Brackenbury Village area, the location of this home is exceptional. A short stroll from the Village deli, butcher and several family-friendly pubs, you’re also seven minute walk from the open spaces of Green Flag Award-winning Ravenscourt Park. Much loved local gems like Swallow Coffee, Pekoe Mellow and Bears are complemented by the wider amenities of Goldhawk Road, Hammersmith Grove and King Street; world class shopping, entertainment and dining options can be found in Westfield which is 15 minutes on foot or a 4 minute drive. Young families are firmly within the catchment for Ofsted Outstanding Brackenbury Primary while John Betts Primary is also nearby; independent options include co-educational Ravenscourt Park Preparatory School and Latymer Prep. Secondary school options are equally excellent and include West London Free School, in the top 1% of schools nationwide according to the Times Parent Power 2021 rankings as well as independent Latymer Upper and all-girls Godolphin & Latymer.

Call Horton and Garton, Brackenbury Village’s market leader, on to arrange your viewing.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Ravilious House, Ravenscourt Park, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
This spacious two double bedroom - two bathroom apartment, circa 846 Sq’ – 78 SqM, is set within a modern landmark building ideally positioned at the southern entrance for overlooking Ravenscourt Park.

Set on the first floor (with lift), you are greeted by a generous entry hall offering superb storage and utilities space. With a highly desirable corner position, the dual aspect living space benefits from both views across Ravenscourt Park and a wall of glass leading onto a sunny 14’ west facing balcony. This sociable living space, ideal for entertaining, features a seamlessly integrated modern kitchen. The first of two double bedrooms offers a westerly dual aspect and the second, complete with its own contemporary en-suite, overlooks Ravenscourt Park. A smart family bathroom completes the home. You will find swathes of wooden flooring with underfloor heating throughout the apartment.

Offering an unparalleled location and nestled in the heart of King Street, Ravilious House is located immediately opposite 33-acre Green Flag award-winning Ravenscourt Park. The park offers the owner swift access to a host of outdoor pursuits including tennis and basketball courts. Visit the W6 Garden Centre for inspiration to turn the balcony into a verdant oasis or to simply enjoy a coffee with a friend in the stunning surroundings. Little ones will enjoy the paddling pool and ‘beach’ offered by the park during the summer months. The leafy aspect belies the apartment’s proximity to superb amenities and transport links: Ravenscourt Park station (District line) is just 3 minutes on foot from your front door and a host of bus links will bring you from King Street directly to central London. The owner is spoilt for choice when it comes to local Ravenscourt Park institutions like Rafaello Cafe, Saffron, Indian Zing, Patisserie Sainte Anne, Yoshi Sushi and Saigon Saigon, and Chiswick High Road restaurants and shops are also on your doorstep. Less than 10 minutes on foot delivers you to Hammersmith’s crown jewel - the vistas, walks and historic pubs along the River Thames. The local primary and secondary school options could not be better with the home moments from single form entry Ofsted Outstanding St Peter’s Church of England primary and the highly desirable West London Free School (co-ed secondary). Independent school options are equally excellent and include Ravenscourt Park Preparatory School and Latymer Prep and Upper Schools.

To arrange a viewing please call the sales team at Horton and Garton .

title: 1 bed flat for sale

address: Walham Grove, West Brompton, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A beautiful early Victorian house on the southern side of this picturesque, well situated street which is arguably one of the best in Fulham. The house has retained many original features which is a credit to the current owner who has worked tirelessly to preserve this historical property during their long tenure.

The property is arranged over four floors and contains four double bedrooms and three bathrooms extending to approx. 2285 sqft. There is an enclosed, and private south facing garden and an additional roof terrace. The current owners have also created a very useful utility store to the lower ground floor which could be used as a wine cellar.

Houses of this originality and on this side of the street rarely come to market so we wholeheartedly recommend an internal inspection. To be sold for the first time since 1976.

Walham Grove is a super prime address in Fulham. The location is ideal given its proximity to Fulham Broadway and West Brompton. Waitrose and Wholefoods supermarkets are nearby and local transport links are excellent and all within 0.5 miles.

***There was planning permission (recently lapsed) to create a substantial rear extension. Planning ref: 2014/03514/ful***

title: 4 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
Ref/JD0093

Attention #Fulham lovers! Gorgeous, #ShareofFreehold, #periodconversion ground floor, 1 bed apartment and with #patio. 8 mins to #ParsonsGreen station (#DistrictLine), 10 mins to #FulhamBroadway. Perfect for first time buyers & as #PiedaTerre! A superb, newly refurbished 1 bed Victorian conversion, may be what you have been waiting for! Fantastic opportunity to live in #SouthWestLondon, where the charm of the river meets urban convenience!

Offered in contemporary style, this ground floor apartment with an attractive patio is also in a prime location; moments away from Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway tube stations and the many bars and restaurants of the popular Fulham Road & North End Roads. Conveniently located on the corner of Lilyville Road and Bishops Road, it is in one of the most sought after tree-lined streets, absolutely perfect for first time buyers, professionals and anyone looking for a pied-a-terre.

The apartment boasts a bright and airy reception with an impressive 10ft high ceiling, an open plan kitchen with integrated appliances, a luxury family bathroom with German (Duravit) fittings and a spacious double bedroom with bespoke fitted wardrobes (that includes fully adjustable shelving -Euro 32 shelving system), leading onto a courtyard where one can enjoy private outdoor living.

Finished to an immaculate spec throughout, the apartment benefits many other features including double glazed windows, central heating with new radiators, newly fitted 80/20 wool carpets, designer sanitary wear, bespoke hardware cupboards and an entry phone system.

In addition to the internal refurbishment, the apartment also enjoys the refurbishment done 2 years ago to the facade of the building and a new roof. 120mm thick rigid insulation has been installed down to the plywood deck reducing the amount of heat lost, lowering emissions and fuel bills!

Charming inside and out, this property at one of the prime locations in London, is one "not to be missed" !

An impressive five bedroom house offering over 2,140 sq ft of living space, only moments from Parsons Green.

On the first floor is the master bedroom with built in storage and a balcony, two further double bedrooms with built in storage, and a family bathroom. detailedDescription:
A charming three bedroom Victorian house, located on the popular 'Alphabet Streets'

Location

Kenyon Street forms part of the desirable 'Alphabet Streets' of Fulham, conveniently located to the river Thames and the popular Bishops Park with its green open space, tennis courts and children's playgrounds.

The area has an excellent selection of schools including: Millie's House nursery, Fulham Prep and St. Augustine's Catholic Primary School.

Putney Bridge underground station is located approximately 1 mile away and Parsons Green 1.3 miles away.

Description

This traditional Victorian Fulham house offers excellent space for both family living and entertaining. On entering the property there is a double reception room with bay window, which floods the room with natural light, as well as a period fireplace and cornicing. This room further benefits from wooden floors, high ceilings and a full wall of integrated shelves.

From here there are double doors into the bright, open plan kitchen dining room. The large skylights and the current owner's love of indoor plants create an orangery feel with French doors opening onto the immaculately kept patio garden. One can imagine many summer days and evenings in this garden.

The three double bedrooms are found over the top two floors. The principal bedroom is located at the front of the first floor, again benefiting from an abundance of light through the bay window and ample storage. It has a sizable en-suite bathroom with a double wash basin, bath and shower. This floor further comprises a double bedroom and family bathroom.

The top floor hosts the third bedroom with en-suite and built-in wardrobes. This floor has the potential to extend by adding a pod room, subject to planning permission.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A stylish Manhattan-style apartment located within the desirable Chelsea Creek development. The apartment provides comfortable open plan living space on the fourth floor looking out on, and with access to, a private communal garden in a secure, well-maintained development.

This bright apartment is well-appointed with high-quality interiors, floor-to-ceiling windows, stone worktops, wooden flooring, and Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware. There is a custom-designed kitchen with high-quality integrated appliances and a utility cupboard.

The development also offers residents only ‘The Spa’ a state-of-the-art health spa, gymnasium, and swimming pool along with a 24hr security and concierge service.

Set within the area of Imperial Wharf which lies on the banks of the River Thames on the border of Fulham and Chelsea and comprises residential flats, a number of shops, and high-end restaurants. It is also just moments away from the world-renowned Kings Road and a 20-minute cycle to Hyde Park Corner and the West End.

Imperial Wharf's over-ground train station is literally a minute walk away, with one-stop connections to Clapham Junction (trains to Waterloo and Victoria) and West Brompton (District Line). Shepherds Bush (Central Line, Westfield) is 8 minutes away. For the international traveler, LHR and LGW are both easily accessible within c.45 minutes. Alternatively, River Bus services are also available from Chelsea Harbour and the West End is only a 20-minute cycle away.

Ownership of the apartment also offers access to secure underground parking for an annual license fee.

This apartment makes an excellent full-time residence, but also offers an investment proposition with a gross yield in excess of 4%.

detailedDescription:
This refined three-bedroom ‘Lion house’ on Bovingdon Road is set within the Sturridge Street Conservation Area on the coveted Peterborough Estate, which lies between Parsons Green, Fulham and Chelsea Harbour and is a short walk from the green open spaces of Eel Brook Common. The four-storey home, which has a private, south-facing garden extends to approximately 2,650 sq ft and has been the subject of an exacting renovation throughout.

The Building

‘Lion houses’ are identified by the miniature lion statues that adorn their roofs. They were built in locations across Fulham and Barnes by the Victorian housebuilder, James Nichols, around the turn of the century. The houses came in three types and were customarily built to a higher standard and in more prestigious locations than a typical Victorian terrace house, hence their demand.

The Tour

The terrace of houses is set far back from the quiet, residential street, behind a series of front courtyards. A walkway leads up to the house, passing a lightwell and a patio for the lower ground level. The house retains its original modest façade but has undergone an extensive redesign internally to create a beautiful, calm space, filled with light.

Entry is at a slightly raised-ground floor and to a large open reception area. Engineered wood flooring in rich hues runs underfoot, warmed by underfloor heating that extends throughout the majority of the house. The primary living space, on the left-hand side of the plan, is arranged around a central fireplace with a striking Corten steel-clad chimney stack and concrete plinth surround. Beyond, steps descend from the dining area to the extended kitchen, where sleek, white Corian worktops and cabinetry by modulnova are grounded by the polished concrete floor. Appliances are by Gaggenau, zug and Miele. A series of roof lights perforate the high ceilings and sliding glazed doors open to the south-facing garden.

The lower-ground level comprises a sizeable open space with exposed-brick walls and access to a patio from which light pours into the room. This space is currently used as a media room but is wonderfully versatile. To the left of the lightwell is a wine cellar, and opposite is a guest WC and utility room.

A suspended staircase with oak treads ascends to the upper levels. The main bedroom suite occupies most of the first floor and is filled with immaculate oak joinery. The bedroom itself is a calm, tonally pared-back space, providing a beautiful backdrop for the original honed marble fire surround, home to a working gas fireplace. A window seat lies beneath the wide sash windows and full-height sliding pocket doors can be adjusted to open and close the dressing area when required. Steps lead down to a generous bathroom with large-format tiling, a freestanding Corian bath and a walk-in shower.

A second double bedroom, with an en suite bathroom, is located on the level above. Here an exotic atmosphere is created by the light oak-clad walls and floors, and Louvre wardrobes. The second floor contains a study area with a custom-built desk and storage, as well as a third bedroom and a shower room.

Outdoor Space

The garden is a fantastic space for entertaining. Designed with entertaining in mind, the contemporary area has paved, concrete and decked areas, and several seating areas. The beds are filled with banana trees, evergreen fatsia Japonica and a variety of palms.

The Area

Bovingdon Road is a short walk from the many shops, bars, restaurants and cafes of Fulham and Parsons Green. In the immediate vicinity, there are several good eateries, pubs and cafes, and an array of independent shops. The excellent River Café is within walking distance. There are a number of green open spaces nearby including Eel Brook Common, Bishops Park Hurlingham Park, all of which are within easy reach.

The nearest stations to Bovingdon Road are Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway (District Line), and many bus routes to central London run nearby.

For sale by online Auction on 15th July 2021 (unless sold prior): Reversionary Investment 3 Bed House (not inspected). The property is let on a 90 year lease from 25th March 1933 thus having less than 1 and 3/4years unexpired. The house was recently fire damaged.
Situation

In the popular 'Groves' area of Shepherds Bush within close proximity of Goldhawk Road and located less than a mile from White City Underground Station (Central Line) and Wood Lane Underground Station (Circle & Hammersmith & City Lines). Westfield Shopping Centre lies approx. 1 mile to the east.
Property

A 2 storey terraced house.
Accommodation

Believed to be a 3 Bed House (not inspected internally)

VAT is not applicable to this Lot
Freehold

tenancy

The entire property is let on a full repairing and insuring lease to an Individual for a term of 90 years from 25th March 1933 (thus having 1¾ years unexpired) at a fixed ground rent of £7 per annum.

Note 1: The property was recently affected by a fire.

Note 2: The property was to be insured by the lessee, but we are not aware if any insurance is in place to cover reinstatement.

Note 3: A 3 bed terraced house at No. 85 Thorpebank Road sold in February 2020 for £760,000 (Source: ).

Note 4: There is a 6 week completion.

Note 5: This Lot was offered in our 27th May 2021 auction with a Reserve Price below £300,000 and it sold after many bids for £513,000. The Purchaser failed to pay the full 10% deposit and the Vendors have treated that as a repudiation of the contract.
title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Beautifully designed two bedroom apartment in the desirable Brackenbury village.

Location

Kilmarsh Road is a residential street in the heart of West London.

Hammersmith is a major transport hub and the location offers excellent transport links into the city and is less than a quarter of a mile from Hammersmith Broadway station, approximately 0.3 miles (Piccadilly, District, Circle, Hammersmith and City Lines) and Goldhawk Road, approximately 0.6 miles (Circle and Hammersmith and City Lines). Hammersmith is also excellently positioned for the A4 offering convenient access to Heathrow airport and beyond.

Kilmarsh Road is 0.3 miles to Hammersmith Broadway, with many shops and amenities, including the excellent Lyric Theatre. There are a number of excellent maintained and independent schools for all ages nearby, including the highly-esteemed Godolphin and Latymer, St Paul's and Latymer Upper School as well as numerous shops, services and restaurants in King Street, and Chiswick is close by offering a number of highly acclaimed restaurants and eateries. Westfield Shopping Centre is also near for more extensive shopping with its excellent retail, restaurant, leisure and additional transport facilities including Shepherds Bush (Overground and Central Line).

Description

This beautifully designed apartment is found on the ground floor and is presented over the two floors of the building with beautiful wood floors throughout.

The property benefits from outdoor space in the form of light wells and a front garden area,

The property briefly comprises; two bedrooms, the fantastic principal with two sets of large double doors that open on to a bright paved light well. The second bedroom sits adjacent and also makes use of the extended light well with double doors that open on it also. Both bedrooms have been impeccably finished and offer a light airy feel and make use of the highly designed and luxurious marble style bathroom

The apartment reception area is modern and open plan and offers excellent kitchen island dinning, a bespoke Italian kitchen with plenty of concealed storage and quality built-in appliances. It opens to the bright airy reception room with tall south facing windows allowing an abundance of natural light.

The apartment has been finished to the highest standard and offers a combination of excellent bespoke finishes features throughout along with exceptional lighting, top of the range hardware and attention to detail throughout.

Square Footage: 769 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 999 years remaining

This well-presented apartment also offers two generously sized bedrooms, fitted wardrobes and tiled finished en-suites in both bedrooms. This property is South East facing and includes a guest WC and a large private balcony leading out from the living area and offers amazing river views.

detailedDescription:
Summary
This is a fantastic freehold house on one of West Brompton's most sought after roads. The house is mid terrace on a quiet residential street.

Description
The property is in good condition throughout and is arranged over three floors. It is just shy of 1600sqft, with lots of potential to extend subject to planning. The existing layout comprises of six bedrooms and two bathrooms with an HMO license, however it could easily be used as a stunning family home.
The ground floor has a large reception / bedroom at the front of the house and at the rear, a bright open plan, well equipped kitchen, with French doors leading onto the paved low maintenance south facing garden. The first floor provides three bedrooms and the modern family bathroom. The top floor has two further double bedrooms and another well sized bathroom.
Anselm Road is well located, walking distance from both Fulham Broadway Station (District Line) and West Brompton (Overground and District Line) and on the doorstep of many local amenities.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription: This wonderful garden flat has been sympathetically restored and refurbished to create a simply fantastic space in an enviable location. Entering through its own front door into a wood-panelled entrance hall with beautiful black and white floor tiling and reclaimed timber doors one senses immediately the property's natural Victorian charm. The bedroom at the front of the property boasts original wooden shutters to the bay window, bespoke wardrobes and further wooden panelling, whilst the second bedroom showcases an original feature stove, similar to that seen in Benjamin Franklin's London house, modern en-suite bathroom and access to a small courtyard. The open plan kitchen and reception room at the rear of the property has been cleverly designed and concertina doors open the full width of the room to give access to a pretty landscaped garden with steps leading to a separate rear entrance. There is an additional utility area and an abundance of storage which is rarely seen in apartments today. Barclay Road is a popular tree lined residential street, moments from the shops, restaurants and amenities of Fulham Broadway (district line).

An exceptional opportunity to acquire a new and ready for occupancy, duplex garden apartment within Lillie Square, Capital and Counties award-winning development: Part of the Earls Court exhibition regeneration. A few steps from the apartment entrance is a dedicated indoor parking place.

Lillie Square is a new and exclusive London development, which takes the traditional London garden square as its inspiration. Located in Earls Court where Kensington, Chelsea and Fulham meet, these exceptional apartments, townhouses and penthouses offer the best in contemporary urban living, combined with elegant public spaces and outstanding landscaped gardens.

Lillie Square also features a 5-star concierge service, a private residents’ club with swimming pool and 24-hour security. As the first development in Terry Farrell and Partners’ Earls Court Masterplan, Lillie Square represents an exceptional place to live.
