detailedDescription:
Opening from the ground floor into an elegant open-plan reception room. This space has been exceptionally planned to provide a welcoming living space at the front within the large bay window, a study area, additional seating area, and a dining space that overlooks the floor below. The reception opens down to the walled courtyard gardens and there is also a stylish WC at the entrance.

The lower ground floor provides a spacious kitchen/breakfast room with an array of fitted units and space for appliances. Adjacent to this is the separate utility/shower room, and a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes.

There are a further three double bedrooms on the first floor, two of which have built-in wardrobes and ensuite bathrooms.

Comprising of the top floor is the elegant principal bedroom and ensuite shower room that includes a double vanity unit. This spacious bedroom floods with natural light from the skylight above and benefits from the fitted wardrobes, chest-of-drawers, and ample eaves storage located behind the wardrobes. There is also a boiler room on this floor with significant further storage.

This is a beautifully designed house, perfect for a family or young professionals who are looking for a home ready to move into.

Waterford Road runs between Fulham Road and New Kings Road, conveniently located for the many shops, restaurants, bars and coffee houses of Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway.

address: Lockside House, 3 Thurstan Street, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A stylish four bedroom apartment overlooking immaculate communal gardens

Location

Imperial Wharf Station is located next to the development, offering Overground and Mainline services to central London, Clapham Junction and services outside of London. There is an array of cafes, restaurants and supermarket shops nearby on the Kings Road.

Description

This exceptional four bedroom apartment in the sought after Chelsea creek development with stunning communal gardens. The accommodation includes a spacious hallway with doors leading through to a large open plan reception room with a state of the arts integrated kitchen, with floor to ceiling glass doors opening onto a private balcony. The apartment also benefits from a study alongside the reception room. The principal bedroom with excellent built in wardrobes, access to another balcony and luxurious en-suite bathroom, a further three double bedrooms one en-suite shower room and the use of a separate bathroom. Residents of Chelsea Creek benefit from fantastic on site amenities including a 24 hour concierge service and security, access to private communal gardens and a state of the art spa including swimming pool, gymnasium, sauna and steam room, sports massage services and personal training. Conveniently located for both the station and the selection of shops and restaurants at Imperial Wharf, Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green are also within reach, as well as the River Thames.

Square Footage: 1786 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 988 years remaining

address: Talgarth Road, Barons Court, London W14
detailedDescription: This beautifully presented property is located on the Raised Ground floor of a well-maintained period property on Talgarth Road, only moments from Barons Court and West Kensington tube stations. On entering the property, you will be greeted by a great sized open plan kitchen/lounge with a large bay window, wooden flooring, and plenty of space to dine. The kitchen hosts a dishwasher, washing machine and plenty of storage and workspace. There is a great sized shower room, a spacious double bedroom with an exposed brick wall, immaculate sash windows and new carpets. The second bedroom, also a double, hosts new carpets, ample light, and enough space for free-standing storage. In the hallway of this property is a great sized walk-in storage area, perfect for suitcases, bikes or utilities. The entire property has been freshly painted throughout and is ready to be made a home!
title: 2 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
This beautiful five bedroom home is split over four floors with a huge amount of lateral living space, making it the perfect family home. The ground of the home features a spacious open plan living area with a mezzanine area looking down into the kitchen/dining area. There is also access to a patio area providing private outdoor space.

Going downstairs, you will find a stunning open plan kitchen/ dining area. This unique kitchen area with double height ceilings benefits from an abundance of light. The first floor of the home boasts three double bedrooms, two of which have their own en-suite bathroom. The top floor of the house features a stunning master bedroom, complete with skylight and air conditioning. This spacious principal bedroom also comes with its own en-suite bathroom.

Waterford Road is one of Fulham’s premier addresses. Located close to Fulham Broadway and the array of local shops and restaurants it has to offer, it also benefits from access onto the fashionable shops and eateries lining King's Road.

address: Keith Grove, Shepherds Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
Hanover Court, Keith Grove, W12. We have pleasure offering this well proportioned two double bedroom apartment in this attractive Art Deco influenced purpose built block. The apartment is situated on the second floor, is offered in good condition throughout and offers two generous double bedrooms. The reception room is light and airy, there's a three piece bathroom and a modern fitted kitchen with access out on to a private balcony. To arrange a viewing please call Jorgensen Turner Shepherds Bush office on .

Situated on Keith Grove (just off the Uxbridge Road) the location offers plenty of convenience with an abundance of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The infamous Westfield shopping centre is also only a short walk away offering a plethora of retail stores. Transport wise the apartment is well served by a number of excellent bus routes along the Uxbridge Road, the Shepherds Bush Market station on the Hammersmith and City and Circle Line), Shepherds Bush (Central Line) plus the new Shepherds Bush British Rail stations are all within walking distance of the property.

address: Lanark Mansions, Pennard Road, London W12
detailedDescription:
Perched high above Pennard road you will be delighted by this astounding two bedroom flat. Clever design rubs shoulders with excellent materials and beautiful craftsmanship to create one of the best two bedroom flats I have seen. The bedrooms are both generous doubles, there is an abundance of storage, two well-appointed bathrooms and the kitchen/reception room is almost 25 foot long. A wonderful entertaining space if ever I saw one. Those of you who enjoy a backstory may like to know that Christine Keeler and Mandy Rice Davies (of Profumo scandal fame) once shared a flat in Lanark Mansions. We can't say which flat it was but it may have been this one and everyone needs a little "scandal" in their life don't you think?

Two Double Bedrooms

Open Plan Reception/Kitchen

Two Bathrooms (one en suite)

High Specification Finish

No Onward Chain

Location:
Lanark Mansion is located on Pennard Road, an attractive residential street running between the Uxbridge and Goldhawk Roads with Shepherds Bush Market and Goldhawk Road tube stations at each end, Shepherds Bush Central Line and Overground Train Stations are also within easy reach. Shepherds Bush Market, Shepherds Bush Green and Westfield London are on your doorstep within just a few minutes walk. Shepherds Bush is undergoing a huge rejuvenation and boarders Holland Park, Hammersmith and Chiswick, all of which are close by and offer further amenities, open spaces and transport links.

detailedDescription:
A wonderfully bright and well proportioned one bedroom apartment set in a desirable mansion block in the 'Munster Village' area of Fulham. The property is located on the first floor with a West facing reception room boasting wonderfully high ceilings and beautiful bay windows. At the rear of the property is a separate bedroom, bathroom and WC all finished to a modern standard and again, all giving this flat a bright and airy feel throughout.
Wyfold Road is set just off the Munster Road and only a very short walk away from some local cafés, restaurants and parks, Bishops park is only a five minute walk away. A few more minutes down the Munster Road, you hit the Fulham Road where you have all the shops and amenities you could possibly need.
There are lots of local bus routes within the close vicinity of your front door, and Parsons Green station is around a 15 minute walk from your front door. For the motorist, a swift exit to the A4 takes you out of or into London in about 15 to 20 minutes.
Early viewing for this property is highly recommended.

detailedDescription: An outstanding two double bedroom flat that has been beautifully refurbished throughout with a wonderfully bright 18’5 x 13’7 reception room and a separate 17’4 x 15’2 eat in kitchen breakfast room. This apartment offers exceptional living and entertaining space which makes this a must view property. Further benefits include two generous double bedrooms with built in wardrobes, a stylish bathroom suite with a separate WC, a host of original features including fireplace, dado rail, cornicing and built in dwarf cupboards in the living room. There are a large variety of amenities on your doorstep including Waitrose, Sainsburys, Café Nero, Pret-a-Manger and Pizza Express. The River Thames towpath is only a stones throw away with some great pubs and restaurants including The Crabtree, Blue Boat, River Café and the recently renovated Riverside Studios which boasts a cinema, two theatres, art gallery, restaurant and bar. Hammersmith and Barons Court underground stations are approximately 10 minutes’ walk. Leasehold.

detailedDescription: An exceptional family house in Parsons Green which has the perfect combination of traditional features with a modern take. Offering a great sense of space and exceptionally bright, the property features a very large double reception room on the ground floor. The top floor features three further bedrooms and family bathroom. Two of the bedrooms on the top floor also benefit from built-in storage. The house is fully equipped with Sonos speakers and is finished to a very high specification throughout. detailedDescription:
A spacious and well proportioned 2 bedroom garden flat in this convenient location close to the River and Bishops Park. The property benefits from 2 double bedrooms with fitted cupboards, high ceilings, plenty of Victorian character and a lovely kitchen dining room leading out to a private garden at the rear, with the added bonus of a side return with plenty of storage space for outdoor items.

Fulham Palace Road runs parallel to the Thames and is approx. 1.5m from Fulham to Hammersmith. There are several independent cafes and shops on Fulham Palace Road itself, and depending which end of the road you’re on you can access other busier areas such as Fulham Road, Munster Road or Hammersmith. Two underground stations are at the ends of the road, Putney Bridge (District Line, Zone 2) and Hammersmith (District, Piccadilly, Hammersmith & City Lines) Buses also run towards Chelsea, Putney and central London whilst the Thames riverside walk, and the excellent and recently re-developed Bishops Park (popular with families) is a real bonus being only a short walk away.

detailedDescription:
A fantastic two -bedroom modern duplex apartment boasting River Thames views.
This chic and stylish apartment boasts high end finishes with open plan living and high-end kitchen, the modern kitchen has fully integrated appliances including an induction hob, oven, combi microwave, fridge/ freezer, dishwasher.
The light and airy room offers an abundance of space and natural light from the floor to ceiling windows throughout.
Property boasts of a balcony that overlooks the River Thames giving the perfect London night views.

Included is a 24 hour security, allocated parking, 24hr gym and a concierge service available to all Riverside residents. The apartment boasts a desirable position within the Fulham/Chelsea Creek area and offers convenient proximity to the area's popular bars, restaurants, shops and amenities. Imperial Wharf station is a short walk away and provides routes to the north of London via Earl’s Court and Shepherd’s Bush, as well as south to Clapham Junction.

Viewings are highly recommended and can be booked 24/7 via Purplebricks website.

Summary
This is a superb first floor apartment in a stunning Mansion block, on a pretty tree lined crescent. The property is in a great condition, with original period features throughout, including solid wooden flooring and is flooded with natural light.

Description
At just shy of 500sqftm, the property offers a well-proportioned layout with generous room sizes. There is a large living room at the end of the property with a charming feature bay window and a lovely outlook over the courtyard below. Beaumont Crescent is less than 0.1 miles from West Kensington Station (District Line) and on the doorstep of all the local amenities.

detailedDescription:
A lovely four bedroom semi detached victorian house with three bedrooms, eat in kitchen, separate drawing room and utility room.

The London Broker is proud to bring to market this delightful four-bedroom family home on Chaldon Road. On entering, you will find the sitting room to your left with a gas fireplace and mantlepiece taking centre stage. Beyond the sitting room is a W.C. With a secret door revealing a large utility room complete with the usual white goods as well as a 2nd dishwasher and sink with drying area. Continuing further into this semi-detached home, the house opens to a large eat-in kitchen, dining area and sitting room with by-folding doors onto a sunny south-facing garden at the end. The kitchen area has a six-ring hob with two oven fixed around the ample cupboards space.

Up on the first floor you will find the principle bedroom at the front of the house with a walk-in wardrobe and en suite: Offering a separate shower and bath. Leading to the rear of this Victorian home is a 2nd bathroom and 2nd bedroom with south facing windows overlooking the garden. Up on the top floor of this semi-detached home are 2 further bedrooms; one with an en suite, and the other with a 14 foot south facing terrace, ideal for the summer evenings.
Chaldon Road is perfectly placed just off the Munster road offering residents an array of shops, pubs and restuarants. Equally, heading south you will find the sought-after Fulham Road, with Fulham Palace Road to the west giving you access to both Putney and Hammersmith. There are also several sought-after local and private schools in the area.

Transport is in plentiful supply with options to include: Parson’s Green tube station offering the district line; Barons Court offering the Piccadilly line and Hammersmith giving you access to the district, circle, Piccadilly and metropolitan line. In addition, the local bus stop is home to the 74 bus which goes through Kensington and up to Baker Street, the 211 which goes to Waterloo and the 295 to Clapham Junction.<br /><br />

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Summary
Having recently undergone an extensive renovation, this is a stunning apartment in the heart of the Barons Court Grid, on the pretty tree lined Palliser Road.

Description
The property is located in a grand red brick building and is in an excellent condition with original period features. Accessed via its own private entrance, the property boasts a spacious reception room, a separate kitchen, two bedrooms and two bathrooms.
With the exception of the beautiful tiled flooring in the modern kitchen, there is solid wooden flooring throughout the living space. The large reception room at the back of the property, leads onto the fantastic private garden via the French doors, overlooked only by the peaceful Margravine Park behind.
There are two bedrooms with the master bedroom situated at the front of the property and equipped with plenty of inbuilt storage. Both bedrooms have a bathroom, with the larger coming complete with under floor heating, a coveted free standing bath tub and drying facilities.
Palliser Road is 0.1 miles from Barons Court Station (District and Piccadilly Lines) and on the doorstep of the many local amenities that Barons Court has to offer, all whilst being a short walk from both Central Fulham and Hammersmith.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully finished modern family home with a beautiful south- west facing garden, in the heart of Parsons Green.

The house is set over three floors and offers over 1,530 Sq ft (142 Sq m) of living space. The ground floor has a bright and spacious open plan living room and kitchen/dining room, bi-fold doors lead onto the over 23ft long south/west facing private garden. On the first floor is a double bedroom with built in storage and juliette balcony, a second bedroom with built in storage and a family bathroom. On the top floor is the spacious master bedroom with built in storage and en suite bathroom. The house is presented in excellent condition throughout and benefits from an off street parking space at the front of the property.

Whittingstall Road is unquestionably one of the very best located streets in Fulham, being between the highly desirable Parsons Green, with its many excellent local restaurants, independent cafes and shops and Fulham Road, just to the North, making it an ideal spot. There’s also a Waitrose Supermarket nearby and Parsons Green underground station (District Line, Zone 2) is within minutes of the house. You can also catch frequent buses from the Fulham Road towards Chelsea and Central London.

address: Radipole Road, Parsons Green, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A substantial family house in an excellent Fulham location

Location

Radipole Road is located in a prime position within a small group of residential streets that run north off the Fulham Road. You can find plenty of local amenities and restaurants on Fulham Road itself, and Parsons Green is a short stroll away where you can find more restaurants, independent cafes and boutique shops, including a Waitrose supermarket. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2) which is approximately 0.3 miles away. There is a regular bus service from the Fulham Road towards Fulham Broadway, Chelsea and central London.
There are a number of schools in the area including Kensington Prep, Thomas's and Lady Margaret's.

Description

This property is arranged over five floors. On the ground floor there is an open plan kitchen/dining room at the front and to the rear is an elegant square reception room with wood floors and an attractive fireplace. Bi-fold doors lead out onto pretty patio garden.
On the first floor is a sizeable principal bedroom with excellent storage and an en suite bathroom and a study which opens onto a roof terrace.
There are four further double bedrooms and a further two bathrooms.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Melina Road, Cathnor Park, Shepherd's Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
This bright and spacious split level three-bedroom garden apartment, circa 1175 Sq’ – 109 SqM, is set within this handsome stucco and brick Victorian house and is ideally positioned in this cul-de-sac location, moments from beautiful Cathnor Park. You are greeted by a private entrance on the raised ground floor, an entry hallway and a fantastic reception room opening onto the adjacent kitchen/dining room – a sunny, sociable space ideal for entertaining. A dual aspect double bedroom completes the raised ground floor. Across the natural lower ground floor, you’ll find a further dual aspect double bedroom leading through glass doors onto the garden, separate family bathroom complete with bath and walk-in shower and a phenomenal principal bedroom with en-suite bathroom; both bathrooms have been newly fitted this year. A second set of floor-to-ceiling glass doors from the hallway opens onto the private south westerly 20’ garden. Decked with large mature raised beds and capturing the light year-round, it is a wonderfully low maintenance space, ideal for soaking up the summer sun, but can also be thoroughly enjoyed by a green fingered owner who is keen to add their own design to the beautiful beds.

Melina Road is a highly desirable cul-de-sac that ends in an entrance to Green Flag award-winning Cathnor Park. It is less than 10 minutes on foot to the heart of Askew Village with local favourites like October 26, Detour and The Ginger Pig, while a 7-minute stroll brings you to the amenities of the Uxbridge Road. Just 5 minutes on foot will deliver you to the amenities of Goldhawk Road. Whether it is ice cream from Bear’s, brunch at Proud Mary’s or an artisan coffee from Café Louche, you are extremely well placed to enjoy Shepherd’s Bush’s most beloved local gems. For London’s best variety of world class shopping, restaurants and entertainment, Westfield is 15 minutes on foot. Bus links into central London are close by and Shepherd’s Bush Market (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines) and Shepherd’s Bush (Central line) stations are both within walking distance of the apartment.

Call the Horton and Garton sales team on to arrange your viewing.

detailedDescription:
This is a stand out, five bedroom house, located in the heart of Parsons Green. The layout has been well thought out, beautifully designed and would make a wonderful family home. The entrance hall, which has been tiled, has floor to ceiling critall windows with a door opening into a double reception room, with a bay window at the front and a limestone fireplace. There is a subtle and clever critall window which looks through to, and helps connect with, the kitchen diner which is fully equipped with all the modern appliances. The kitchen opens onto a landscaped, west facing garden.

The lower ground floor has been developed to an extremely high specification. It comprises a double bedroom, built in wardrobes, and an en suite shower room. There is a separate utility room which doubles up as another smaller kitchen. To the rear of the lower ground floor is a superb media room which has been meticulously designed to receive a lot of natural light from the floor to ceiling critall windows and which also incorporates a study area big enough for 2 desks. The master bedroom is on the first floor and has built in wardrobes and drawers along one wall. A pocket door opens into the en suite bath and shower room. The top floor comprises a generous front to back bedroom which is alongside the family bathroom. There are two further bedrooms on each of the half landings, as well as a shower room; all the upstairs bedrooms have air conditioning.

The house is in a superb location on Pursers Cross Road, which is a short walk from Parsons Green with its wide range of shops, cafes, restaurants and pubs, and fantastic green open spaces, including Hurlingham Park and Eel brook common. Parsons Green tube station (district line) is close by and the area also benefits from numerous bus routes into central London and beyond.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Beautifully presented two bedroom flat in the heart of the Brackenbury Village.

Location

Hammersmith is a major transport hub and the location offers excellent transport links into the city and is less than a quarter of a mile from Hammersmith Broadway station (Piccadilly, District, Circle, Hammersmith and City Lines) and Goldhawk Road (Circle and Hammersmith and City Lines). Hammersmith is also excellently positioned for the A4 offering convenient access to Heathrow airport and beyond.

Overstone Road sits in the sought after Brackenbury Village area and is conveniently located for Ravenscourt Park and river walks along The Thames Path. A number of independent eateries and gastro pubs have sprung up nearby including the increasingly popular Brackenbury Wine Rooms.

Close to Hammersmith Broadway, with its shops and amenities, including the excellent Lyric Theatre. There are a number of excellent maintained and independent schools for all ages, including the highly-esteemed Godolphin and Latymer, St Paul's and Latymer Upper School as well as numerous shops, services and restaurants in King Street, and Chiswick is close by offering a number of highly acclaimed restaurants and eateries. Westfield Shopping Centre is also near for more extensive shopping with its excellent retail, restaurant, leisure and additional transport facilities including Shepherds Bush (Overground and Central Line).

Description

This attractive two bedroom Victorian property offers a newly refurbished flat situated on one of the desirable streets that form the sought after Brackenbury Village area.

Upon entrance you find the principal bedroom to the front of the property offering a bright good sized room. Boasting high ceiling and large sash windows.

The well-presented reception room retains many Victorian features, boasting French doors that open on to the patio area. A separate newly refurbished kitchen with parquet flooring, Italian marble tiles and cast iron radiators. The main bathroom is found to the rear and boasts Italian marble tiles and under floor heating.

The second bedroom, is a lovely room with parquet flooring, en suite bathroom and double doors that open on to the private patio area.

This lovely apartment is perfect for both first time buyers and investors and those looking to acquire a pied a terre close to excellent transport links.

Square Footage: 749 sq ft

detailedDescription:
Located just moments from Parsons Green tube station, this exceptional period townhouse have been completely refurbished and fully fitted with soundproof double glazing throughout. The ground floor accommodation comprises; an entrance hall with original tiled flooring leading to two adjoining reception rooms with marble fireplaces.

To the rear is the impressive kitchen/dining room by Luxmoore with a central island, an aga and doors opening out onto a quiet West facing courtyard garden. In addition there is a downstairs WC. The basement offers a separate utility room and built in storage.

The first floor provides two bedrooms and a bathroom, the principal room includes fitted wardrobes and an en-suite. There are a further three bedrooms on the second floor and a bathroom.

Owing to our commitment to keep both our colleagues and clients safe during this period of recommended isolation, we have many self-serve viewing options that may be available to you. These could include video walkthroughs, 360 virtual reality viewings and enhanced comprehensive photography. Call the team to discuss further.

Parsons Green Lane is located in the heart of Parsons Green, moments from a vast array of shops, restaurants, and coffee houses of the area. The many amenities of Fulham Broadway are also within walking distance.

Parsons Green underground station is a 2 minute walk away which services the District line in Central London, and there are many useful bus links that run along the New Kings Road.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

address: De Morgan Road, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
This house provides one of the most impressive ground floor living spaces Aspire have had the pleasure to sell. From the front of the house in the reception you have an unobstructed view through the wider than usual kitchen-diner into the garden and through to the self contained studio/guest house to the rear.

Including the studio, the house measures at 1,725 which, combined with the higher than normal ceiling heights gives a feeling of size and space throughout the property. This end of De Morgan Road has longer gardens than most of Sands End and is slightly wider, which adds to the feeling of space.

The Kitchen reception is enormous and perfect for entertaining, leading out through wide double doors with tasteful wood arches into the garden which has been excellently maintained. At the end of the garden is a studio, ideal as an office, gym or guest house.

The front reception is a double length providing incredible living space, while upstairs all four bedrooms are large doubles with a family bathroom on the first floor and an en-suite open to the master on the second floor.

Light, bright and airy, this house also affords great transport links with Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green tube stations a short walk away. Excellent bus links mean Clapham Junction is very easily accessible and both Imperial Wharf and Wandsworth Town stations are a 10 minute walk away, offering overland connections to Waterloo and out of London. There is also the option to take the river boat from Chelsea Harbour to Blackfriars in no longer than 23 minutes.

For shopping, possibly the largest Sainsbury's in sw London is situated a minutes walk away and there is easy access to all the amenities on the Wandsworth Bridge Road, Fulham Broadway and Imperial Wharf. Further, Westfield is all but a 10 minute journey from Imperial Wharf Station for all your shopping needs. Fulham has an abundance of parks but closest here is South Park which has a great playground for the younger members of the family, a cricket pitch, football pitches and a lovely walk to stretch the legs. The famous Harbour Club is also within easy walking distance. Local schools include the French Lycee situated on Clancarty Road near South Park, Thomas' on Hugon Road and Lady Margarets on Parsons Green.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

A superb larger than average two bedroom flat, located on the 1st floor (Lift) of this popular Art Deco building in Hammersmith with nice views.

The property comprises of; a spacious larger then average master Bedroom with a large built-in wardrobe, bright reception room leading to modern kitchen and family bathroom.

This apartment comes with the right to park, a lift, porter and the heating and hot water are included in the service charge (further details on request). This flat is situated in a great location only 2mins walk to Hammersmith Broadway Tube Stations (District & Piccadilly) lines. Viewing highly recommended.
Property Details:

Description: A 1st floor flat forming part of a large 1930's block

Location: Situated on the north side of Hammersmith Road near the junction of Rowan Road and the scenic walkways along the River Thames, together with the leisure areas of Ravenscourt Park and Holland Park are easily accessible and Charring Cross Hospital is within easy reach with addition shopping amenities of Hammersmith along King Street & Kensington are nearby.

Nearby road communications along the A4 and A316 provide good access to the M4, M3 and M25.

Underground Station - Hammersmith Broadway (Piccadilly, District, Hammersmith & City Lines)

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This bright apartment is arranged over the first floor of a charming period conversion in Fulham and offers fantastic living space. The property has a wonderful living room which boasts a feature fireplace, large sash windows and double heighted ceilings. Overlooking this room is a mezzanine level which is home to a spacious eat-in kitchen and enjoys a south-westerly aspect. There are two double bedrooms, one of which benefits from inbuilt storage, and a family bathroom. This flat has the potential for a discerning buyer to add a roof terrace, subject to planning permission.

Bronsart Road is a quiet tree lined street in the heart of Munster Village. Munster Road, which is just moments away, provides an array of shops, cafes, and eateries. This property is also close to the River Thames and the green spaces of Bishops Park and Fulham Palace. When it comes to transport, the District line can be found at Parsons Green which is within walking distance and there are frequent buses running from Fulham Road which also provide easy access in and out of Central London. For travelling further afield, the Piccadilly line at Hammersmith takes you directly to Heathrow Airport.

detailedDescription:

The property comprises two double bedrooms, family bathroom, spacious reception/dining room and separate kitchen with utility area.

Buer Road is conveniently positioned for access to the many local shops, restaurants and cafés. There are numerous bus routes available as well as Putney Bridge station (District line) providing excellent links across London.

detailedDescription:
A rare opportunity to purchase a period town house enviably positioned on the tree lined Godolphin Road, with masses of potential to extended and modernise throughout.
Offering in excess of 2000 Square feet of living space the property is currently laid out as a five-bedroom family home with three bathrooms and sizable cellar with ample storage space. The home further benefits form a pretty west facing rear garden and is offered to the market chain free.

Location:
Godolphin Road is well placed for the excellent amenities of Shepherds Bush including the fashionable shops, bars and restaurants at Westfield Shopping Centre. Both Shepherds Bush Market and Goldhawk Road Underground stations are within easy reach.
title: 5 bed property for sale

address: Broomhouse Road, Parsons Green, London SW6
detailedDescription:
An impressive three story family house.

Location

Broomhouse Road runs directly off the New Kings Road, near to Parsons Green, and conveniently located for parks, numerous shops, bars and restaurants.
There is an excellent choice of nursery, primary and secondary schools in the area.
Parsons Green underground station is approximately 0.3 miles away and the New Kings Road is served with buses into Sloane Square and the West End.

Description

A beautifully presented end of terrace family house situated in an ideal and central Parsons Green location.
The house has an elegant double reception room with pretty feature fireplace and ceiling mouldings. The rear part of this room has built-in book and storage shelves and makes an ideal space to work from home. The kitchen/breakfast room has been extended with glass to create a wonderfully light space with bi-folding doors leading onto a secluded west facing garden.
Upstairs there is a large principal bedroom with impressive en suite bathroom. Four further bedrooms and two bathrooms allows for flexible living. There is good storage throughout the house and eaves storage to the rear loft.

Square Footage: 1950 sq ft

detailedDescription:
A wonderfully arranged two double bedroom split level conversion flat with fabulous private garden conveniently located close to Fulham Broadway.

Arranged over two floors, the accommodation is perfectly arranged with the entire ground floor offering fantastic living/entertaining space with a lovely reception room, & separate kitchen/dining room opening on to a fabulous private 25' 3 x 17' 1 garden.

On the first floor are two bedrooms, both of which are of a generous size and bathroom.

The property further benefits from having its own private entrance.

detailedDescription:
A luxurious, stylish, and contemporary 1 bedroom flat in a popular Chelsea Creek development. With an open plan kitchen and a beautiful wooden floors in the reception room, this is a delightful flat. This property also overlooks the landscaped gardens and waterways and benefits from a parking space.

This modern apartment in Jaeger House has floor to ceiling windows throughout which allows an abundance of light.

Other benefits include onsite amenities: A gym, pool and spa, as well as 24 hour concierge and security.

There is a large Sainsbury's close by and there are several restaurants and bars nearby at Imperial Wharf and Chelsea Harbour.

The train station at Imperial Wharf is just moments away.

Well serviced public transport links include Imperial Wharf railway station (0.2m) which provides easy connections throughout London. Other transport links include bus, river taxi or underground from Fulham Broadway (0.7m).

All times and distances are approximate.

address: Normand Gardens, Greyhound Road, London W14
detailedDescription:
This charming Victorian terraced house has been thoughtfully extended, offering fantastically balanced living and bedroom space. The ground floor provides a bright double reception room complete with hardwood flooring; leading into an extended kitchen with skylights benefiting from the Southern aspect as well as the well-maintained private garden. The ground floor further comprises a downstairs WC and cellar.
The upper floors offer three double bedrooms with great storage and a large family bathroom. The largest bedroom is situated on the second floor with ample storage and a lovely en-suite bathroom.

Normand Gardens is located South of the Queens Club and within minutes of both Barons Court & West Kensington underground stations. Also, within walking distance of the shops, cafes and restaurants of Fulham, Earls Court and Kensington.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription: Stunning and very well presented 6th floor 2 double bedroom both ensuite and a dressing area. Open plan kitchen/dinning area leading out to 2 balconies with fabulous views of the River Thames by day or night. Sit outside on the table chairs with friends and enjoy the views with a coffee or glass of wine in the evening. 24 Concierge and designated underground parking space. This property has fantastic storage and views from every window. A lot of time and effort has gone into thinking it out. It has been refurbished to the highest standard. Beautiful oak wooden floors throughout, underfloor heating. Master bedroom has wonderful built-in wardrobes and a dressing area with an ensuite digital shower and LED lighting. Porcelonsa tiles in both ensuite bathrooms. The showers have CrossWater automatic shower taps, so the temperature of the water is perfect before stepping into cubicle. The second bedroom again a double and ensuite with digital shower and LED lighting and a window view of the river and boats. The kitchen has a large Liebherr wine fridge and retractable extraction panel for induction hob. Large open area for dinning and relaxing. CCTV and communal gardens. Regent on the river is located on the river directly opposite the Chelsea Harbour club with 12 tennis courts 3 swimming pools and a spa, all kinds of classes, Yoga, hiit, Blaze, dance classes, and 2 state or the art Gyms.A short walk to the clipper boat service at Chelsea harbour pier, which takes you to the city in less than 30 mins and on to Canary wharf. Imperial whart station is only a 10 minute walk along the beautiful river with Westfields only 4 stops away under 10 mins. Clapham junction 1 stop and taking you then where ever you want to go. A truly fantastic place to live in London.

address: Melrose Gardens, Brook Green, London W6
detailedDescription: A wonderful and characterful 5 bedroom end of terrace Victorian house with very good living/entertaining space on the ground floor and a southerly walled garden. The property occupies an excellent position on the street which enjoys an open aspect to the front looking down Melrose Terrace and also has side access. The elegant double reception on the ground floor has a feature fireplace and a wood floor with a library effect/feel to the rear. The full width kitchen/breakfast room has French doors and floor to ceiling windows overlooking the garden. There are 5 bedrooms on the upper floors including the principal bedroom which has a sizeable walk in wardrobe/dressing room. There are 3 bathrooms and a guest cloakroom on the first floor half landing. This house is flooded with light, has a great feel and also has scope to upgrade or excavate the basement if so required subject to the usual planning consent.

address: London House, 100 New Kings Road SW6
detailedDescription:
A stunning and extremely spacious two bedroom apartment, with an extra study/dressing room and two bathrooms in a fantastic location in Parsons Green, on the fourth floor of this modern development.

The apartment comprises a large master bedroom suite with fitted storage, an extra study/dressing room, leading through to the expansive en suite bathroom with a bath and shower. There is a further double bedroom with fitted storage and a luxury family bathroom. Both bathrooms feature porcelain tiling, bespoke vanity units and subtle lighting. There is an open plan living space, with a kitchen designed by Doca, featuring a Miele multifunction oven, microwave combination oven and induction hob.

The flat is in excellent condition throughout and benefits from a concierge service and secure entry on the fourth floor of this recently developed building on Eddiscombe Road with superb views of central London, there is also air conditioning throughout the flat and a separate elevator access to the basement for bike storage and electric bike charging.

The flat is extremely well located and exclusively facing onto the quiet Eddiscombe Road with the shops, restaurants and cafes of the extremely popular Parsons Green close to hand. There is a Waitrose supermarket and one of London’s most well known pubs, The White Horse a few minutes walk away. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2)

detailedDescription:
A four bedroom family house situated within the popular 'Villes' streets

Location

The 'Villes' are a group of four tree lined streets, just north from Parsons Green and the Fulham Road. Parkville road is ideally located for the many local shops, restaurants and bars nearby. The nearest tube station is Parsons Green which is approximately 0.5 miles away.

Description

This charming property is perfect for family living. The ground floor comprises a double reception room with bay window, and an eat-in kitchen with double doors out onto the south-facing paved garden. This floor also benefits from a WC and wooden floors throughout.

Two double bedrooms are located on the first floor, one with en-suite. There is also a family bathroom with both shower and bath, and a study which is ideal for those working from home.

The principal bedroom is found on the top floor, benefitting from ample built-in storage, eave storage and en-suite. The large skylights flood the room with natural light. The fourth bedroom is also on this floor. The use of this room could be very versatile, either as a bedroom, dressing room or nursery.

Applicant note:
Please note these photos were taken in 2017.

address: Gwendwr Road, West Kensington, London W14
detailedDescription:
A stunning completely refurbished large two double bedroom lower ground floor period maisonette with south facing patio garden located in the heart of West Kensington.

Offering 830 sq. Ft. Of living space, one has a great sense of light and space on entering through your own front door. The accommodation has been thoughtfully laid out. The accommodation consists of an entrance hall, with a bathroom to the left, and large master bedroom on the right. A further shower room next to the second good sized double bedroom with fitted wardrobes. The open plan kitchen/reception room with utility off it, leads through double doors to the south facing private patio. There is ample storage throughout the flat coupled with external storage in the vaults. The apartment is presented in immaculate condition and has underfloor heating, it is being offered chain free and is being offered with a share of freehold interest.

Gwendwr Road is ideally located within a few minute’s walk of Barons Court Underground Station (District & Piccadilly Lines) and West Kensington Underground Station (District Line), with easy access to the M4 and Heathrow. High Street Kensington is a short walk away and close to all the shops bars and restaurants the area has to offer.

detailedDescription:
A stunning, fully extended four bedroom family house arranged over three floors, ideally located on a quiet residential street in the heart of Sands End'.

The ground floor comprises a spacious double reception room with bay window, attractive fireplace, built-in shelves and storage, guest WC, utility room and to the rear, a beautiful open plan kitchen/diner with French doors leading to the private, low maintenance garden.

You will find three generous bedrooms and a stylish shower room on the first floor with a fourth double bedroom and large family bathroom on the second level. All bedrooms have ample fitted wardrobes. This beautifully presented house offers a spacious and functional layout and has plenty of natural light-flow throughout.

Gilstead Road is located within walking distance to Fulham Broadway, Imperial Wharf and Wandsworth Town stations, all providing regular train services in and out of the city. The area offers many great options for dining out and has a fantastic selection of boutique shops. The property is close to various lovely parks including South Park and Eel Brook Common. There are also a number of well-regarded schools nearby making this the ideal family home.

detailedDescription:
This fantastic one bedroom garden flat circa 480 Sq’ – 44 SqM, situated within a handsome Victorian house, is enviably located in the heart of Shepherd’s Bush - moments from both Westfield Shopping Centre and White City House.

The apartment offers a private front garden and entrance. Through the front door you’ll find an entry hallway, generous bay fronted reception room with the original feature fireplace, fitted kitchen, bathroom and double bedroom featuring a wall of built-in wardrobes and double doors leading onto the private 29’ garden. Whilst the existing floorplan is very well arranged, the home offers buyers with their own design aspirations the opportunity to extend (STPP) and reconfigure to their exacting specifications.

The apartment is ideally positioned in a popular central Shepherd’s Bush residential road, minutes on foot to Shepherd’s Bush (Central line) and Shepherd’s Bush Market (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines) stations. The world class shopping, dining and entertainment experiences at Westfield are a five minute stroll from your front door. Popular local cafés, delis and gastro pubs can be found within a short stroll from apartment; the amenities of Notting Hill and green spaces of Holland Park and Kensington Gardens are also nearby.

The home is offered to the market with no onward chain; early viewings are highly recommended.

detailedDescription: A wonderful and excellently presented 5/6 bedroom 2 bathroom Victorian terraced house with very good living/entertaining space on the ground floor and a lovely walled garden. The elegant double reception has 2 limestone fireplaces and interconnecting sliding doors with the rear reception space configured as a library/study. The full width custom built kitchen/breakfast room has French doors and windows overlooking the garden. There is a study/bedroom on the first floor half landing which is ideal as a home office and a guest cloakroom. The principal bedroom spans the width of the first floor and there is also a family bathroom behind. There are 2 double bedrooms with built-in cupboards on the second floor whilst the loft has been extended into to create a further 2 double bedrooms and a shower room - chalet-style, with generous windows providing far reaching views. There is also potential to excavate the basement and create an additional bathroom on top of the first floor half landing subject to the usual planning consents. This well configured family house has a wealth of original features and has a great feel throughout.

detailedDescription:
A very large and beautifully decorated family home this property has a double length reception room open to a 24 ft kitchen diner leading out to the garden through bi-fold doors. An incredible entertaining pad it benefits from kitchen island, dining space and plenty of living room while the garden is laid to stone and benefits from plenty of light.

Upstairs there are 5 bedrooms and three bathrooms. All bedrooms are generous or very large doubles and as well as one en-suite to the master bedroom there are two further communal bathrooms. Full extended the property measured almost 1,900 sq ft including eaves.

With the Sainsburys superstore, Imperial Wharf Station and the riverboat on your doorstep it could not be more convenient. Not only that but all the bars restaurants and shops in both Imperial Wharf and Wandsworth bridge Road are a short walk away as are Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway stations.

detailedDescription:
Immaculate townhouse with patio garden and private parking in an exclusive gated community in Fulham.

Boasting approx 2543 sq/ft and arranged over four floors this well thought out and designed modern town house perfectly benefits from excellent entertaining space and generous bedroom accommodation.

The house has been finished to the highest of specifications. There is a wide hallway on the ground floor with a study and a guest cloakroom that in turn leads to a spacious reception room with bi-folding glass doors that lead down to a south west facing patio garden.

On the lower ground floor is a spacious kitchen, dining and family area, again with glass bi folding doors on to the patio garden. There is a separate utility room on the floor and a private garage. In addition to the garage there is a further allocated underground parking space.

The bedroom accommodation is arranged over the first and second floor. The master suite is located at the rear of the first floor with a dedicated dressing area and an en suite shower room. There is a further generously sized double bedroom with fitted storage at the front of the house.

On the second floor are two further similarly sized double bedrooms, one with an en suite suite bathroom the other with an en suite shower room.

The house benefits from air conditioning throughout and underfloor heating.

Rainsborough square is a secluded development of secure and contemporary townhouses arranged around a spacious landscaped private garden square. There is also 24-hour concierge at this highly sought after development.

Owing to our commitment to keep both our colleagues and clients safe during this period of recommended isolation, we have many self-serve viewing options that may be available to you. These could include video walkthroughs, 360 virtual reality viewings and enhanced comprehensive photography. Call the team to discuss further.

Rainsborough Square is a private gated development located adjacent to Farm Lane, a quiet street close to popular Fulham Broadway. The development is perfectly positioned between Fulham Broadway (District Line), West Brompton (District and Overground lines) and Earls Court (Piccadilly and District lines) and benefits from the vast amenities and restaurants of Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway.

agency_name: Horton and Garton - Hammersmith and Shepherd's Bush
address: Westcroft Square, Ravenscourt Park, Hammersmith, London W6
detailedDescription:
An ideal home for a first time buyer or a buy to let investor, this charming one bedroom top floor period apartment circa 468 Sq’ – 43 SqM is located in desirable Westcroft Square. The home is in excellent condition throughout and comes with the option to purchase a private parking space by separate negotiation.

Greeted by a welcoming entry hall which leads onto all rooms, you’ll find the well-proportioned sunny, South facing reception room and adjacent fitted kitchen with integrated appliances to the front of the apartment. A wall of integrated wardrobes features in the double bedroom, situated to the rear of the apartment, and a bathroom with a wealth of built-in storage completes the home.

Westcroft Square is a handsome, leafy enclave conveniently located just off King Street and Chiswick High Road, opposite St Peter’s Square. The peaceful garden square is much loved and beautifully maintained by locals and, though it is open to the public, gives the impression of a private residents’ square. The shops, restaurants and transport facilities on your doorstep are second to none. Your nearest station is Stamford Brook (District line) but the four tube lines available at Hammersmith Broadway are walking distance or a short bus ride away. A variety of bus routes will wing you from King Street into Hammersmith, Chiswick or nearby Shepherd’s Bush with the amenities offered by Westfield Shopping Centre. The 33 Green Flag Award-winning acres of Ravenscourt Park are moments from your doorstep and the historic pubs, vistas and water sports of the River Thames are a 10 minute stroll from the apartment. Your nearest cup of artisan coffee can be found from Coffeeology, a two minute walk from your front door.

The apartment is available to purchase with no onward chain. Call Horton and Garton, Hammersmith’s leading agency, to arrange your viewing.

detailedDescription:
(Listing Agent - Sai Shanmugam)

An incredible opportunity to own a substantial family home in Brook Green. This charming & very spacious six-bedroom house is well positioned on this beautiful tree lined street, Poplar Grove W6. The house has been fully extended and offers approx. 3217 sq ft of internal space with an attractive 42 ft rear garden. The house stretches over five floors offering a superb ground floor living space with a stylish open plan kitchen and dining area and stunning glass extension leading to the rear garden. There is also a separate reception room with a log burner. The lower ground floor has been beautifully extended, with a ceiling height of approx. 2.9 metres and offers another reception room, double bedroom, shower room, guest cloak room and a private terrace allowing access to the rear garden. On the first floor, the accommodation comprises a delightful master bedroom with built-in cupboards and an ensuite bathroom, with views over the rear garden. There is also a fully equipped laundry/utility room. On the second and third floors, there are four further bedrooms with plenty of built in storage and a family bathroom and a separate ensuite shower room.

Poplar Grove is a quiet tree-lined residential street ideally located in the Brook Green area. There are a range of excellent private and state schools from nursery to secondary level and superb public transport links in Hammersmith Broadway and Shepherds Bush. There are plenty of charming cafes, restaurants and parks within walking distance.

detailedDescription:
This superb 5/6 bedroom end of terrace house boasts a stunning wrap around garden with ample off street parking, situated in a quiet location on a beautiful residential road just moments from the outstanding Ark Conway Primary School. The property has recently been extended and refurbished to a high standard throughout, totalling 1900sq ft across three floors, still leaving the potential to put your own stamp on the property. Suitable for end users and investors alike.

The property boasts a large open plan kitchen and dining area, opening onto a lovely manicured garden and private patio with gated off street parking for three cars at the rear. There is comfortable reception room, separated from two additional spacious rooms on the ground floor, currently used as double bedrooms. This leaves the option open for two/three separate living areas, additional bedroom space and/or office space for those who work from home. In addition is the convenience of a downstairs shower room and WC.
On the first floor, there are three spacious bedrooms and a modern family bathroom, leading up to the second floor where you have an additional double bedroom with skylights flooding the room with natural light, along with the benefit of an en-suite shower room.

The property is well connected by bus and tube links, just a 6-8 minute walk to East Acton tube station (Central Line), also within easy reach of White City Station (Central Line) and Wood Lane Station (Circle and Hammersmith & City Lines). Westfield Shopping Centre is within walking distance, along with the local recreation parks endless and endless nearby amenities such as convenience shops, restaurants and traditional pubs in and around the popular Askew Village. The A40 & A4 are both nearby for motorists who need quick access in and out of London to Heathrow.

detailedDescription:
A split level, three bedroom, two bathroom first floor flat, decorated to a high standard with over 1,090 sq ft of living space.

The first floor open plan reception, dining, and kitchen area features wooden floors, exposed brick walls, double glazed sash windows, and a stunning feature fireplace which compliment the modern styling running throughout this beautifully refurbished flat.

The sleek contemporary kitchen with breakfast bar is fitted with quality integrated appliances and plenty of storage space.
One double bedroom overlooking the rear of the property and a luxurious fully tiled bathroom with chrome fixtures complete the first floor.

On the second floor, each of two spacious double bedrooms offers plenty of space for storage with purpose built, fitted wardrobes and share a bright fully tiled shower room.

Davis Road is located moments from the many independent shops, restaurants, and cafes on the Askew and Uxbridge Roads, and close to the wider range of amenities on the Chiswick High Road and Ealing Broadway.

Local transport links include the many bus services on the Uxbridge Road towards Ealing Broadway and Shepherds Bush also Stamford Brook and Turnham Green stations (District & Piccadilly) are within easy reach.

Car drivers will be pleased to note that the A40/M40 and the A4/M4 are easily accessible from this property and Ravenscourt Park and Wendall Park offer green open spaces just a short walk
away.

detailedDescription:
A beautifully designed Victorian conversion which has been stunningly converted with meticulous attention to detail and styling. This double bedroom property features an incredible open plan living space and is packed with a host of great features.

The flat is decorated in Farrow and Ball paint colours throughout and the bedroom is fitted with a luxurious two-tone carpet and column radiators. The bathrooms have sleek black fittings and white or marble effect tiles for a modern look.

The property boasts a wonderful matt grey kitchen with copper effect handles, quartz worktops and Bosch appliances. It also has instant boiling water taps and Insinkerators (waste disposal unit) Crittal style doors in this apartment lead out from the oak wood floor clad open plan reception area with vaulted ceilings, to a charming Juliet balcony giving an airy effect to the room. The property heating is controlled by a Hive wireless thermostat.

The property is offered with no onward chain. Early viewing is highly recommended.

detailedDescription:
This wonderful mid-terrace family home provides well-proportioned accommodation throughout, ideal for modern family living.

Entered on the raised ground floor into an elegant reception room with stunning period fireplace and ornate cornicing, this charming entertaining space offers views over gardens. A study can also be found on this level. The expansive lower ground floor of this imposing Victorian house has been arranged with family living in mind. A thoughtfully designed kitchen at the front of the property is flooded with light from a bay window and boats its own entrance to street level. There is ample space for formal and informal dining with a further reception area to the rear, with concertina doors opening onto the south-facing garden.

The bedroom accommodation is arranged over the upper three floors and provides a glorious master suite spanning the whole of the first floor, boasting ample closet space in the dressing area and an indulgent en-suite bathroom. Two extremely large double bedrooms and a family bathroom can be found on the next floor and the third floor is home to two further double bedrooms and an additional bathroom.

Special mention must be paid to the sizeable garden to the rear of the house with a splendid decked entertaining area offering a perfect sanctuary for relaxation.

Kempson Road is ideally positioned just on the Chelsea/Fulham border and conveniently located for the shops and restaurants of the fashionable King's Road along with the fantastic transport links of Fulham Road. The nearest underground station is within easy walking distance at Fulham Broadway (District Line) with the green, open space of Eel Brook Common within striking distance.

address: Television Centre, 101 Wood Lane, London W12
detailedDescription:
Fantastic penthouse apartment.

Location

Located in the heart of White City. The former bbc Television Centre sits on Wood lane, next to Westfield West London. With White City Station (approximately 0.1 mile, Central line), Wood Lane (approximately 0.1 mile, Hammersmith & City and Circle lines) and Shepherds Bush (approximately 0.6 miles, Central line and Overground lines) stations on your doorstep. Television Centre is served by excellent Underground, Overground, bus and road routes into the West End, the City and Canary Wharf.

This historic forecourt offers many restaurants, cinema, television studios, health club, spa and Soho House. Ideally located with access to the glorious open space of Hammersmith Park boasting a Japanese Garden, a gated children's play area, bowling green, tennis courts and five-aside football pitches.

Description

A wonderful two bedroom apartment in the iconic Television Centre located within the Helios building.

This apartment boasts a fantastic open plan lay out with great space for entertaining. Well decorated and bright this home is very inviting.

Upon entrance you find the kitchen/dining area featuring an open-plan Italian Dada kitchen, Terrazzo stone worktop with all appliances built in. The reception area is off from the kitchen boasting views across London with floor to ceiling glass windows, and sliding doors that open on to a full length terrace.

The principal bedroom offers bespoke inbuilt storage and an en suite. The second double bedroom sits at the opposite end of the apartment and benefits from built-in storage and has access to the family bathroom. Both bedrooms have the additional advantage of private terraces and floor to ceiling glass walls allowing for plenty of natural light to enter the apartment.

This apartment comes with a secure parking spot in the Television Centre car park.
The Television Centre further offers excellent local amenities and access to the private members gym, swimming pool, screening room and 24hr concierge.

Square Footage: 1218 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 994 years remaining

address: Aylmer Road, Shepherds Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
This is a ground floor maisonette on a very popular road a short walk to Wendell park.

The property consist of separate reception with large bay window allowing a lot of natural light to filter through. Moving towards to back of the property, and parallel to the reception, you pass the master bedroom to the right. Next door to this is the next double room. The modern bathroom is next and as you can see on the photos and in when in person, it is kept immaculacy. The kitchen diner is open plan, with plenty of built in storage spaces throughout.

The kitchen leads onto the beautifully green and private garden. This is west facing so you have the evening sun perfect for the summer.

The property benefits from an extended long lease approx. 150+ years. Which is fantastic as the ground rent is now classed as 'peppercorn'.

Aylmer Road is a quiet residential street located close to the green spaces of Wendell Park, Stamford Brook Common and Ravenscourt Park. Families benefit from a selection of good local schools which include Wendell Park Primary, The Good Shepherd Primary, Southfield Primary and Orchard House School. When it comes to transport, the district line at Stamford Brook station and Turnham Green station are both a short walk away and by car, the A40 is a short drive away, providing easy access in and out of Central London. Chiswick High Road and Westfield are both close by for shopping and restaurants.

detailedDescription:
A beautiful mid-terrace house that forms part of this high-end gated development set just off Sulivan Road. Finished to a good standard and with the benefit of secure off-street parking, this modern townhouse is a perfect family home.

Set over four floors the house offers excellent family accommodation with an open plan kitchen/dining room, utility, guest WC, and home office on the ground floor. Doors open out onto the patio garden from the rear of the house and to the front is the designated off-street parking.

Upstairs, the first floor has a charming and bright reception room with a feature fireplace and a balcony, a guest WC, and a double bedroom. The second floor has the principal bedroom with a large en suite and dressing area, and a further double bedroom with an en suite shower room. On the third floor, there are two further double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a family bathroom.

(Disclaimer: Photographs taken in 2019).

Owing to our commitment to keep both our colleagues and clients safe during this period of recommended isolation, we have many self-serve viewing options that may be available to you. These could include video walkthroughs, 360 virtual reality viewings and enhanced comprehensive photography. Call the team to discuss further.

Heathcote Gate is a private gated development set off Sulivan Road. Sitting between two parks - South Park and Hurlingham Park - and between Peterborough Road and Broomhouse Lane. The shops, restaurants and coffee houses of Parsons Green are a short distance away. The closest Underground station is Parsons Green (District Line).

A wonderful three bedroom flat with views over Shepherds Bush Green

Location

Shepherd's Bush is a popular and vibrant area bordering Holland Park, North Ken, Notting Hill, Hammersmith, Chiswick and Acton (Crossrail).
Excellent nearby transport links include Shepherd's Bush Market, 0.6 miles (Circle line and Hammersmith & City), Shepherds Bush Station, 0.2 miles (Central line, Overground and National Rail), White City (Central Line) Wood Lane (H &C) both within 0.6m (Circle line and Hammersmith & City). A wonderful three bedroom flat with views over Shepherds Bush Green, offering a bright rooms with wood flooring and shared terrace, ideal for entertaining.

The living room is well designed with oak flooring, bright sash windows and views of the park.

The generous principle bedroom offers fitted bespoke wardrobes double glazed windows and en suite bathroom with bath and shower facilities.

Two further bedrooms are found across the hall from the principle bedroom with one currently being used as a study and the other a good sized double benefitting from fitted wardrobes. The family bathroom is found adjacent.

This stylish modern flat sits in the heart of shepherds bush and is close to all local amenities.

detailedDescription: A truly wonderful 5/6 bedroom Victorian house with very good living/entertaining space on the ground floor which opens onto a south westerly garden with an open aspect. The elegant double reception has a wood floor, marble fireplace with a library area to the rear which opens into the full width kitchen/breakfast room. The well-appointed custom-built kitchen includes a breakfast bar and has an ample room for a dining table and opens onto the walled landscaped garden. There are 5/6 bedrooms on the upper floors including the principal bedroom suite which includes dressing area; 3 bathrooms; a guest cloakroom and utility room. There is also a very good cellar which provides excellent storage and which could be excavated subject to the usual consents. There is rear access from the garden in addition to a bike storage area to the front. This very well presented house combines elegance with contemporary style, is flooded with light and can be moved into without further expense.

detailedDescription:
An outstanding extended Victorian family home, located in unquestionably one of the very best areas of Parsons Green.

Arranged over four floors, this large period property extending to 2,400 sq ft (223 sq m), offering superb reception and entertaining space in the heart of Parsons Green. The basement level (with high ceilings) comprises of a family/media room, which can also lend itself to a good sized bedroom with an en-suite shower room. There is also a useful store room. The ground floor offers excellent entertaining space with a double reception room, separate W.C. And extended kitchen breakfast room with bi-folding doors that open onto a private garden. The first floor has an elegant master bedroom with excellent storage space and large en-suite bathroom with a separate shower. To the rear of the first floor is an additional bedroom and separate utility room. On the second floor there are three further bedrooms, all with ample built in storage, and an additional shower room.

Located in an extremely desirable street only a stone’s throw from the gorgeous open spaces of Parsons Green and Eel Brook Common, Elthiron Road is well located in the heart of Parsons Green (Fulham’s most desirable area). Property of this type and in this specific location rarely comes available and, in our opinion would make a solid investment for the future. There are plenty of shops, independent cafe´s and restaurants all within a very short walk (including a Waitrose supermarket on ‘the Green’ itself), and several popular and sought after schools are within walking distance. Elthiron Road is under 500 metres from Parsons Green underground station (District Line, Zone 2), and also just 800 metres away and Fulham Broadway underground station (District Line, Zone 2) and the shops, cinema, gyms (David Lloyd) and bars, including a Whole Foods market.

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented house finished to the highest standard located off the Fulham Road

Location

Chesilton Road is one of the prettiest roads running north off the Fulham Road with its many popular shops, cafes and restaurants.
The property is approximately 0.4 miles from Parsons Green underground station and the 14 and 414 bus routes run along the Fulham Road to the West End.
The area is known for its excellent choice of nursery, primary and secondary schools.

Description

This property has been beautifully designed by the current owners to provide spacious and bright rooms throughout. The ground floor is semi-open plan with an elegant double reception room leading to a superb kitchen/dining room at the rear. The reception room has a pretty bay window, attractive fireplace and wood flooring. The modern kitchen has excellent storage, plenty of space for dining and interesting design features such as a colorful built-in fish tank and a circular window looking out to the garden. Bi-fold doors open to the paved garden, ideal for al fresco dining.
The lower ground floor has an impressive family/media room with high ceilings and a separate study area, ideal for home schooling or working from home. There is also a shower room and a separate utility room on this floor.
On the first and second floor are four bedrooms, a shower room and a family bathroom. There is also a study which could be used as a further bedroom.
The principal suite is on the top floor and is wonderfully light, has excellent storage and a contemporary en suite shower room with glass doors that open to give views across Fulham.
The property further benefits from under floor heating on the ground and lower ground floor.

Square Footage: 3267 sq ft

detailedDescription:
A stylish and bright one bedroom flat located on the top floor of an attractive Victorian terrace house located on one of Parsons Green’s most sought after roads.

The layout maximises the available living space and light, whilst being practical and offering excellent storage space throughout. There’s a good sized reception room which is partially open to a modern kitchen, and a large double bedroom located to the rear of the property. In the centre of the flat there is an atrium which floods the property with natural light, and additional landing which could be used as a study area or additional storage space.

Rostrevor Road is positioned within a small group of residential streets that run north off the Fulham Road. The advantage of this area is its close proximity to all the local amenities and restaurants on Fulham Road its self, as well as nearby Parsons Green. Along with the roads to the south and those running off Parsons Green itself it’s without question one of the most sought after areas in Fulham. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (district line, Zone 2) which is only 600 meters away. You can also catch regular buses from the Fulham Road towards Fulham Broadway (where there is a new Whole Foods store), Chelsea and central London.

detailedDescription:
Two bedroom apartment located in popular gated mansion block

Location

Drive Mansions is a traditional Victorian block on the Fulham Road boasting many original features. The block is located 0.4 miles away from Putney Bridge underground station that is situated on the District Line, and 0.6 miles to Parsons Green underground station. Please note this distances are approximates.

The largest park in the area, Bishops Park, is 0.3 miles away and boasts an urban beach, café and walking routes along the Thames River.

Local shops, restaurants and cafes are located on Fulham Road, New Kings Road and Fulham Palace Road.

Description

This is a great, light ground floor flat set within a secure, gated mansion block. It has been neutrally decorated throughout, providing a blank canvas for the new owner.

The reception room with bay window is located at the front of the property. The first double bedroom is behind with built in storage, followed by main bathroom, kitchen and second double bedroom to the rear. All flats within the block have access to the south-facing communal garden, which is maintained by the caretaker.

Square Footage: 730 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 978 years remaining

detailedDescription:
At 1,883 sq ft, this property is much larger than the normal Woolneigh Street house, this end of terrace house gives a country living feel, with its original wooden flooring and doors throughout. The kitchen has plenty of work top space leading to the conservatory and patio garden, while two bedrooms benefit from en-suite bathrooms, with a further communal bathroom servicing the rest of the house.

Space is key throughout the house which also benefits from being just off the Wandsworth Bridge Road with its many shops, bars and restaurants. Fulham Broadway, Parsons Green and Imperial Wharf are all within a short walk.

detailedDescription:
An opulent two bedroom, top floor apartment in the recently built Queen's Wharf riverside development on the 'Surrey Bend' of the River Thames adjacent to the Grade II listed Hammersmith Bridge. The accommodation provides 888 sq. Ft. Of internal living space, two double bedrooms with built in wardrobes the master of which benefiting from an en-suite bathroom, further shower room and a 26 ft. Open plan kitchen/reception room with utility cupboard and access to the river facing private balcony.

Reflecting the authenticity of the architectural heritage, these quintessentially British homes have been designed to showcase the best of London's unspoilt and stunning riverscape. The amenities include a 24-hour dedicated concierge, a rooftop terrace with sweeping views for residents use only, and an on-site restaurant, bar and café. Queen’s Wharf will also house the world-famous Riverside Studios which will be rebuilt to create a re-imagined Thames-side landmark for independent theatre, cinema and digital media.

The excellent transport facilities provide swift and speedy access in to and out of London; Heathrow Airport within 30 minutes, South Kensington in 8 minutes and Knightsbridge in 11 minutes via four London Underground lines - Hammersmith & City, Circle, District and Piccadilly. The A4/M4 is also close by for the motorist. EPC rating B.
