title: 4 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
The open plan ground floor is accentuated by a stylish bespoke kitchen and full sliding doors which open out onto a private garden terrace which has its own water feature.

The terrace can also be accessed from the bedroom tucked away on the same floor, next to a W.C. Upstairs is the principal bedroom with a spacious en suite bathroom, accompanied by 2 further bedrooms and a large family bathroom.

All bathrooms are fitted with Porcelanosa fittings. The bedrooms have extensive storage spaces with a modern design (primarily from Sliderobes) to extend the lengths of the rooms.<br/><br/>location<br/><br/>The house is situated on Cortayne Road, a calm, friendly and popular residential location just off the New King's Road. There are a variety of shops, bars and restaurants surrounding the area along the New Kings Road and Parsons Green Lane, and Fulham Road is 5 minutes away with access to further restaurants, bars, bakeries, a fantastic local butcher, bus routes and other amenities. Waitrose Supermarket is about a five minute walk away, while a new Co-Op Supermarket is just literally 2 mins across the road. Parson Green Underground Station (District Line) is only a seven minute walk away and there is a bus stop within a 2 minute walk with bus routes into Central London.

Hurlingham Park (3 minute walk), Parsons Green (5 minute walk) and Bishops Park (10 minute walk) are all close by as is access to the Thames Pathway (10 minute walk) leading to a lovely Thames River Walk so there are plenty of open leafy spaces for exercise, walks or dog walking. There are also multiple access routes to the A4, putting Heathrow a mere 35-45 minutes away by car. All this makes the house location highly desirable. This house was built approximately 10 years ago and has had only one professional single owner, so is in extremely good condition.

detailedDescription:

detailedDescription:
Summary
This is a fantastic split level, three bedroom maisonette in the heart of Fulham, moments from the Kings Road.

Description
Entered on the second floor of the well maintained building, the property is in an excellent condition and boasts lots of natural light throughout. There is a generous eat in kitchen with neutral tiling, plenty of storage and inbuilt appliances. Opposite is a smart w/c. There is solid wooden flooring from the hallway leading through to the impressive reception room, which has further space for dining, as well as having access onto a well sized private balcony, with room enough for table and chairs. Upstairs are three double bedrooms, with the largest two having lots of inbuilt storage. There is also a small loft space above.
Upstairs there is a beautiful family bathroom, with modern tiling and a large bathtub with overhead shower.
The property is in a fantastic location, on the periphery of both the Kings Road and the New Kings Road and is on the doorstep of all the incredible amenities the location has to offer. It is a short walk (0.3 miles) from Fulham Broadway Station (District Line). The maisonette benefits from the right to a Residents Parking Permit, alongside a delightful communal garden.

detailedDescription:
Purplebricks West London are pleased to present to the market this charming period conversion, one bedroom apartment.

Set on the first floor of an impressive Victorian house, The deceivingly spacious apartment benefits from a large reception/dining room with dual aspect double glass doors leading onto a private south facing balcony, separate fitted kitchen with double glass doors, A sizeable double bedroom with ample storage and large three-piece suite bathroom with feature mirrored wall and natural stone tiling.

The property boasts high ceilings throughout and retains many of the original features including a stunning marble fireplace, solid wood floors throughout, original sash window and three double glass doors.

Ideally situated within close proximity to Kensington Underground station running the District and Piccadilly line services – with short journey times to both central London and Heathrow airport with Easy access for the A4 -in and out of London. detailedDescription:
A two bedroom, upper floor split level flat on Snowbury Road with a shared garden.

The property offers 675 sq ft (63 sq m) of living space, set over two floors. Comprising a separate kitchen, reception room, two bedrooms and a bathroom. There is access to the shared garden via a spiral staircase from the kitchen. The flat is in good condition throughout and offers potential to purchase the loft space from the freeholder (lbhf) to extend the flat (subject to planning and relevant consents).

Located in the ‘Bury Triangle’ area of Sands End, the property is not far from the extremely popular Sands Ends gastro pub and the restaurants and cafes on the Wandsworth Bridge Road and Parsons Green. The property is also within easy walking distance of South Park, one of Fulham’s largest green spaces which also has a new children’s play area and local schools including l’Ecole des Petits and LEcole Marie d’Orliac on its doorstep. The closest underground station is Parsons Green or Fulham Broadway (both District Line, Zone 2) where you can find a Whole Foods supermarket and a plethora of shops and restaurants. There is also the Imperial Wharf over ground station, where you can take frequent trains North to West Brompton tube station (District Line, Zone 2), and South to Clapham Junction main line station (both one stop) where you can get regular trains to Waterloo and Gatwick Airport.

detailedDescription:
A luxury Victorian house comprising five double bedrooms a family bathroom, four shower rooms (en-suite), modern high spec kitchen, large reception room and west facing garden.

The ground floor has been opened up from front to back to create a full width spacious double reception which opens into the bespoke kitchen/dining room. The kitchen is well equipped with Siemens integrated appliances, granite worktops and has underfloor heating controlled by iPad or iPhone. The lighting throughout the property uses the three zone Philips hue lighting system.

On the lower ground floor to the rear is a high-ceilinged media/family room which has three zone sonos audio system with ceiling speakers as well as Apple TV, BluRay and mood lighting. There is a playroom/family room to the front, a shower room and separate utility room. On the first floor half landing is a double bedroom with en-suite shower room. The first floor is dedicated to the principal bedroom suite of full width double bedroom to the front, dressing room and spacious bathroom to the rear. The second floor half landing comprises a further double bedroom with en-suite shower room. The loft space has been extended into to create a 4th double bedroom with en-suite shower room. There are ample built in cupboards throughout the house. There is under floor heating in the kitchen/dining room and in all bathrooms. The property also benefits from CCTV to the rear and front of the house with direct connection to mobile device. There is high specification air conditioning in all bedrooms and Cat 6 cabling. In addition, sprinkler systems have been installed for fire safety.

Wolverton Gardens is situated within the Brook Green Conservation area in the heart of Hammersmith moments from a wealth of amenities and Hammersmith Station. The green open spaces of Brook Green are close by.

A superb well appointed four bedroom 2.5 bathroom house in one of the highly sought-after roads in the Crabtree Conservation area. This will make the perfect family home ready to move into as it is, with oodles of potential to extend - whilst retaining a much longer than usual garden.

Being less than 100 yards from the river Thames, close pubs, bars and restaurants and a short walk to both Hammersmith and Barons Court Tube stations, the property is superbly located for central London as well as Heathrow airport.

The property will be available for viewings until March 18th. Book your viewing today to avoid missing out.

Occupying the south facing side of a stunning metal and glass new-development, this fabulous top-floor apartment offers river views that are second to none. At over 2,000 square feet the property is entirely lateral and benefits from total privacy.

The interior is comprised of: Three large bedrooms, including a master with en-suite bathroom and dressing room; two further en-suite bathrooms; a guest cloakroom; a superb, modern kitchen and a generous reception room looking out over the river toward the former Harrods Depositary. The attention to detail within the property is exceptional, with integrated Miele appliances in the kitchen alongside marble worktops, marble tiling throughout the entrance hall, a hardwood floor in the living room and further marble panelling adorning the bathrooms. Technical features include a speaker system, underfloor heating, air-conditioning and adjustable light systems.

The development itself, Fulham Reach, includes features such as a gym, swimming pool and spa, as well as shops, restaurants and riverside pubs.

Offered on a very long lease.

Description
At just shy of 700 square foot, this is a spacious, bright and immaculate condition property.
The apartment is located on the third floor, accessed via a lift and is at the end of the building allowing floods of natural light throughout the property. There is solid wooden flooring, with the exception of pretty tiling in the well-equipped, modern kitchen, which comes with plenty of storage space and inbuilt appliances.
It boasts two generous double bedrooms with built in storage in the larger room and a very impressive reception room, with space for relaxation and dining, with a balcony leading off it.
There is a neutral suite in the family bathroom with a bathtub and overhead shower.
The property is 0.5 miles from Parsons Green Station (District Line), which is at the end of the road, with lots of local amenities. The property is also very close to the Thames River and many connecting buses links.

detailedDescription:
Situated on a secluded mews, tucked behind a vibrant stretch of the Fulham Road, this remarkable three-bedroom maisonette, with private roof terrace, has been recently completed to a dramatic design by JaK Studio. The architects dubbed the project 'Lightyard House' owing to the large panels of glazing which open onto a tranquil, internal courtyard, flooding the space with light. In a dynamic response to the site, 1,900 sq ft of internal space is arranged over three versatile levels.

A contemporary, Petersen-brick frontage presents a discreet and minimal facade which, via a recessed entrance porch, opens to an unexpectedly large interior space. Ahead is a soaring six-metre, double-height corridor beneath a glazed roof, with stairs leading down to the sleeping accommodation.

To the left, and slightly raised, is an incredibly bright open-plan living room and dining area with glazing to the courtyard void. The kitchen, custom made by the architects, is at the rear of the space, its walls also glazed to overlook the atrium below. Worktops of black Corian are set beautifully against a feature wall of Pastellone plaster.

Engineered-oak flooring extends across the level and is continued on a set of paddle steps that ascend to a sun room and the large, decked roof terrace, which offers views along rows of neighbouring gardens.

The three bedrooms, all en-suite, are arranged across the lower level, around an internal courtyard. The curtain-wall glazing, by Schuco, slides open to connect the double-height corridor with the master suite and third bedroom/family room, allowing light and air to move freely between the spaces.

The master bedroom is situated at the far end of the corridor and draws light from the courtyard through a glazed door. Behind a central storage-wall, the room becomes an expansive open-plan dressing area and bathroom with a separate shower.

Also on the lower level is a utility room with sink, worktops and plenty of storage, and a separate guest WC. Zoned underfloor heating extends throughout.

Rostrevor Mews runs parallel to Fulham Road and is a short walk from the many shops, bars, restaurants and cafes of Fulham and Parsons Green. In the immediate vicinity there are several good eateries, pubs and cafes and an array of independent shops.

There are a number of green open spaces nearby with Bishops Park to the south and Fulham Palace Gardens to the north. Also within walking distance is the excellent River Café.

The nearest stations are Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway (District Line), and many bus routes to central London run nearby.

Tenure: Leasehold
Lease Length: Approx. 999 years
title: 3 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
A truly outstanding newly built three bedroom maisonette located in a quiet mews in Parsons Green.

On the raised ground floor this unique property offers: A superb open plan kitchen/living room with bespoke spray-finished joinery, a large island with Corian top, a feature wall hand-finished in Venetian plaster, Havwoods oak flooring and floor to ceiling windows to the front and overlooking a double-height atrium. The lower ground floor is constructed around the courtyard garden with: A large master suite comprising en-suite bathroom with separate shower and dressing area with extensive fitted wardrobes, two further double bedrooms both with en suite shower rooms, a separate WC and a really useful utility room. The top floor comprises a sun room with access to 14ftx11ft terrace.
Located between Rostrevor Road and Chesilton Road in one of Fulham's most desirable areas, running off Fulham Road and conveniently situated for the plethora of independent cafes, restaurants, shops and amenities to be found on Fulham Road and more at Parsons Green, including a handy Waitrose Supermarket. The nearest tube is Parsons Green underground station, (District Line, Zone 2) only a short walk away, you can also catch regular buses towards Fulham Broadway and central London from Fulham Road.

detailedDescription:
A visual stunning highly designed two bedroom apartment.

Location

Hammersmith Grove is a prestigious tree lined residential avenue in the heart of West London with in a close distance to Ravenscourt park approximately 0.6 miles.
Hammersmith is a major transport hub with further connections from Shepherds Bush tube and over ground station links. The location offers excellent transport links into the city and is near to Hammersmith Broadway station, approximately 0.5 miles (Piccadilly, District, Circle, Hammersmith and City Lines) and Goldhawk Road approximately 0.3 miles (Circle and Hammersmith and City Lines).
Hammersmith Grove is also excellently positioned for the A4 offering convenient access to Heathrow airport and beyond.
There are a number of excellent maintained and independent schools for all ages within walking distance, including the highly-esteemed Godolphin and Latymer, St Paul's and Latymer Upper School as well as numerous shops, services and restaurants in King Street.

Description

A brand new refurbished, visual stunning, architecturally lead two bedroom duplex penthouse with city wide views found in the much sought after Brackenbury Village with 3 outdoor spaces plus Juliette balcony. The traditional 1890's exterior presents an elegant juxtaposition with a timeless contemporary interior. On the first floor landing is the first of 2 large balconies. The principal bedroom is found on the first floor with an indulgent walk-in wardrobe in black American Walnut, leading to the ensuite bathroom with luxurious shower cabin and free standing resin bath. In addition, this beautiful bedroom suite benefits from large sliding doors which open on to a Juliette balcony. The second bedroom has a built in black American walnut wardrobe and access to the adjacent sumptuous shower room.

On the duplex top floor is the light filled open plan kitchen/living room with sleek minimalist but warm design complete with a bespoke black American walnut and honed Nero Marquina marble cocktail/TV cabinet stretching across the entire width of the living room with a built in state of the art 1.2m Ecosmart fire place. Huge sliding doors open onto a large dorma balcony. The exquisite attention to detail is evident throughout including bespoke "handleless" black American walnut doors with concealed Soss hinges. Stairs lead to an artificial grass clad roof terrace (unofficial).

Square Footage: 1130 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 125 years remaining

detailedDescription:
This two bedroom garden flat with extensive built-in storage and good sized private south west facing patio garden. With it’s own front door, the entrance benefits from a cellar storage room (plumbed for utilities) and private built-in bike storage in front garden.

To the front is a spacious living room/dining room area. The separate kitchen features granite worktop and integrated appliances. To the rear is a sizeable bathroom with bath, overhead shower and underfloor heating, and the second double bedroom with views of the garden. The master bedroom features extensive storage and en suite shower room, also with under floor heating, as well as access to the garden. The property is double glazed throughout and the entire building was recently upgraded by the freeholder.

Harwood Road runs between New Kings Road and Fulham Road in the very centre of Fulham Broadway. The underground services at Fulham Broadway, Eel Brook Common and numerous shops and restaurants are within very easy reach.

detailedDescription:
A large two bedroom garden flat, located on the Moore Park Estate in the heart of Fulham.

Location

The property is located on the popular 'Moore Park Estate' on the Fulham/Chelsea border, an area that is particularly popular due to the convenient proximity of Fulham Broadway, Parsons Green and the world famous Kings Road Chelsea.
Fulham Broadway underground station is approximately 0.3 miles from the property and there are bus links along Harwood Road, New Kings Road and Fulham Road which connect Fulham with the West End.
Fulham Broadway has a thriving shopping center with an abundance of amenities including supermarkets, restaurants and a Vue cinema.
There are a number of good schools in the area including Kensington Prep, Thomas's, Marie d'Orliac and Lady Margaret's.

Description

This wonderful property features a generous reception room with bay window and feature fireplace, a principle bedroom with generous en suite bathroom, second double bedroom a modern family bathroom and a large kitchen diner. One of the properties greatest selling points is the wide garden, accessed from the kitchen and principle bedrooms via sliding doors.

The property is also sold with a private garage, a huge benefit

detailedDescription:
*property market remains open for viewings & valuations in person or by virtual appointment*

Light and spacious three bedroom split level maisonette with own entrance and private terrace, enviably located in a superb position facing Beaumont Crescent, just moments' from West Kensington station for the District Line and 5 minutes walk to Barons Court station for the Piccadilly Line. The property has been well maintained by the current owner, offering bright, well planned accommodation arranged over the ground and first floors, with modern interiors throughout. Features include a large reception room with access onto terrace, separate well equipped kitchen, upstairs bathroom and ground floor WC, gas central heating, double glazing and ample inbuilt storage.

Accommodation comprises entrance hallway with access to downstairs WC and stairs rising to the first floor, leading into the bright and spacious full width reception/dining room with doors leading out onto the private terrace. The separate kitchen comprises a range of matching wall and base units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit and further space for appliances. To the first floor, there are three well proportioned bedrooms - two doubles and a further very generous single, with inbuilt wardrobes to the master - plus a family bathroom with modern white three piece suite.

Superbly located in the heart of Kensington, the property is just moments' from West Kensington underground station and numerous regular bus routes, all providing unrivalled cross-London links. The area offers a bustling array of fashionable shops, bars, restaurants and amenities in this very exclusive central location.

To book a viewing instantly just visit our website or download our award-winning App.

Lease Information

We understand the lease on the property is 125 years from 31 March 1982 - 87 years remaining. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries and verify this information with a solicitor.

Service Charges

To be confirmed. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries and verify this information with a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

detailedDescription:
A rarely available three double bedroom lateral flat in the ever-popular block, Napier Court.

The flat is in the highly sought-after location of the block with views toward the Hurlingham Club from the kitchen and main bedroom, and over the beautifully maintained communal gardens from the reception room and private balcony. The flat has three large double bedrooms with the advantage of built in storage, one is currently used by the current vendor as a separate dining room. There is a good sized family bathroom and a further shower room. The flat has a separate kitchen with ample storage and a bright spacious reception room which leads on to a balcony with plenty of space for a table and two chairs. Benefitting from a porter, a lift and an allocated garage space, this flat is will be sold chain free.

Napier Court is a very desirable purpose built block located within immediate proximity to the River Thames, Hurlingham Club and Putney Bridge tube station. There is an array of local shops and amenities nearby and the property is very well linked to Central and South London by both bus services and the district line tube.

detailedDescription: You enter the front door and expect the unexpected! This is a truly fabulous, stylish and highly individual 4 bedroom Victorian terraced house with excellent living/entertaining space on the ground floor and a walled garden. The ground floor has been opened up from front to back to create a reception area to the front with smoked Dutch Oak floor, a custom built kitchen with quartz worktops in the middle and a dining room with polished concrete floor and with a full width wall to ceiling glass door to the garden. There is also a guest cloakroom on this floor. The first floor is dedicated to the principal bedroom suite which again is opened from front to back. There are 2 further double bedrooms on the second floor and a family bathroom and the top floor is also opened from front to back to create a 4th double bedroom/home office/additional reception with far reaching views. address: Parkside, White City Living, London W12
detailedDescription:
A studio apartment that would make an ideal pied-à-terre. With quick connections to Central London and easy access to the motorway network, plus the on site facilities, the apartment is ideal for anyone splitting their time between the city and the countryside.

Apartment:

The 7th floor apartment measures 463sqft (43sqm) internally and has a west facing balcony overlooking White City Living's Central Gardens which have been meticulously designed to celebrate every passing season.

The interiors have been designed by Johnson Naylor whilst the kitchens have integrated Miele appliances and composite stone worktops. There is comfort cooling to all habitable rooms and underfloor heating throughout.

The Parkside apartments will complete Q1/Q2 2023.

Amenities:

Residents’ facilities include 24-hour Concierge, swimming pool with sun terrace, Residents’ Club Lounge, therapeutic hydro-pool, dining room and private kitchen, fully equipped gym with rooms for personal training and classes, treatment and massage rooms, café, two 12-seat private cinemas with food and drink facilities, business lounge and meeting rooms, entertainment suite and secure parking (by separate negotiation).

Residents of this latest phase of White City Living will enjoy a touch free journey to their apartment. The lobby doors will automatically open as you arrive and the intelligent lift takes you to your floor. You can also arrange deliveries and issue virtual keys to friends and family via your smartphone. Communal areas, including the car parks are covered by CCTV.

Surroundings:

On completion White City living will be a community of 2,300 homes within 8 acres of parks and gardens, surrounded by world-class retail, entertainment and educational institutions including Westfield Shopping Centre (Europe's largest mall) and Imperial College’s new 23 acre campus campus is nearby.

The Water Gardens consists of 526 apartments in three buildings at the heart of this new neighbourhood. They are a unique opportunity to live beside the oriental water gardens, which flow through a landscape of hand-selected trees and plants, under elegant bridges, over cascades and waterfalls.

Transport:

Two Underground stations are on the edge of the development: White City (Central Line) and Wood Lane (Circle Line and Hammersmith & City Line). Bond Street is 12 minutes away and Paddington Station is 8 minutes away with its connections to Heathrow and the forthcoming Elizabeth Line (Crossrail).

The M40 and M4 both provide convenient access out of London.

Images are computer generated and floorplans are indicative only.

detailedDescription:
Being Sold by Online Auction

Starting Bids from £525,000

Buy it now option available

Please call or visit Purplebricks Online Auctions for more information.

This property is for sale by Modern Method of Auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will have 56 working days to exchange and complete once the draft contract has been issued by the vendors solicitor. Allowing the additional time to exchange and complete on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer with be required to put down a non-refundable reservation fee. The fee will be a fixed fee including the Vat, this secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to agree to our terms and conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found on the online Auction website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is typically no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by goto Auctions.

To book a viewing visit Purplebricks

Property Description

A charming garden flat arranged over the ground floor of this handsome period building. Private entrance to two bedrooms & a family bathroom and a large reception room with dining area, feature fireplace with wood burner and doors to the rear garden. There is a separate, modern kitchen and a summer house/home office in the rear garden.

Devonport Road is a popular tree-lined residential street which is a no through road. It runs between Goldhawk Road and the Uxbridge Road, the property being a short walk away from Goldhawk Road and Shepherd’s Bush Underground Stations (Hammersmith & City, Circle and Central Line), also the Overground station at Shepherd’s Bush and numerous local and central bus routes. A wide variety of shopping and leisure facilities are within easy reach, both at the West London Westfield Complex and the extended area around Shepherd’s Bush Green, and including the popular Shepherd’s Bush Empire

*To book a viewing on this great property 24 hours a day, 7 days a week please visit the Purplebricks website for viewing availability and to confirm your date and appointment time. Alternatively you can download our award winning App*

General Information

Auctioneer's Comments

This property is offered for sale by Online Auction which is a flexible and buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will not be exchanging contracts on the fall of the virtual hammer, but will be given 56 working days in which to complete the transaction, from the date the Draft Contract is issued by the vendor’s solicitor.

By giving a buyer time to exchange contracts on the property, normal residential finance can be arranged. The Buyer’s Premium secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Fees paid to the Auctioneer may be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property and be included in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Further clarification on this must be sought from your legal representative.

The buyer will be required to give the Auctioneers authority to sign the Reservation Form on their behalf and to confirm acceptance of the Terms and Conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation Form and all Terms and Conditions can be found in the Information Pack which can be downloaded from our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Upon close of a successful auction, or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to make payment of a non-refundable Buyer’s Premium of £7,800 including VAT, plus an administration charge of £354 including VAT, a total of £8,154. This secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Any additional fees and charges over and above this will be confirmed within the terms and conditions available on the auction website.

The Buyer’s Premium and administration charge are in addition to the final negotiated selling price.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

detailedDescription:
A bright and extremely spacious three double bedroom, Victorian maisonette benefiting from having its own private entrance.

This spacious split level maisonette has three double bedrooms and is arranged over two floors, offering almost 1,300 sq ft (119 sq m) of living space, including its own entrance on the ground floor. On the first floor there is a large reception room with ample space for a dining table, a separate kitchen, two good sized double bedrooms and a family bathroom. On the top floor is the master bedroom with built in storage and en-suite bathroom. There is further potential to add a South facing roof terrace or ‘Pod’ extension, subject to a usual permissions.

Wardo Avenue is one of the most in-demand roads in ‘Munster Village’ made up of predominately large freehold houses and maisonettes, which are surprisingly very popular with professional couples and young families alike. It is also convenient for the shops, restaurants and amenities of Fulham Road as well as several independent cafe´s and boutique shops on Munster Road. The closest underground station is Parsons Green (District Line, Zone 2) which is a short walk away and you can catch regular buses from Fulham Palace Road north to the transport hub of Hammersmith (Piccadilly, District and Hammersmith & City Lines). Buses also run towards Chelsea and central London from the Fulham Road and the Thames riverside walk and Bishops park (popular with families) is a real bonus being only a short walk away

title: 2 bed flat for sale

address: Cassini Tower, White City Living, London W12
detailedDescription:
Apartment:

At 1,523sqft (141.5sqm) and with three bedroom suites this 33rd floor apartment has an enviable position in this new landmark with commanding views. The principal bedroom has an en suite with separate bath and shower, a dressing area and doors onto the terrace that sweeps around the whole apartment.

The interiors have been designed by Johnson Naylor whilst the kitchens have integrated Miele appliances and composite stone worktops. There is comfort cooling to all habitable rooms and underfloor heating throughout.

Underground parking is available for an additional £55,000.

Cassini Tower will complete from late 2023 to early 2024.

Amenities:

Residents’ facilities include 24-hour Concierge, swimming pool with sun terrace, Residents’ Club Lounge, therapeutic hydro-pool, dining room and private kitchen, fully equipped gym with rooms for personal training and classes, treatment and massage rooms, café, two 12-seat private cinemas with food and drink facilities, business lounge and meeting rooms, entertainment suite and secure parking (by separate negotiation).

Residents of this latest phase of White City Living will enjoy a touch free journey to their apartment. The lobby doors will automatically open as you arrive and the intelligent lift takes you to your floor. You can also arrange deliveries and issue virtual keys to friends and family via your smartphone. Communal areas, including the car parks are covered by CCTV.

Surroundings:

On completion White City living will be a community of 2,300 homes within 8 acres of parks and gardens, surrounded by world-class retail, entertainment and educational institutions including Westfield Shopping Centre (Europe's largest mall) and Imperial College’s new 23 acre campus campus is nearby.

The Water Gardens consists of 526 apartments in three buildings at the heart of this new neighbourhood.

Transport:

Two Underground stations are on the edge of the development: White City (Central Line) and Wood Lane (Circle Line and Hammersmith & City Line). Bond Street is 12 minutes away and Paddington Station is 8 minutes away with its connections to Heathrow and the forthcoming Elizabeth Line (Crossrail).

The M40 and M4 both provide convenient access out of London.

Images are computer generated and floorplans are indicative only.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This truly wonderful six-bedroom family home, located on one of Brook Green's premier streets, is presented to the market in lovely condition and offers a fine balance between functional entertaining space and comfortable bedroom accommodation.

The double reception on the ground floor benefits from an abundance of natural light, high ceilings and many original features which have been impeccably maintained. To the rear of the property the modern eat-in kitchen can be found with integrated appliances and bi-fold doors leading to the south-facing garden. A further reception/family room is located on the lower ground floor.

The upper floors play host to the master suite with dressing area, five further bedrooms and four additional bathrooms, three of which are en suite. At the top of the house there is a large roof terrace with beautiful views over the London skyline and the property further benefits from having a private garage which can be accessed from Wolverton Gardens.

Bute Gardens is a highly sought-after street situated within easy reach of the excellent shops, bars and restaurants of Brook Green and nearby Hammersmith. Furthermore, there are some highly reputed schools in the area including St Pauls for Girls which is situated just around the corner. Hammersmith Station (Piccadilly, District and Hammersmith & City Lines) provides the nearest London Underground links while Kensington Olympia Station offers London Overground, London Underground and National Rail services.

address: St. Elmo Road, Shepherds Bush W12
detailedDescription:
LiteBridge Residential is pleased to present this charming and glorious terraced house in the heart of Shepherd's Bush on St Elmo Road.

The property provides spacious accommodation over two floors by offering in excess of 1,226 sq. Ft. The house retains many original features and is exceptionally well located for ease of access to the numerous transport links and shopping/leisure opportunities Shepherd's Bush offers. The house boasts 4 spacious bedrooms & (3 large double rooms and one 1 single room), 2 receptions & (living room area and dining room), 1 very large kitchen and a rear garden. Properties on St Elmo Road have rare features with lovely large bay windows, large spindle balustrades to the front, and very attractive architecture overall. The house is best suited for families as well as private investors. Subject to planning permission, the loft can be converted into another 2 bedrooms and a bathroom or the whole house can be converted into 2 to 3 flats.

St Elmo Road is not only a pretty street but also located in an increasingly popular part of W12 just off the evolving Askew Road, close to Wendell Park and walking distance to Ravenscourt Park.

St Elmo Road is well placed for a good selection of amenities along the Askew Road including the esteemed Sainsbury's supermarket. Westfield Shopping Centre is moments away and the nearest station is Shepherd's Bush Market.

Munster Road makes up the heart of a lovely village-feel neighbourhood in Fulham and is home an array of cafes, restaurants and grocery shops. An outstanding, fully extended family home, set on a quiet residential street, close to South Park, and in the very popular Sands End area of Fulham.

This stylish 4 bedroom house is arranged over three floors and extending to almost 1,650 sq ft, the bedrooms and living space have been implemented and balanced so well. On the ground floor there is a double reception, separate W.C and an extended kitchen breakfast room to the rear of the house, with bi-fold doors leading out to a private 27ft landscaped garden. The first floor has three double bedrooms (two with built in wardrobes) and a modern family bathroom. The second floor loft extension comprises a beautifully designed master suite with excellent storage.

The property is situated on Gilstead Road a short walk from Fulham Broadway, Parsons Green and Imperial Wharf stations. Gilstead Road is close to several local schools of excellent repute and benefits from the shops, bars and restaurants of Wandsworth Bridge Road, the green spaces of South Park and Eel Brook Common as well as the nearby Sainsburys superstore and Harbour club.

detailedDescription:
A charming four bedroom family home on a lovely tree lined street.

Location

The nearest Underground stations are White City Station (Central line), approximately 0.5 miles, and Shepherd's Bush Market (Circle and Hammersmith & City lines), approximately 0.2 miles. These stations offer an excellent service to the city with a range of buses. Stanlake Road is also well located for access out of London to the west via the A4 and M4.

The property is close to the buzz of all the shops, bars and restaurants of Uxbridge Road, a short walk to the ever evolving Westfield shopping Centre and White City Soho House

Description

A remarkable house uniquely situated on Stanlake Road. This striking four bedroom family home offers fabulous living and entertaining space.

Upon entrance to the you are immediately welcomed by impressive reception room with large sash windows, feature fire places and wonderfully detailed cornicing. The cleverly designed open plan reception brings you through to the kitchen dining area which boasts plenty of natural light from a sizable skylight and double floor to ceiling French doors leading to a large not overlooked garden. A fully fitted kitchen, with working island and extensive storage offers sophisticated living and entertaining space.

The basement floor is currently used as an open plan music and entertainment space with access to bathroom and has a further workshop or utility space.

The first floor presents two bedrooms, with the principal boasting bright large windows high ceilings feature fireplace as well as private en suite bathroom with walk through wardrobes. The study is also found on the first floor with access to cloak room and has potential as a bedroom.

The top floor offers a further two bedroom and family bathroom with a spectacular roll top bathtub.

This ideal family home offers fantastic living space and ideal located for the best public and private schools in the area.

Square Footage: 2215 sq ft

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
With over 1,900 square foot of bright, welcoming and warm living space, this family home gives everything a growing Fulham family could possibly need in a mid-terraced Victorian house.

The house has been fully renovated throughout with glass walls, storage units and wooden floors all new in the ground floor, leading through to the fifth bedroom overlooking the landscaped garden.

The lower ground is one room providing incredible family and entertaining space leading out to the garden. Most unusually this floor and the 28 ft garden are all on one level removing the normal split level arrangement usual for the Bury Triangle.

Upstairs the living accommodation is spacious and provides a further four bedrooms, all of which are large doubles with a large family bathroom, the equivalent to many double bedrooms. The en-suite is accessed through the walk in wardrobe and occupies what is normally the second largest bedroom in a normal period house.

Fully extended and renovated throughout the property is only a short walk to Imperial Wharf station which provides regular London Overground and South Western Rail services in and out of London and is also close to both Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway tube stations. Cranbury Road benefits from the shops, bars and restaurants of Wandsworth Bridge Road and also the nearby green spaces of South Park.

title: 5 bed property for sale

address: Everington Street, Barons Court, Fulham W6
detailedDescription:
With a principal bedroom with walk-in wardrobe, main bathroom, large reception room and galley kitchen, this flat is well suited for first time buyers, young professionals or individuals searching for a city pied-a-terre. The property also benefits from an end-of block position with no direct neighbours, secure access, and double glazing throughout.

For leisure, the River Thames is only moments away, whilst the restaurants, cafes, and bars at of Barons Court, West Kensington and Fulham Broadway are also easily reached.

Day-to-day practicalities are taken care of by a variety of local stores including a Little Waitrose less than 5 minutes walk away, whilst direct transport into central London is available from Barons Court stations, along with various bus routes, and a Santander Cycles docking station directly opposite the block.

Words from the owner

What do you love most about your home?

The size is what first drew me to the flat. When I was making the purchase, I looked at many other places, but everything within my budget was so tiny in size in comparison.

Added to that was the fantastic location - both in terms of its proximity to transports, shops, bars and restaurants, and also the flat itself being set back from the street with no apartment either side or above. Added to its double glazed windows, and it is so quiet and peaceful

I also love the storage in the loft - such a rarity with London flats!

Why are you moving?

I'm starting a new business, so am selling the flat to help fund the startup costs!

What do you love about the area?

I love that there are plenty of cosy pubs right on the doorstep, along with some great local restaurants at the end of the street.

There's also easy access to the Piccadilly line, which is one straight ride to Heathrow Airport!

address: Ormiston Grove, Shepherd's Bush, London W12
detailedDescription:
Private garden. Situated on the first floor of this attractive Edwardian building, we have pleasure offering this stylish one-bedroom garden flat. To property offers impressive vaulted ceilings in the open plan kitchen reception room, one double bedroom and an En-suite shower room. The property further benefits from your very own private garden to the rear. The property further benefits from being offered chain free and with a Share of the Freehold. To arrange a viewing call Jorgensen Turner Shepherd's Bush office on .

The location is well served by a number of excellent independent shops, coffee shops (Proud Mary's), bars and pubs (Queen Adelaide and Princess Victoria) along the Uxbridge Road. Transport wise the property is well served by the Central Line (White City & Shepherds Bush), the Circle Line & Hammersmith & City Line (Shepherds Bush Market and Wood Lane) and London Overground (Shepherds Bush).The Westfield shopping centre is also only a short walk away from the property offering every retail store you could wish for. For the motorist the A4 and A40 are close by for easy access out to the West and North West of London.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This wonderful property is arranged over the first and second floors of a Victorian conversion and is flooded with natural light. The flat is made up of a spacious open-plan and dual-aspect kitchen reception room, two double bedrooms, one of which has an ensuite shower room, and a family bathroom. There is potential to add a pod or a roof terrace, subject to planning permission and freeholder’s consent.

Lysia Street is a highly sought-after address in the Alphabet Streets, located next to the River Thames and the green spaces of Bishops Park. When it comes to transport, the property is an easy walk to the underground links at Hammersmith and Putney Bridge stations and there are frequent buses leaving from Fulham Palace Road which take you in and out of Central London. For families, there is a fantastic selection of local schools to choose from. Viewings are highly recommended!

address: Hannell Road, Munster Village, Fulham, London SW6
detailedDescription:
A stylish two bedroom first floor apartment in a brand new boutique development of just nine flats in the heart of the Munster Village in Fulham. The development is complete and turn-key ready with occupation possible within the sdlt holiday (30 June 2021).

The property comprises: Two double bedrooms, spacious bathroom, en suite shower room, living room/ dining room/ modern, well-equipped kitchen & balcony.

The apartment has been finished to a high standard with Siemens appliances, wooden floors and bespoke fitted kitchen and bathroom.

Hannell Road is a residential road running off the Munster Road in the desirable "Munster Village" area of Fulham thus offering easy access to the extensive amenities of nearby Parsons Green and Fulham Broadway. Also nearby are the open spaces of Bishops Park, the walled garden of Fulham Palace, the walks along the River Thames and the popular Fulham Recreation Ground.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Summary
This is an exceptional first floor, Share of Freehold apartment in a beautiful white stucco fronted building with ornate iron railings adorning the pretty balconies, in Fulham's prestigious Barons Court.

Description
The property affords a mid-terrace position on this sought after Victorian street. It compromises of a wonderful open plan entertaining space, with impressive French doors opening up onto the gorgeous terrace with treated wooden decking and a table and chairs. There is a newly fitted modern kitchen which runs along one wall with built in appliances and the space has been cleverly used to incorporate a distinct dining area, office area and plenty of space for relaxation. There is fantastic storage throughout, with bespoke cabinetry and additional storage overhead, due to the incredible ceiling heights. The apartment boasts two well-proportioned double bedrooms with lots of storage at the rear of the property and the family bathroom has a tasteful neutral bathroom suite with a bath and overhead shower. There are also engineered oak floors throughout.
The property is on the doorstep of the many local amenities that Barons Court has to offer and it is located 0.3 miles from Barons Court Station (Piccadilly and District Lines) and a mere 0.1 miles from West Kensington Station (District Line).

We currently hold lease details as displayed above, should you require further information please contact the branch. Please note additional fees could be incurred for items such as leasehold packs.

Ormiston Grove, London W12

A terraced Victorian house with accommodation arranged over two main and three half level floors. Whilst perfectly habitable if does require cosmetic updating and has the benefit of full planning consent to extend in to the side return as well as the loft space.

detailedDescription:
A prefect starter flat or pied-a-terre close to Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green Tube Station, this block is in the process of undertaking complete refurbishment and benefits from a large communal terrace - perfect for relaxing outside.

The flat itself has a long 20.5 ft open plan reception presented in good condition and leading on to a 14ft double bedroom with walk in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom. Ideal as there isn't anything to do, an ideal lock up and leave and a secure block.

A short walk to Parsons Green tube station which is conveniently located only 0.6 miles away, the flat is close to the popular Joes Brasserie, South Park, Sainsburys and many more local bars or restaurants. An ideal flat for those looking to live in luxury close to the tube station.

The property comprises a large double bedroom, fitted kitchen, large reception with a beautiful sashed bay window and good size bathroom.

Location:
The Groves area of Shepherds Bush continues its relentless march to being one of the most fashionable and desirable family locations within the area. With two exceptional gastro pubs and a chic cafe on your doorstep and the increasingly charming and well cared for Wormholt park just down the road. address: Chelsea Creek Tower, Chelsea Creek, London SW6
detailedDescription:
This spacious lateral penthouse apartment, totalling 3,599 sq ft / 334.4 sq m, offers striking 360 degree views of Chelsea Harbour, the River Thames and the City of London as well as boasting incredible interiors and four private balconies, is available for chain free sale through Prime London. Parking spaces can also be purchased through separate negotiation.

This beautiful five bedroom apartment in Chelsea Creek offers an extremely rare opportunity to acquire such a sizeable apartment. The property is situated at the top of the building, and flows internally and externally to create a relaxed space within this luxurious development.

The property comprises two large, adjoined reception rooms (both leading to private balconies) and a stylish kitchen equipped with top of the range appliances that leads to a well placed utility room and staff bedroom with en suite bathroom. Through the second hallway you will find a four further spacious double bedrooms all with fitted storage (the largest of which features a substantial dressing room) two with stunning en suite bathrooms and access to two further private balconies, as well as a further family bathroom and WC. The property also benefits from parquet wooden flooring and comfort cooling.

Residents of Chelsea Creek have exclusive use of The Spa; the state of the art health and fitness centre in Chelsea Creek, with an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room, gymnasium and treatment room.

The desirable Chelsea Creek development is located adjacent to Chelsea Harbour, moments from the river Thames. This exclusive site is one of London's most prestigious dockside developments and is set amongst tree lined avenues, waterways and landscaped communal gardens .

The nearest transport is provided by Imperial Wharf Station (next to Chelsea Creek) which offers excellent transport links. There are numerous local bus services providing easy access into Chelsea, Fulham and further afield, plus the Thames Clipper Service operates from Chelsea Harbour pier.

Shorrolds Road runs perpendicular from North End Road to Dawes Road both of which benefit from many shops and restaurants. There are also further amenities at nearby Fulham Broadway. Transport links are excellent with Fulham Broadway underground (District Zone 2) and bus links in abundance. Parks and green spaces are also nearby with Eel Brook Common and Parsons Green.

address: Goldhurst House, Fulham Reach, London W6
detailedDescription:
This premium three-bedroom apartment, finished to the highest level of specification throughout and boasting incredible river views, is available for chain free sale through Prime London. The property also comes with a secure parking space.

The apartment is finished to an exacting standard throughout and benefits from a large open plan reception/dining area with direct views of the river from all angles, leading through to a semi-separate state of the art kitchen with integrated Miele appliances, wine cooler and a marble kitchen worktop. Further benefits include an expansive wrap-around private balcony with views towards the River Thames, and the large windows allow for natural light to flood the living space. The property further comprises a spacious master shower suite complete with dressing area with built in wardrobes and five-piece ensuite bathroom, the second and third double bedrooms also come with built in storage and three-piece ensuite bathrooms. There is plenty of further storage in the hallway as well as a guest WC.

Residents enjoy access to select private facilities including state-of-the-art gymnasium, swimming pool, virtual golf, wine storage and cinema screening room.

Fulham Reach is perfectly positioned with excellent transport links. Four London Underground lines - Hammersmith & City, Circle, District and Piccadilly are all a few minutes' walk. South Kensington is just an 8 minute journey and Knightsbridge 11 minutes. For International travellers, Heathrow Airport can be reached within 30 minutes.

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An excellently located three bedroom upper maisonette with 1232 sq ft (115 sq m) of internal space, and potential to extend STPP.

Accessed via it’s own front door, the property is arranged over two floors and has great potential (subject to the necessary consents) to extend over the rear roof creating an additional bedroom or roof terrace. On the first floor there is a large living room to the front of the property, and a separate kitchen toward the rear which has been newly fitted. The remainder of the space consists of two bedrooms, and a family bathroom which has also recently been updated. On the top floor there is a master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom.

The property is positioned at the western end of Colehill Lane, just back from the junction with Fulham Palace road which is a hub of excellent coffee shops, and a short stroll to Bishops Park which sits beside the River Thames. Colehill Lane is a quiet residential road, located within walking distance of Putney Bridge and Parsons Green stations.

detailedDescription:
**vacant & ready to view** 3D Virtual Viewing Available - This 1204 SqFt second floor apartment features a bright open-plan living space with a private balcony and boasts the most desired aspect, facing Grade II listed Hammersmith Bridge and the river Thames. Benefiting from an impressive principle suite with dressing area and large ensuite and an additional spacious second bedroom, plus further bathroom.

Occupying a beautiful riverside location, the stunning Queen's Wharf offers elegance and luxury and the perfect home for London life. Designed with the traditional British home in mind, with contemporary twists and superb quality finishes, this home will be forever stylish and the perfect base to make your own.

Accessed by the riverfront through the residents-only reception, you will be welcomed by 24 hour concierge and cosy seating area with fireplace. Queen's Wharf also offers tranquil green podium gardens and a residents only landscaped roof terrace with stunning views across the river, the perfect place to relax after work with friends and enjoy the sunset.

Queen’s Wharf is a six-minute walk to Hammersmith Underground station, which offers a choice of four lines: Circle, District, Hammersmith & City and Piccadilly providing excellent access to central London. Heathrow airport is a 20 minutes drive away.

The property comprises: Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, open plan living room/ dining room (with gas fire) and a modern well-equipped kitchen.

This top floor duplex apartment has been finished to a high standard with solid wood floors in the kitchen, living room, hallway and main bedroom. The kitchen has Miele appliances and stone worktops (the utility cupboard on the top floor houses a washing machine and a dryer - both Miele).

Situated a mere 100 metres from Parsons Green itself, the flat could not be better positioned for the wonderful and extensive amenities that the vibrant Parsons Green area has to offer.

detailedDescription:
A well-presented and bright two bedroom property with great outside space situated in a prime location with plenty of local amenities close by.

Location

Shepherds Bush Road is a popular location bordering Kensington and provides excellent schools including St Paul's Girls' school and Ecole Francaise de Londres Jacques Prevert.

The location has excellent nearby transport links to Shepherd's Bush Market, approximately 0.3 miles (Circle line and Hammersmith & City), Shepherds Bush Station, approximately 0.5 miles (Central line, Overground and National Rail), and Goldhawk Road Station, approximately 0.3 miles (Circle line and Hammersmith & City). Shepherds Bush Road offers quick and easy access to the A4 taking you into central London or out to the countryside.

There are an excellent variety of local shops, cafes, delicatessens and restaurants plus Westfield Shopping Centre.

Description

A well-presented and bright two bedroom property situated in a prime location with plenty of local amenities close by.

The large open plan living dining area is fantastic for hosting and offers an abundance of natural light which streams in from the large bright sliding doors which opens on to the patio area.
The fully fitted kitchen leads off from the reception offering plenty of bespoke storage and built-in modern appliances. A cloakroom sits alongside.

The principal bedroom is wonderfully bright and boasts high ceilings, a walk- in wardrobe with direct access to family bathroom.

A second bedroom currently used as an office also has access to the bathroom from the landing offering plenty of natural light from large modern windows and boasts high ceilings.

This home has been well designed and offers bright and modern features throughout.

Square Footage: 1031 sq ft

detailedDescription:
Close to Eel Brook Common lies Pomona House, a large imposing late Victorian period building (built around the turn of the century) for the photographer, Charles Pretorius and later used as a series of sculpture studios. The proportions of this Artists Studio property provide wonderfully creative and adaptable space, which form the main area of 25'8 x 15'9. This includes the reception room, kitchen and the bathroom. In addition is the gallery bedroom space of 19'3 x 9'11 with great natural light and ample storage. Share of freehold.
Pleasantly situated opposite the green spaces between Eel Brook Common and Parsons Green, this property is perfectly placed for the excellent range of local shops and tube station (district line) that Parsons Green area has to offer. With a short drive to Chelsea (to the east) and easy access to Richmond Park to the west, this property offers an excellent location.

detailedDescription:
This is truly an outstanding four bedroom house in the heart of South Fulham. This house has been completely rebuilt with not a penny spared. The entire ground floor has been knocked through to create a beautiful, bright and impressive family space.

Entering on the ground floor into the very large open plan living space and eat in kitchen/dining room. The house a large low maintenance patio garden to the rear offering a perfect outdoor area for entertaining. On the first floor are three well proportioned double bedrooms, one being the master suite with a beautiful en suite bathroom. On the top floor is another large double room with an en suite shower room. The top floor bedroom leads out on to a large terrace area with surrounding misted balustrades for added privacy.

Querrin Street is one of the quietest roads in the South Fulham area as it is not a cut through road. Only a short walk to the amenities of Wandsworth Bridge Road it is a perfect family area with regular buses to the the Underground Stations of Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green.

detailedDescription:
Summary
Set behind a period brick façade, The Ariana Apartments is a stylish collection of 20 luxurious apartments in the heart of fashionable Fulham and part of the Earls Court regeneration area in Central London.

Description
Located at the rear of the building, this stunning apartment accessed via a lift, is on the prime first floor and just shy of 600sqft, is an incredible size.
With contemporary open-plan living and entertaining space, the apartment is finished to the highest of standards, with high quality engineered oak flooring and modern fixtures and fittings throughout. There is a video phone entry system for optimum security, android tablets in the living areas, designer skirting and architraves throughout, integrated speakers, and usb chrome sockets.The inviting open plan living room has space for both relaxation and dining. It features an Italian designer kitchen, with composite absolute worktops and Bosch appliances, including an integrated wine cooler and coffee machine.
The property boasts a large master bedroom with luxury Saxony carpet and plenty of room for storage. Similarly to the living room, it also has shadow gap LED feature lighting. The tasteful bathroom is a marble effect, with light beige ceramic tiles, underfloor heating and a designer suite.
The Ariana Apartments are in a fantastic location, on the doorstep to Fulham's many local amenities, as well as a short walk into Kensington. West Brompton Station (Overground and District Lines) is 0.3 miles and Fulham Broadway Station (District Line) is 0.6 miles.

address: Parkside, White City Living, London W12
detailedDescription:
Hamptons and St James are offering a range of beautiful apartments at White City Living where luxury interiors, outstanding facilities, world-class retail and excellent transport links create an experience like no other.

Apartment:

This two bedroom, 807sqft (74.9sqm) apartment overlooks White City Living's Central Gardens which have been meticulously designed to celebrate every passing season. The principal bedroom has a dressing area and en suite bathroom and there is a second double bedroom and shower room. The open plan kitchen/living room opens onto the private balcony.

The interiors have been designed by Johnson Naylor whilst the kitchens have integrated Miele appliances and composite stone worktops. There is comfort cooling to all habitable rooms and underfloor heating throughout.

Underground parking is available for an additional £55,000.

The Water Gardens will complete from late 2023 to early 2024.

Amenities:

Residents’ facilities include 24-hour Concierge, swimming pool with sun terrace, Residents’ Club Lounge, therapeutic hydro-pool, dining room and private kitchen, fully equipped gym with rooms for personal training and classes, treatment and massage rooms, café, two 12-seat private cinemas with food and drink facilities, business lounge and meeting rooms, entertainment suite and secure parking (by separate negotiation).

Residents of this latest phase of White City Living will enjoy a touch free journey to their apartment. The lobby doors will automatically open as you arrive and the intelligent lift takes you to your floor. You can also arrange deliveries and issue virtual keys to friends and family via your smartphone. Communal areas, including the car parks are covered by CCTV.

Surroundings:

On completion White City living will be a community of 2,300 homes within 8 acres of parks and gardens, surrounded by world-class retail, entertainment and educational institutions including Westfield Shopping Centre (Europe's largest mall) and Imperial College’s new 23 acre campus campus is nearby.

The Water Gardens consists of 526 apartments in three buildings at the heart of this new neighbourhood. They are a unique opportunity to live beside the oriental water gardens, which flow through a landscape of hand-selected trees and plants, under elegant bridges, over cascades and waterfalls.

Transport:

Two Underground stations are on the edge of the development: White City (Central Line) and Wood Lane (Circle Line and Hammersmith & City Line). Bond Street is 12 minutes away and Paddington Station is 8 minutes away with its connections to Heathrow and the forthcoming Elizabeth Line (Crossrail).

The M40 and M4 both provide convenient access out of London.

Images are computer generated and floorplans are indicative only.

The property is located ideally for the centre of Brook Green, close to Shepherds Bush and Westfield shopping centre as well as Hammersmith and its excellent transport links to Central London and Heathrow.

detailedDescription:
This elegant apartment set to the front of the building is accessed on the ground floor offering sophisticated living space with bespoke wooden flooring throughout.

On the ground floor there is a beautifully designed Italian open plan kitchen with high quality built-in appliances and plenty of neat storage that opens to the light and airy reception room. A WC completes this floor.

To the lower floor there is a spacious principal bedroom with access to two lightwell/terraces and a neighbouring bathroom accompanied by a second bedroom also with access to the lightwell/terrace. Both bedrooms have been immaculately finished and offer an abundance of natural light.

The apartment has been finished to high standard and boasts architectural features throughout in addition to remarkable lighting.

Location description Kilmarsh Road is a quiet residential street in the heart of West London.

This location offers excellent transport links into the city and is near to Hammersmith Broadway station, approximately 0.3 miles (Piccadilly, District, Circle, Hammersmith and City Lines) and Goldhawk Road, approximately 0.6 miles (Circle and Hammersmith and City Lines). Hammersmith is also excellently positioned for the A4 offering convenient access to Heathrow airport and beyond.

There are a number of excellently maintained and independent schools for all ages nearby, including the highly-esteemed Godolphin and Latymer, St Paul's and Latymer Upper School as well as numerous shops, services and restaurants in King Street, and Chiswick is close by offering a number of highly acclaimed restaurants and eateries.

address: Westwood House, Chelsea Creek, London SW6
detailedDescription:
This brand new and expertly crafted one bedroom apartment, set within the extremely well received Chelsea Creek development, is available for sale through Prime London. There are a selection of other one, two and three bedroom apartments available, so do get in touch for further details.

With floor to ceiling windows throughout the apartment allowing an abundance of light, the sense of space is excellent. This 612 sq ft / 57 sq m contemporary apartment benefits from having a large open plan reception and fully fitted kitchen and access to a private balcony overlooking the beautiful landscaped gardens. Through the hallway you will find a well proportioned double bedroom with a substantial bult in wardrobe, and a modern family bathroom. The property also benefits from wooden flooring and comfort cooling.

Residents of this exceptional address have exclusive use of The Spa, the state of the art health and fitness centre in Chelsea Creek, including an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room, gymnasium and treatment room. Residents will also benefit from a 24 hour concierge and an unrivalled selection of shops, bars, restaurants, leisure facilities and beautiful landscaped courtyards and tree-lined avenues. Located on the north bank of the River Thames adjacent to Chelsea Harbour and close to the shops and restaurants of Fulham and Chelsea.

detailedDescription:
Luxurious river facing second floor apartment for sale in Fulham Reach.

This stylish two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment offers an abundance of space with its bright open-plan kitchen/living areas, providing plenty of natural light. The kitchen has fully integrated appliances including a wine cooler.

The master bedroom is beautifully bright with fitted wardrobes and en suite bathroom fitted with marble, the second bedroom also has an en suite bathroom and under floor heating, there is a further guest WC and as well as a utility service cupboard in the hallway. The apartment has two balcony’s with river views.
Transport links
The apartment is just a few minutes’ walk to the underground stations - Hammersmith & City, Circle, District and Piccadilly.

Marketed in association with London Luxury Property
